Йsta se encontrarб por divina providencia si se colonizan las inmediaciones de cualquier pico hallado. Tarde o pronto se encontrarб el apropiado.[PARAGRAPH:1]Tambiйn se pueden buscar mбs pistas si se estudian las sagradas escrituras. Si se construyen %d3 edificios religiosos (Templos y Monasterios), los lнderes religiosos resolverбn el enigma de la ubicaciуn correcta de la Montaсa Sagrada, pero aъn habrб que ir allн y colonizarla para completar la misiуn. [NUM2:Un:Una:Unos:Unas] %s2_building [NUM2:permite:permite:permiten:permiten] un culto mбs coordinado y [NUM2:cuenta:cuenta:cuentan:cuentan] como cuatro Templos a efectos de esta misiуn.[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si se cambia la religiуn oficial, si se deja de tener una religiуn oficial o si se alcanza la Era Industrial sin haber cumplido las condiciones. Tambiйn se fracasarб si cualquier otra civilizaciуn se apodera antes de la Montaсa Sagrada.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of The Holy Mountain.
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The Holy Mountain.
TEXT.French: Vous n'avez pas rйussi la quкte de la montagne sacrйe.
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Der Heilige Berg" ist gescheitert.
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito l'impresa della Montagna Sacra.
TEXT.Spanish: La misiуn "La Montaсa Sagrada" ha fracasado.

TEXT.Russian: The faithful %s3_religion_adjective people are inspired by the divine providence of the %s1_civ_adjective Empire for completing the Quest of the Holy Mountain!
TEXT.English: The faithful %s3_religion_adjective people are inspired by the divine providence of the %s1_civ_adjective Empire for completing the Quest of the Holy Mountain!
TEXT.French: Les fidиles %s3:3_religion_adjective louent la providence divine qui a permis а l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective d'achever la quкte de la montagne sacrйe !
TEXT.German: Das glдubige %s3:3_religion_adjective Volk ist angesichts der Erfьllung der Quest "Der Heilige Berg" von der gцttlichen Vorsehung des %s1:2_civ_adjective Reiches inspiriert!
TEXT.Italian: Il fedele popolo %s3_religion_adjective и ispirato dalla divina provvidenza dell'impero %s1_civ_adjective, ottenuta per aver completato l'impresa della Montagna Sacra!
TEXT.Spanish: Los fieles %s3:3_religion_adjective estбn inspirados por la divina providencia del imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective, que ha completado la misiуn de la Montaсa Sagrada.

TEXT.Russian: Your people are inspired by the way in which you have honored your faith.
TEXT.English: Your people are inspired by the way in which you have honored your faith.
TEXT.French: Votre peuple applaudit la maniиre dont vous avez honorй votre foi.
TEXT.German: Euer Volk ist von der Art und Weise inspiriert, wie Ihr Eurem Glauben Ehre erwiesen habt.
TEXT.Italian: La tua gente и impressionata dal modo in cui hai onorato la tua fede.
TEXT.Spanish: El pueblo estб inspirado por la manera en que se ha honrado nuestra fe.

TEXT.Russian: Look at the Holy Mountain.
TEXT.English: Look at the Holy Mountain.
TEXT.French: Contempler la montagne sacrйe
TEXT.German: Seht Euch den Heiligen Berg an!
TEXT.Italian: Guarda la Montagna Sacra.
TEXT.Spanish: Admirad la Montaсa Sagrada.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have located the Holy Mountain and extended your cultural influence over the sacred site!
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have located the Holy Mountain and extended your cultural influence over the sacred site!
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations! Vous avez localisй la montagne sacrйe et йtendu votre influence culturelle а ce site sacrй !
TEXT.German: Gratulation! Ihr habt den Heiligen Berg gefunden und Euren kulturellen Einfluss auf diesen geheiligten Ort ausgeweitet!
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai trovato la Montagna Sacra e hai esteso la tua influenza culturale sul sacro sito!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Se ha encontrado la Montaсa Sagrada y extendido nuestra influencia cultural por el lugar sagrado.

TEXT.Russian: You have built enough religious buildings for your religious leaders to solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain. Settle near that location to complete the quest!
TEXT.English: You have built enough religious buildings for your religious leaders to solve the puzzle and identify the correct location of the Holy Mountain. Settle near that location to complete the quest!
TEXT.French: Vous avez bвti suffisamment de bвtiments religieux pour que vos chefs religieux rйsolvent l'йnigme et identifient l'emplacement correct de la montagne sacrйe. Installez-vous prиs de cet endroit pour achever la quкte !
TEXT.German: Sie haben genug religiцse Gebдude errichtet, dass Ihre religiцsen Fьhrer das Rдtsel lцsen und den korrekten Standort des Heiligen Berges ermitteln kцnnen. Siedeln Sie sich in der Nдhe des Berges an, um die Quest erfolgreich abzuschlieЯen!
TEXT.Italian: Hai costruito abbastanza edifici religiosi affinchй i leader religiosi risolvano l'enigma e identifichino l'esatta posizione della Montagna Sacra. Accampati vicino a quella posizione per riuscire nell'impresa!
TEXT.Spanish: Se han construido suficientes edificios religiosos como para que los lнderes de la fe resuelvan el enigma y ubiquen el lugar exacto donde se encuentra la Montaсa Sagrada. Es necesario asentarse cerca de ese lugar para completar la misiуn.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective horticulturists have harnessed rare local resources to produce remedies.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective horticulturists have harnessed rare local resources to produce remedies.
TEXT.French: Des horticulteurs %s1:3_civ_adjective ont exploitй des ressources locales pour produire des remиdes.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Gartenbauingenieure haben seltene einheimische Ressourcen fьr die Produktion von Heilmitteln erschlossen.
TEXT.Italian: Gli orticultori %s1_civ_adjective hanno sfruttato rare risorse locali per produrre farmaci.
TEXT.Spanish: Los horticultores %s1:3_civ_adjective han aprovechado extraсos recursos del lugar para producir remedios.

TEXT.Russian: Herbalists have discovered rare and precious plants that grow in abundance only in a certain region near %s2_city.
TEXT.English: Herbalists have discovered rare and precious plants that grow in abundance only in a certain region near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des herboristes ont dйcouvert des plantes rares et prйcieuses qui poussent en abondance uniquement dans une certaine rйgion prиs de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Krдutergдrtner haben seltene und wertvolle Pflanzen entdeckt, die nur in einer bestimmten Region nahe %s2_city im Ьberfluss wachsen.
TEXT.Italian: Gli erboristi hanno scoperto piante rare e preziose che crescono in abbondanza solo in una certa regione, vicino a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Los herbolarios han descubierto plantas raras y preciadas que crecen en abundancia cerca de %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: A medicinal tea cultivated by locals has been found to be effective with treating illnesses. This tea grows only in a specific region near %s2_city.
TEXT.English: A medicinal tea cultivated by locals has been found to be effective with treating illnesses. This tea grows only in a specific region near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un thй mйdicinal cultivй par des herboristes locaux s'est avйrй efficace pour traiter certaines maladies. Ce thй ne pousse que dans une rйgion bien spйcifique prиs de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein Arzneitee, der von den Einheimischen kultiviert wurde, hat sich als wirksames Heilmittel gegen Krankheiten erwiesen. Dieser Tee wдchst nur in einer bestimmten Region nahe der Stadt %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: Si и scoperto che un tи medicinale coltivato dalla gente del posto и efficace nel curare i malanni. Questo tи cresce solo in una specifica regione vicino a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Se ha descubierto que una infusiуn medicinal cultivada por los lugareсos es eficaz para tratar enfermedades. Esta planta solo crece en una regiуn muy concreta, cerca de %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: Certain rare insects found near %s2_city, when harvested and ground into a paste by a reclusive tribe, can be ingested to reduce fever.
TEXT.English: Certain rare insects found near %s2_city, when harvested and ground into a paste by a reclusive tribe, can be ingested to reduce fever.
TEXT.French: On a dйcouvert prиs de %s2_city des insectes rares qui, une fois broyйs par une tribu locale, peuvent кtre ingйrйs pour faire tomber la fiиvre.
TEXT.German: Ein zurьckgezogen lebender Stamm ist in der Lage, bestimmte seltene Insekten, die in der Nдhe der Stadt %s2_city entdeckt wurden, zu fangen und zu einer Fieber senkenden Paste zu verarbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: Alcuni rari insetti trovati vicino a %s2_city, dopo essere stati raccolti e ridotti in pasta da una tribщ che vive isolata, possono essere ingeriti per far scendere la febbre.
TEXT.Spanish: Una tribu muy esquiva, que vive cerca de %s2_city, recoge ciertos insectos muy raros, los muele y los convierte en una pasta que puede ingerirse para bajar la fiebre.

TEXT.Russian: We should establish internal trade with the locals for these rare commodities.
TEXT.English: We should establish internal trade with the locals for these rare commodities.
TEXT.French: Nous devrions йtablir des liens commerciaux avec ces paysans pour mettre la main sur ces produits rares.
TEXT.German: Wir sollten mit den Einheimischen verhandeln, um diese seltenen Waren zu bekommen.
TEXT.Italian: Dovremmo stabilire un commercio con la gente del posto per avere questi rari prodotti.
TEXT.Spanish: Debemos establecer un intercambio interno con los lugareсos a cambio de esos raros bienes.

TEXT.Russian: Fund efforts to increase production without endangering the natural resources that produce them.
TEXT.English: Fund efforts to increase production without endangering the natural resources that produce them.
TEXT.French: Financer une campagne pour augmenter la production sans mettre en danger les ressources naturelles qui les gйnиrent.
TEXT.German: Finanziert MaЯnahmen zur Produktionssteigerung, ohne die natьrlichen Ressourcen zu gefдhrden.
TEXT.Italian: Finanzia gli sforzi per aumentare la produzione senza mettere in pericolo le risorse naturali da cui dipendono.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se invierta en aumentar la producciуn sin poner en peligro los recursos naturales que los producen.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective investments in horticulture have paid off! A new minor industry is thriving in %s2_city, boosting health and research.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective investments in horticulture have paid off! A new minor industry is thriving in %s2_city, boosting health and research.
TEXT.French: Les investissements %s1:3_civ_adjective dans le domaine de l'horticulture ont payй ! Une nouvelle industrie mineure prospиre а %s2_city, favorisant la santй et la recherche.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Investitionen auf dem Gebiet des Gartenbaus haben sich ausgezahlt! In %s2_city wдchst ein neuer Industriezweig heran und steigert die Gesundheit sowie die wissenschaftliche Forschung.
TEXT.Italian: Gli investimenti %s1_civ_adjective nell'orticultura stanno dando frutti! A %s2_city prospera una nuova industria minore, che incrementa salute e ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: Las inversiones %s1:4_civ_adjective en horticultura han valido la pena. Una nueva industria menor estб prosperando en %s2_city, lo que impulsa la salud y la investigaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective authorities are rumored to have captured a fugitive fleeing from %s4_civ_adjective justice. No confirmation is available.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective authorities are rumored to have captured a fugitive fleeing from %s4_civ_adjective justice. No confirmation is available.
TEXT.French: Les autoritйs %s1:4_civ_adjective auraient capturй un fugitif poursuivi par la justice %s4:2_civ_adjective. Cette information n'a pas йtй confirmйe.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Behцrden sollen einen Verbrecher auf der Flucht vor der %s4:2_civ_adjective Justiz gefangen genommen haben. Diese Meldung ist bislang unbestдtigt.
TEXT.Italian: Si dice che le autoritа %s1_civ_adjective abbiano catturato un uomo in fuga dalla giustizia %s4_civ_adjective. Non и disponibile alcuna conferma.
TEXT.Spanish: Se rumorea que las autoridades %s1:4_civ_adjective han capturado a un fugitivo que huнa de la justicia %s4:2_civ_adjective. No disponemos de confirmaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: A fugitive from justice, wanted for crimes in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, has been discovered hiding out in our territory.
TEXT.English: A fugitive from justice, wanted for crimes in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, has been discovered hiding out in our territory.
TEXT.French: Un fugitif poursuivi pour des crimes perpйtrйs dans l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective a йtй dйcouvert sur notre territoire.
TEXT.German: Ein flьchtiger Verbrecher, der im %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich gesucht wird, hдlt sich auf unserem Territorium versteckt.
TEXT.Italian: Nei nostri territori и stato scoperto un fuggitivo, ricercato per i crimini commessi nell'impero %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Hemos descubierto que en nuestro territorio se oculta un prуfugo de la justicia, buscado por delitos en el imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: An assassin wanted for slaying a %s1_civ_adjective official has been caught fleeing through our land.
TEXT.English: An assassin wanted for slaying a %s1_civ_adjective official has been caught fleeing through our land.
TEXT.French: Un assassin poursuivi pour avoir assassinй un haut fonctionnaire %s1:1_civ_adjective a йtй capturй alors qu'il traversait notre territoire
TEXT.German: Ein Attentдter, der wegen des Mordes an einem %s1:2_civ_adjective Beamten gesucht wird, wurde auf der Flucht durch unser Land gefangen genommen.

TEXT.Spanish: Hemos atrapado huyendo por nuestra tierra a un asesino buscado por matar a un funcionario %s1:1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: Extradite the offender back to his homeland.
TEXT.English: Extradite the offender back to his homeland.
TEXT.French: Extrader le criminel.
TEXT.German: Liefert den Ьbeltдter an sein Heimatland aus.
TEXT.Italian: Estrada il criminale nella madrepatria.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se extradite al delincuente a su patria.

TEXT.Russian: Secretly interrogate the prisoner, hoping to learn sensitive information.
TEXT.English: Secretly interrogate the prisoner, hoping to learn sensitive information.
TEXT.French: Interroger secrиtement le prisonnier. Nous pourrons peut-кtre apprendre des informations capitales.
TEXT.German: Verhцrt den Gefangenen diskret, um mцglicherweise heikle Informationen in Erfahrung zu bringen.
TEXT.Italian: Interroga segretamente il prigioniero, sperando di scoprire informazioni importanti.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se interrogue en secreto al prisionero, a ver si nos enteramos de algo interesante.

TEXT.Russian: Release the prisoner. This is none of our affairs.
TEXT.English: Release the prisoner. This is none of our affairs.
TEXT.French: Relвcher le prisonnier. Ce ne sont pas nos affaires.
TEXT.German: Lasst den Gefangenen frei. Das geht uns nichts an.
TEXT.Italian: Rilascia il prigioniero. Non sono affari nostri.
TEXT.Spanish: Que liberen al prisionero. Este asunto no nos compete.

TEXT.Russian: Our gesture of goodwill toward the %s3_civ_adjective Empire has angered %s6_player.
TEXT.English: Our gesture of goodwill toward the %s3_civ_adjective Empire has angered %s6_player.
TEXT.French: Notre geste de bonne volontй envers l'empire %s3:1_civ_adjective a provoquй la colиre de %s6_player.
TEXT.German: Unsere Geste des guten Willens gegenьber dem %s3:2_civ_adjective Reich hat %s6_player verдrgert.
TEXT.Italian: Il nostro gesto di benevolenza verso l'impero %s3_civ_adjective ha irritato %s6_player.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro gesto de buena voluntad hacia el imperio %s3:1_civ_adjective ha enojado a %s6_player.

TEXT.Russian: Word of our interrogation of the fugitive has leaked to %s3_civ_adjective authorities, angering them.
TEXT.English: Word of our interrogation of the fugitive has leaked to %s3_civ_adjective authorities, angering them.
TEXT.French: L'interrogatoire du fugitif est venu aux oreilles des autoritйs %s3:4_civ_adjective et a provoquй leur colиre.

TEXT.Spanish: El asunto de nuestro interrogatorio al prуfugo se ha filtrado a las autoridades %s3:4_civ_adjective y las ha enojado.

TEXT.Russian: Pestilence has struck %s1_civ_adjective agricultural lands.
TEXT.English: Pestilence has struck %s1_civ_adjective agricultural lands.
TEXT.French: Une maladie ravage les terres agricoles %s1:4_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Auf %s1:2_civ_adjective Дckern ist die Pest ausgebrochen.
TEXT.Italian: La pestilenza ha colpito i territori agricoli %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Una plaga ha asolado las tierras de cultivo %s1:4_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Pasture near %s2_city, destroying all the livestock there.
TEXT.English: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Pasture near %s2_city, destroying all the livestock there.
TEXT.French: Des nuйes de sauterelles ont envahi un pвturage prиs de %s2_city, dйtruisant tout le bйtail qui s'y trouvait.
TEXT.German: Das Weideland in der Nдhe der Stadt %s_city ist einer Heuschreckenplage zum Opfer gefallen, die den gesamten Viehbestand vernichtet hat.
TEXT.Italian: Le locuste hanno invaso i pascoli vicino a %s2_city, causando la morte di tutto il bestiame.
TEXT.Spanish: Una plaga de langostas ha aparecido en un pastizal cerca de %s2_city y ha acabado con todo el ganado que habнa allн.

TEXT.Russian: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste to grazing lands near %s2_city.
TEXT.English: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste to grazing lands near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: D'immenses armйes de fourmis de feu ont ravagй des pвturages prиs de %s2_city.

TEXT.Spanish: Un ejйrcito de hormigas de fuego de proporciones gigantescas ha arrasado los pastos cercanos a %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: Massive colonies of termites have overrun and destroyed some of our agriculture near %s2_city.
TEXT.English: Massive colonies of termites have overrun and destroyed some of our agriculture near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: D'immenses colonies de termites ont envahi et dйtruit nos terres agricoles prиs de %s2_city.

TEXT.Italian: Enormi colonie di termiti hanno invaso e distrutto alcuni nostri campi vicino a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Grandes colonias de termitas han tomado y arrasado parte de nuestros cultivos, cerca de %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Plantation near %s2_city, destroying all the crops there.
TEXT.English: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Plantation near %s2_city, destroying all the crops there.
TEXT.French: Des nuйes de sauterelles ont envahi une plantation prиs de %s2_city, dйtruisant toutes les cultures qui s'y trouvaient.

TEXT.Spanish: Una plaga de langostas ha aparecido en una Plantaciуn cerca de %s2_city y ha acabado con todos los cultivos que habнa allн.

TEXT.Russian: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste a region of plantations lands near %s2_city.
TEXT.English: Fire ant armies of massive proportion have laid waste a region of plantations lands near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: D'immenses armйes de fourmis de feu ont ravagй des plantations prиs de %s2_city.

TEXT.Spanish: Un ejйrcito de hormigas de fuego de proporciones gigantescas ha arrasado una regiуn de plantaciones cercana a %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: That's horrible.
TEXT.English: That's horrible.
TEXT.French: C'est affreux.
TEXT.German: Das ist ja furchtbar!
TEXT.Italian: И orribile.
TEXT.Spanish: Es horrible.

TEXT.Russian: A %s1_civ_adjective soldier has run a great distance to warn of invasion, inspiring defenders all across their lands.
TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective soldier has run a great distance to warn of invasion, inspiring defenders all across their lands.
TEXT.French: Un soldat %s1:1_civ_adjective a couru sur une trиs longue distance pour prйvenir de l'invasion, ralliant de nombreux dйfenseurs sur son passage.
TEXT.German: Ein Soldat des %s1:2_civ_adjective Volkes hat zu FuЯ eine beachtliche Entfernung zurьckgelegt, um die Verteidigungstruppen im ganzen Land vor einer bevorstehenden Invasion zu warnen und sie zu inspirieren.
TEXT.Italian: Un soldato %s1_civ_adjective ha coperto di corsa una grande distanza per avvertire di un'invasione, ispirando tutti i difensori del Paese.
TEXT.Spanish: Un soldado %s1:1_civ_adjective ha recorrido una gran distancia para avisar de una invasiуn, y ha inspirado a los defensores por todas sus tierras.

TEXT.Russian: A brave and hardy soldier has run over twenty-six miles on foot to warn of the invasion!
TEXT.English: A brave and hardy soldier has run over twenty-six miles on foot to warn of the invasion!
TEXT.French: Un robuste et courageux soldat a couru plus de quarante kilomиtres pour prйvenir de l'invasion !
TEXT.German: Ein mutiger, zдher Soldat hat ьber 42 Kilometer zu FuЯ zurьckgelegt, um eine Warnung vor einer Invasion zu ьberbringen!

TEXT.Spanish: ¡Un soldado valiente y fuerte ha recorrido una gran distancia a pie para avisarnos de la invasiуn!

TEXT.Russian: This heroic deed has inspired our entire army!
TEXT.English: This heroic deed has inspired our entire army!
TEXT.French: Cet acte hйroпque a inspirй notre armйe toute entiиre !
TEXT.German: Diese heldenhafte Tat hat unsere gesamte Armee inspiriert!
TEXT.Italian: Questa eroica impresa ha ispirato il nostro intero esercito!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Esta proeza ha inspirado a todo nuestro ejйrcito!

TEXT.Russian: A faux pas commited by the %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has caused quite a stir in the %s4_civ_adjective Capital.
TEXT.English: A faux pas commited by the %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has caused quite a stir in the %s4_civ_adjective Capital.
TEXT.French: Une gaffe commise par l'ambassadeur %s1:1_civ_adjective a provoquй de grands remous dans la capitale %s4:2_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Spanish: Un paso en falso dado por el embajador %s1:1_civ_adjective ha causado un gran revuelo en la capital %s4:2_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: Our ambassador to the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has committed a faux pas!
TEXT.English: Our ambassador to the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has committed a faux pas!
TEXT.French: Notre ambassadeur dans l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective a commis un impair !

TEXT.Spanish: ¡Nuestro embajador en el imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective ha dado un paso en falso!

TEXT.Russian: This gaffe has adversely affected our relations.
TEXT.English: This gaffe has adversely affected our relations.
TEXT.French: Cette bйvue a gravement affectй nos relations.
TEXT.German: Diese Sache wirkt sich nachteilig auf unsere Beziehungen zu dieser Nation aus.
TEXT.Italian: La gaffe ha influenzato negativamente le nostre relazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: Ese torpe ha afectado adversamente a nuestras relaciones.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has committed a faux pas. This insulting gaffe has adversely affected our relations with his country.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has committed a faux pas. This insulting gaffe has adversely affected our relations with his country.
TEXT.French: L'ambassadeur %s1_civ_adjective a commis une bйvue. Cet impair a gravement affectй nos relations avec son pays.
TEXT.German: Der %s1:3_civ_adjective Botschafter hat sich einen Fauxpas geleistet. Diese Sache wirkt sich nachteilig auf unsere Beziehungen zu dieser Nation aus.
TEXT.Italian: L'ambasciatore %s1_civ_adjective ha commesso una gaffe. L'episodio ha influenzato negativamente le nostre relazioni col suo Paese.
TEXT.Spanish: El embajador %s1:1_civ_adjective ha dado un paso en falso. Esta ofensiva metedura de pata ha afectado negativamente a nuestras relaciones con su paнs.

TEXT.Russian: A joyous marriage in the %s3_religion_adjective tradition has forged new bonds between %s1_civ_adjective and %s4_civ_adjective peoples, who both adore the new couple and are pleased with the behavior of the inlaws from the other nation.
TEXT.English: A joyous marriage in the %s3_religion_adjective tradition has forged new bonds between %s1_civ_adjective and %s4_civ_adjective peoples, who both adore the new couple and are pleased with the behavior of the inlaws from the other nation.
TEXT.French: Un joyeux mariage dans la tradition %s3:2_religion_adjective a forgй de nouveaux liens entre les peuples %s1:1_civ_adjective et %s4:1_civ_adjective, qui tous deux portent une grande affection au nouveau couple ainsi qu'а leurs belles-familles.
TEXT.German: Durch eine frцhliche %s3:3_religion_adjective Hochzeit wurde ein neues Band zwischen der %s1:2_civ_adjective und der %s4:2_civ_adjective Bevцlkerung geknьpft. Das Brautpaar wird auf beiden Seiten gleichermaЯen verehrt und man freut sich ьber die neu hinzugewonnene Schwiegerverwandtschaft in der jeweils anderen Nation.
TEXT.Italian: Un felice matrimonio nella tradizione religiosa %s3_religion_adjective ha creato nuovi legami tra la popolazione %s1_civ_adjective e quella %s4_civ_adjective, che adorano la nuova coppia e sono compiaciute del comportamento dei suoceri dell'altra nazione.
TEXT.Spanish: Un alegre matrimonio en la tradiciуn %s3:2_religion_adjective ha forjado nuevos vнnculos entre los pueblos %s1:1_civ_adjective y %s4:1_civ_adjective, que adoran a la nueva pareja y estбn encantados con el comportamiento de la familia de la otra naciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Two prominent families, one from our people and one from the %s1_civ_adjective people, have forged an alliance through an arranged %s4_religion_adjective marriage.
TEXT.English: Two prominent families, one from our people and one from the %s1_civ_adjective people, have forged an alliance through an arranged %s4_religion_adjective marriage.
TEXT.French: Deux grandes familles, l'une issue de notre peuple et l'autre %s1:2_civ_adjective, ont forgй une alliance а travers un mariage %s4:1_religion_adjective arrangй.
TEXT.German: Zwei prominente Familien, eine aus unserem Volk und eine aus dem %s1:2_civ_adjective Volk, haben durch eine %s4:3_religion_adjective EheschlieЯung eine internationale Allianz geschmiedet.
TEXT.Italian: Due importanti famiglie, una della nostra gente e una della popolazione %s1_civ_adjective, hanno forgiato un'alleanza attraverso un matrimonio %s4_religion_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Dos familias eminentes, una de nuestro pueblo y otra del pueblo %s1:1_civ_adjective, han forjado una alianza mediante una boda %s4:2_religion_adjective concertada.

TEXT.Russian: One of our prominent young noble ladies has fallen in love with a %s1_civ_adjective nobleman and they are to be wed in the %s4_religion_adjective tradition.
TEXT.English: One of our prominent young noble ladies has fallen in love with a %s1_civ_adjective nobleman and they are to be wed in the %s4_religion_adjective tradition.
TEXT.French: Une jeune fille issue de l'une nos plus illustres familles est tombйe amoureuse d'un noble %s1:1_civ_adjective ; ils doivent se marier dans la religion %s4:2_religion_adjective.
TEXT.German: Eine unserer prominenten jungen Adelsdamen hat sich in einen %s1:2_civ_adjective Edelmann verliebt. Das Paar wird sich in einer %s4:2_religion_adjective Trauungszeremonie das Ja-Wort geben.
TEXT.Italian: Una delle nostre giovani e importanti nobili si и innamorata di un giovane nobile a %s1_civ_adjective e si sposeranno nella tradizione %s4_religion_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Una de nuestras damas de mбs alta alcurnia se ha quedado prendada de un noble %s1:1_civ_adjective, y ambos van a casarse segъn la tradiciуn %s4:2_religion_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: A %s1_civ_adjective industrial heiress has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. Their %s4_religion_adjective wedding will occur this year.
TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective industrial heiress has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. Their %s4_religion_adjective wedding will occur this year.
TEXT.French: L'hйritiиre d'une famille industrielle %s1:2_civ_adjective a reзu une demande en mariage de la part d'un de nos plus importants hommes d'affaires. Leur mariage, cйlйbrй selon la religion %s4:2_religion_adjective, aura lieu cette annйe.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer prominentesten GroЯindustriellen hat einer %s1:2_civ_adjective Industrieerbin einen Heiratsantrag gemacht. Die %s4:3_religion_adjective Trauungszeremonie soll noch in diesem Jahr stattfinden.
TEXT.Italian: Un'ereditiera industriale %s1_civ_adjective ha ricevuto una proposta di matrimonio da uno dei nostri importanti magnati. Il loro matrimonio %s4_religion_adjective sarа celebrato quest'anno.
TEXT.Spanish: Uno de nuestros magnates ha pedido en matrimonio a la heredera de una familia industrial %s1:2_civ_adjective. La boda, que se celebrarб segъn el rito %s4:1_religion_adjective, se espera para este mismo aсo.

TEXT.Russian: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift.
TEXT.English: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift.
TEXT.French: Envoyer nos meilleurs voeux et un modeste cadeau de mariage pour la forme.
TEXT.German: Richtet ihnen unsere besten Wьnsche aus und schickt ein angemessenes Hochzeitsgeschenk.
TEXT.Italian: Invia le congratulazioni e un regalo nuziale simbolico.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se les envнen nuestros mejores deseos y un regalo de bodas simbуlico.

TEXT.Russian: Send hearty congratulations and a generous wedding gift.
TEXT.English: Send hearty congratulations and a generous wedding gift.
TEXT.French: Envoyer nos cordiales fйlicitations et un beau cadeau de mariage.
TEXT.German: Richtet ihnen unsere herzlichsten Glьckwьnsche aus und schickt ein groЯzьgiges Hochzeitsgeschenk.
TEXT.Italian: Invia calorose congratulazioni e un generoso regalo nuziale.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se les envнen nuestras mбs sinceras felicitaciones y un generoso regalo de bodas.

TEXT.Russian: Announce a national celebration, send an outlandish wedding gift and donate generously to religious organizations in the name of the newlyweds.
TEXT.English: Announce a national celebration, send an outlandish wedding gift and donate generously to religious organizations in the name of the newlyweds.
TEXT.French: Annoncer une fкte nationale, envoyer un somptueux cadeau de mariage et faire don d'une gйnйreuse somme d'argent а des organisations religieuses au nom des jeunes mariйs.
TEXT.German: Ruft einen Nationalfeiertag aus, schickt ihnen ein ausgefallenes Hochzeitsgeschenk und entrichtet im Namen der Neuvermдhlten eine groЯzьgige Spende an kirchliche Einrichtungen.
TEXT.Italian: Indici una festa nazionale, invia un esotico regalo nuziale e fai una generosa donazione alle organizzazioni religiose a nome dei novelli sposi.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se declare fiesta nacional, se les envнe un regalo de bodas increнble y se hagan generosas donaciones a instituciones religiosas en nombre de los reciйn casados.

TEXT.Russian: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn no protest from them, and in fact little interest at all. Some family members of the newlyweds are griping but the incident appears to have passed without much bitterness.
TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn no protest from them, and in fact little interest at all. Some family members of the newlyweds are griping but the incident appears to have passed without much bitterness.
TEXT.French: Le mariage %s5:1_religion_adjective d'une de nos citoyennes avec un habitant de l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective n'a entraоnй aucune protestation de leur part, voire un total dйsintйrкt. Certains membres de la famille des jeunes mariйs rouspиtent un peu mais l'incident ne semble pas avoir eu de graves consйquences.
TEXT.German: Die %s5:3_religion_adjective EheschlieЯung zwischen einem unserer Landsleute und einem %s1:2_civ_adjective Bьrger hat keinerlei Proteste auf deren Seite ausgelцst und ist eher auf Desinteresse in der Цffentlichkeit gestoЯen. Einige Familienmitglieder der Neuvermдhlten waren zwar nicht unbedingt begeistert von der Hochzeit, dennoch ist das Ereignis offenbar ohne grцЯere Unstimmigkeiten vonstatten gegangen.
TEXT.Italian: Un matrimonio %s5_religion_adjective tra uno dei nostri cittadini e una dell'impero %s1_civ_adjective non ha attirato alcuna protesta da parte loro e ben poco interesse. Alcuni familiari degli sposi novelli si sono azzuffati, ma l'incidente и stato superato senza troppe amarezze.
TEXT.Spanish: Una boda %s5:2_religion_adjective entre una de nuestras familias y otra %s1:2_civ_adjective no ha suscitado protestas por parte de ese imperio, aunque tampoco ningъn interйs. Algunos familiares de los reciйn casados se han llevado las manos a la cabeza, pero el asunto ha transcurrido sin mayores incidentes.

TEXT.Russian: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn a blessing from them with generous wedding gifts. Our people are pleased by this gesture.
TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has drawn a blessing from them with generous wedding gifts. Our people are pleased by this gesture.
TEXT.French: Le mariage %s5:1_religion_adjective d'une de nos citoyennes avec un habitant de l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective a йtй saluй par l'envoi de gйnйreux cadeaux de mariage. Notre peuple est heureux de ce geste.
TEXT.German: Die %s5:3_religion_adjective EheschlieЯung zwischen einem unserer Landsleute und einem %s1:2_civ_adjective Bьrger wurde von deren Seite mit groЯzьgigen Hochzeitsgeschenken bedacht. Unsere Bьrger freuen sich ьber diese Geste der Zustimmung.
TEXT.Italian: Un matrimonio %s5_religion_adjective tra uno dei nostri cittadini e una dell'impero %s1_civ_adjective ha ottenuto da loro una benedizione e generosi doni nuziali. La nostra gente и compiaciuta dal gesto.
TEXT.Spanish: Un matrimonio %s5:1_religion_adjective entre una de nuestras familias y otra %s1:2_civ_adjective ha sido bendecido por ese imperio con generosos regalos de boda. Nuestro pueblo estб complacido con ese gesto.

TEXT.Russian: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has been honored by a national holiday, including outlandish wedding gifts and donations to our religious institutions. Our people are thrilled by this gesture.
TEXT.English: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has been honored by a national holiday, including outlandish wedding gifts and donations to our religious institutions. Our people are thrilled by this gesture.
TEXT.French: Le mariage %s5:1_religion_adjective d'une de nos citoyennes avec un habitant de l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective a йtй honorй d'une fкte nationale, de l'attribution de somptueux cadeaux de mariage ainsi que d'un don d'argent а nos institutions religieuses. TEXT.Russian: Nobles from a %s4_civ_adjective family are angry with their new %s1_civ_adjective inlaws for holding a %s3_religion_adjective wedding against their wishes. This event has drawn great interest within these nations as feuding has broken out over the dispute.

TEXT.Russian: A politically arranged marriage between one of our noble families and another %s1_civ_adjective family has collapsed over feuding about whether to hold the marriage in their tradition or to make it a %s4_religion_adjective wedding. Tensions are escalating.

TEXT.Russian: Two prominent families are feuding over their children, who eloped together against everybody else's wishes. %s1_civ_adjective leaders are particularly upset that the marriage was held in our %s4_religion_adjective tradition.

TEXT.Russian: An industrial heiress from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has received a marriage proposal from one of our prominent business tycoons. TEXT.Russian: Send well wishes and a token wedding gift, trying not to further anger our neighbors.

TEXT.Russian: A %s5_religion_adjective wedding between one of our citizens and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire has angered our people. Our rivals have granted no special gifts or attention, though, so our people are merely grumbling and fuming.

TEXT.Russian: A collapsed politically arranged wedding and a jilted bride are at the center of new tensions between the %s4_civ_adjective and %s1_civ_adjective Empires.
TEXT.English: A collapsed politically arranged wedding and a jilted bride are at the center of new tensions between the %s4_civ_adjective and %s1_civ_adjective Empires.

TEXT.Russian: A politically arranged marriage between one of our noblemen and a woman from a noble %s1_civ_adjective family has collapsed into feuding as the groom backed out of the wedding on the wedding day.
TEXT.English: A politically arranged marriage between one of our noblemen and a woman from a noble %s1_civ_adjective family has collapsed into feuding as the groom backed out of the wedding on the wedding day.

TEXT.Russian: Two prominent families, one from our people and one from the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, are feuding over their children. A groom, from our family, jilted his would-be bride by walking his cold feet right on out of the temple, insulting and outraging his would-be inlaws.

TEXT.Russian: An %s1_civ_adjective industrial heiress has been left at the altar by one of our prominent business tycoons, who had proposed marriage to her. The fiasco has outraged the families on both sides, who are now feuding over the collapsed marriage.

TEXT.Russian: Send condolences to both families and urge them to seek a peaceful resolution to their grievances.

TEXT.Spanish: La erupciуn de un volcбn cercano a %s2_city ha devastado el campo. Por suerte, la propia ciudad %s1:2_civ_adjective se ha salvado.

TEXT.Russian: The earth has spewed forth lava and ash from a previously dormant volcano near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.English: The earth has spewed forth lava and ash from a previously dormant volcano near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un volcan jusqu'ici endormi a crachй de la lave et des cendres prиs de la ville %s1:2_civ_adjective de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein bislang inaktiver Vulkan in der Nдhe der %s1:2_civ_adjective Stadt %s2_city hat Lava und Asche gespien.
TEXT.Italian: La terra ha eruttato lava e ceneri da un vulcano addormentato vicino alla cittа %s1_civ_adjective di %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: La tierra ha escupido lava y cenizas por un volcбn que antes estaba inactivo en la ciudad %s1:2_civ_adjective de %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: A volcano has erupted near %s2_city, spewing deadly ash clouds, lava flows, and mud- and debris-filled snow melts.
TEXT.English: A volcano has erupted near %s2_city, spewing deadly ash clouds, lava flows, and mud- and debris-filled snow melts.
TEXT.French: Un volcan est entrй en йruption prиs de %s2_city, crachant des nuages de cendre, des coulйes de lave et de la neige mкlйe de boue et de dйbris.
TEXT.German: In der Nдhe der Stadt %s2_city hat es einen Vulkanausbruch gegeben, der tцdliche Aschewolken, Lavaflьsse sowie stark verschmutzte Schneeschmelzen mit sich brachte.
TEXT.Italian: Un vulcano ha eruttato vicino a %s2_city, vomitando letali nuvole di cenere, lava e causando inondazioni di neve sciolta mista a fango e detriti.
TEXT.Spanish: Un volcбn ha entrado en erupciуn cerca de %s2_city, escupiendo mortнferas nubes de ceniza, rнos de lava y barro y lluvias de rocas.

TEXT.Russian: Send what aid we can to the survivors. Be thankful that the city itself was not struck.
TEXT.English: Send what aid we can to the survivors. Be thankful that the city itself was not struck.
TEXT.French: Envoyer toute l'aide que nous pouvons aux survivants. Remercions le ciel que la ville ait йtй йpargnйe.
TEXT.German: Die Ьberlebenden sollen jede nur mцgliche Hilfe bekommen. Wir sollten dankbar sein, dass die Stadt selbst verschont geblieben ist.
TEXT.Italian: Invia gli aiuti disponibili ai sopravvissuti. Sii contento che la cittа non sia stata colpita.
TEXT.Spanish: Enviad cuanta ayuda podamos a los supervivientes. Demos gracias de que la propia ciudad no se haya visto afectada.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the eruption
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the eruption
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Subir des pertes d'amйnagements sur les cases proches de l'йruption
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verlust der Gelдndefeld-Modernisierungen in der Nдhe der Eruption
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Perdita dei miglioramenti delle caselle vicino all'eruzione
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Pйrdida de mejoras de casillas cerca de la erupciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Excessive farming with poor techniques has led to soil erosion and a dustbowl effect in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.English: Excessive farming with poor techniques has led to soil erosion and a dustbowl effect in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.French: Une culture intensive pratiquйe avec des techniques de piиtre qualitй a provoquй l'йrosion des sols et l'apparition de tempкtes de poussiиre dans l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Durch ьbermдЯige Feldbebauung unter Einsatz rьckstдndiger Techniken sind im %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich Bodenerosionen und Trockenheit aufgetreten.
TEXT.Italian: Una coltivazione eccessiva con tecniche non adeguate ha portato all'erosione del suolo e alla desertificazione nell'impero %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Una agricultura intensiva con tйcnicas inadecuadas ha llevado a la erosiуn de la tierra y a la desertizaciуn en el imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective farmers continue to suffer loss of their land due to ongoing dust storms sweeping across the plains.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective farmers continue to suffer loss of their land due to ongoing dust storms sweeping across the plains.
TEXT.French: Les fermiers %s1:3_civ_adjective continuent de subir des pertes en raison des tempкtes de poussiиre qui balayent les plaines.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:3_civ_adjective Bauern verlieren wegen der anhaltenden Staubstьrme, die ьber die Ebenen hinwegfegen, weiterhin Felder.
TEXT.Italian: Gli agricoltori %s1_civ_adjective continuano a perdere terra a causa delle continue tempeste di sabbia che spazzano le pianure.
TEXT.Spanish: Los agricultores %s1:3_civ_adjective siguen sufriendo pйrdidas de tierra debido a las crecientes tormentas de arena que azotan la llanura.

TEXT.Russian: Excessive tilling of the soil on the open plains has caused massive wind erosion and created a dustbowl effect, complete with dust storms.
TEXT.English: Excessive tilling of the soil on the open plains has caused massive wind erosion and created a dustbowl effect, complete with dust storms.
TEXT.French: Le labourage excessif des plaines a provoquй une йrosion massive et l'apparition de tempкtes de poussiиre.
TEXT.German: Aufgrund ьbermдЯiger Feldbebauung auf den offenen Ebenen sind massive Winderosionen, Trockenheit und Staubstьrme aufgetreten.
TEXT.Italian: Un'eccessiva coltivazione del suolo delle pianure ha portato all'erosione eolica e, di conseguenza, alla desertificazione con tanto di tempeste di sabbia.
TEXT.Spanish: Una explotaciуn excesiva del suelo de las llanuras abiertas ha provocado la erosiуn por acciуn del viento y la desertizaciуn, coronadas con tormentas de arena.

TEXT.Russian: The dustbowl effect continues. Another of our Farms has been wiped out by soil loss and by farmers abandoning their steads.
TEXT.English: The dustbowl effect continues. Another of our Farms has been wiped out by soil loss and by farmers abandoning their steads.
TEXT.French: Les tempкtes de poussiиre continuent de sйvir. Une nouvelle ferme a dы cesser ses activitйs suite а la perte de terres cultivables et а l'exil des agriculteurs.
TEXT.German: Die Trockenheit dauert an. Ein weiterer unserer Bauernhцfe wurde durch den Ackerverlust und abwandernde Bauern ausgelцscht.
TEXT.Italian: La desertificazione continua. Un'altra delle nostre fattorie и stata distrutta a causa delle perdita di terreno e del successivo abbandono degli agricoltori.
TEXT.Spanish: La desertizaciуn prosigue. Otra de nuestras granjas ha sido afectada por la pйrdida de tierras y los granjeros han tenido que emigrar.

TEXT.Russian: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to figure out how to mitigate the erosion of the soil and end the dust storms.
TEXT.English: We need that food. Do whatever it takes to figure out how to mitigate the erosion of the soil and end the dust storms.
TEXT.French: Nous avons besoin de cette nourriture. Faire le nйcessaire pour dйcouvrir un moyen d'attйnuer l'йrosion du sol et mettre un terme aux tempкtes de poussiиre.
TEXT.German: Wir brauchen die Nahrungsmittel von diesen Feldern. Tut, was immer nцtig ist, um herauszufinden, wie wir die Bodenerosionen aufhalten und den Staubstьrmen ein Ende bereiten kцnnen.
TEXT.Italian: Abbiamo bisogno di quel cibo. Fai quanto necessario per capire come mitigare l'erosione del suolo e porre fine alle tempeste di sabbia.
TEXT.Spanish: Necesitamos esos alimentos. Haced todo lo necesario para descubrir cуmo paliar la erosiуn del suelo y acabar con las tormentas de arena.

TEXT.Russian: We cannot afford to spend gold on this problem. Leave the matter to the local authorities.
TEXT.English: We cannot afford to spend gold on this problem. Leave the matter to the local authorities.
TEXT.French: Nous n'avons pas d'or а consacrer а ce problиme. Laisser les autoritйs locales s'en occuper.
TEXT.German: Wir kцnnen es uns nicht leisten, Geld fьr dieses Problem auszugeben. Ьberlassen wir die Sache den цrtlichen Behцrden.
TEXT.Italian: Non possiamo spendere denaro per questo problema. Lascia che del problema si occupino le autoritа locali.
TEXT.Spanish: No podemos permitirnos el lujo de invertir oro en este problema. Dejad el asunto en manos de las autoridades locales.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Significant chance the dustbowl will continue
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Significant chance the dustbowl will continue
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Risque important de voir les tempкtes de poussiиre continuer.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Es besteht eine hohe Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass die Trockenheit anhдlt.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]C'и una seria possibilitа che la desertificazione continui
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grandes posibilidades de que continъen las tormentas de arena.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling caged parrots as exotic pets.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling caged parrots as exotic pets.
TEXT.French: Des marchands %s1:3_civ_adjective vendent des perroquets en cage comme animaux de compagnie exotiques.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Hдndler verkaufen nun in Kдfigen gehaltene Papageien als exotische Haustiere.
TEXT.Italian: I mercanti %s1_civ_adjective vendono pappagalli in gabbia come animali esotici da compagnia.
TEXT.Spanish: Los mercaderes %s1:3_civ_adjective estбn vendiendo Loros en jaulas como mascotas exуticas.

TEXT.Russian: Tamers have figured out how to farm the abundant supply of parrots within one of our tropical forest regions.
TEXT.English: Tamers have figured out how to farm the abundant supply of parrots within one of our tropical forest regions.
TEXT.French: Des dresseurs ont trouvй le moyen d'exploiter l'abondante source de perroquets dont nous disposons dans une de nos rйgions tropicales.
TEXT.German: Tierbдndiger haben herausgefunden, wie man in einer unserer Tropenwaldregionen umfangreiche Papageienbestдnde zьchten kann.
TEXT.Italian: I domatori hanno capito come sfruttare l'abbondanza di pappagalli in una delle nostre regioni di foreste tropicali.
TEXT.Spanish: Los cuidadores de animales han descubierto cуmo aprovechar el abundante suministro de loros de una de nuestras regiones tropicales.

TEXT.Russian: Parrots make fine pets. We should promote them as one of our trade goods.
TEXT.English: Parrots make fine pets. We should promote them as one of our trade goods.
TEXT.French: Les perroquets font de bons animaux de compagnie. Nous devrions en faire le commerce.
TEXT.German: Papageien sind nette Haustiere. Wir sollten sie als Handelsware nutzen.
TEXT.Italian: I pappagalli sono buoni animali da compagnia. Dovremmo promuoverli come uno dei nostri beni commerciali.
TEXT.Spanish: Los loros son buenas mascotas. Debemos promocionarlos como una de nuestras mercancнas de intercambio.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling jade carvings in small quantities.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling jade carvings in small quantities.
TEXT.French: Des marchands %s1:3_civ_adjective vendent de petites quantitйs de sculptures en jade.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Hдndler verkaufen nun kleinere Mengen von Jadeschnitzereien.
TEXT.Italian: I mercanti %s1_civ_adjective vendono piccole quantitа di giada intagliata.
TEXT.Spanish: Los mercaderes %s1:3_civ_adjective estбn vendiendo tallas de jade en pequeсas cantidades.

TEXT.Russian: A rich source of jade has been found amongst the veins of iron at one of our mines.
TEXT.English: A rich source of jade has been found amongst the veins of iron at one of our mines.
TEXT.French: Une source importante de jade a йtй dйcouverte parmi les veines de fer d'une de nos mines.
TEXT.German: In den Eisenadern einer unserer Minen wurde ein reiches Jadevorkommen entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: Tra i filoni di ferro, in una delle nostre miniere, и stata trovata una ricca fonte di giada.
TEXT.Spanish: En una de nuestras minas se ha encontrado un rico filуn de jade entre las vetas de hierro.

TEXT.Russian: We can sell the precious jade for additional profit.
TEXT.English: We can sell the precious jade for additional profit.
TEXT.French: Nous pourrions vendre ce prйcieux jade pour accroоtre nos profits.
TEXT.German: Wir kцnnen wertvolle Jade verkaufen, um zusдtzliche Gewinne zu erwirtschaften.
TEXT.Italian: Possiamo vendere la preziosa giada e guadagnare qualcosa in piщ.
TEXT.Spanish: Podemos vender el preciado jade para beneficiarnos un poco.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling black pearls in larger quantities.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling black pearls in larger quantities.
TEXT.French: Des marchands %s1:3_civ_adjective vendent des perles noires en grande quantitй.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Hдndler verkaufen nun grцЯere Mengen von schwarzen Perlen.
TEXT.Italian: I mercanti %s1_civ_adjective vendono maggiori quantitа di perle nere.
TEXT.Spanish: Los mercaderes %s1:3_civ_adjective estбn vendiendo perlas negras en grandes cantidades.

TEXT.Russian: Locals have figured out a way to obtain a higher yield of black pearls. They are guarding their secret with great care.
TEXT.English: Locals have figured out a way to obtain a higher yield of black pearls. They are guarding their secret with great care.
TEXT.French: Certains marchands ont trouvй le moyen d'obtenir une plus grande production de perles noires. Ils gardent farouchement leur secret.
TEXT.German: Die Einheimischen haben einen Weg gefunden, mehr schwarze Perlen zu zьchten, aber sie hьten ihr Geheimnis sehr sorgsam.
TEXT.Italian: I locali hanno scoperto come ottenere un maggiore raccolto di perle nere. Mantengono il segreto con molta cura.
TEXT.Spanish: Los lugareсos han encontrado una manera de sacar mбs provecho de las perlas negras. Guardan con mucho celo su secreto.

TEXT.Russian: Let them keep the secret. We are happy enough to tax their higher profits.
TEXT.English: Let them keep the secret. We are happy enough to tax their higher profits.
TEXT.French: Qu'ils gardent leur secret ! Contentons-nous de taxer leurs profits.
TEXT.German: Sollen sie ihr Geheimnis fьr sich behalten. Uns reichen die Ertrдge, die wir aus der Besteuerung ihrer hцheren Gewinne erwirtschaften.
TEXT.Italian: Lasciamo che se lo tengano. Ci accontenteremo delle tasse provenienti dai loro maggiori profitti.
TEXT.Spanish: Que guarden el secreto. Nos contentaremos con gravar sus beneficios, ahora mayores.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling gunpowder in larger quantities.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling gunpowder in larger quantities.
TEXT.French: Des marchands %s1:3_civ_adjective vendent de la poudre а canon en grande quantitй.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Hдndler verkaufen nun grцЯere Mengen von SchieЯpulver.
TEXT.Italian: I mercanti %s1_civ_adjective vendono maggiori quantitа di polvere da sparo.
TEXT.Spanish: Los mercaderes %s1:3_civ_adjective estбn vendiendo pуlvora en grandes cantidades.

TEXT.Russian: Our bat herds in the hills near %s2_city, legendary in quantity, are now providing us surplus sources of saltpeter for use in gunpowder.
TEXT.English: Our bat herds in the hills near %s2_city, legendary in quantity, are now providing us surplus sources of saltpeter for use in gunpowder.
TEXT.French: Nos йlevages de chauves-souris situйs prиs de %s2_city se dйveloppent massivement et nous fournissent dйsormais une source supplйmentaire de salpкtre utilisable comme poudre а canon.
TEXT.German: Unsere legendдren Fledermauskolonien in den Hьgeln nahe der Stadt %s2_city verschaffen uns zusдtzliche Salpeterertrдge fьr die Produktion von SchieЯpulver.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri stormi di pipistrelli nelle colline vicine a %s2_city, leggendari per il loro numero, ci forniscono fonti extra di salnitro, da usare nella polvere da sparo.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestras bandadas de murciйlagos de las montaсas cercanas a %s2_city, legendarias en cantidad, nos estбn proporcionando un excedente de salitre para emplear en pуlvora.

TEXT.Russian: Our ability to manufacture large amounts of gunpowder should prove lucrative.
TEXT.English: Our ability to manufacture large amounts of gunpowder should prove lucrative.
TEXT.French: Notre capacitй а fabriquer de grandes quantitйs de poudre а canon devrait s'avйrer lucrative.
TEXT.German: Dass wir nun groЯe Mengen SchieЯpulver herstellen kцnnen, sollte sich als profitabel erweisen.
TEXT.Italian: La nostra capacitа di produrre grandi quantitа di polvere da sparo dovrebbe rivelarsi redditizia.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestra capacidad de manufacturar grandes cantidades de pуlvora nos serб muy lucrativa.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] in %d1 additional [NUM1:plot:plots]

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are offering discounts on tons of their clunker coal, which is filled with impurities.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are offering discounts on tons of their clunker coal, which is filled with impurities.
TEXT.French: Des marchands %s1:3_civ_adjective proposent des rйductions sur des tonnes de charbon chargй d'impuretйs.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Hдndler gewдhren auf jede Tonne ihrer minderwertigen, ziemlich verunreinigten Kohle einen Nachlass.
TEXT.Italian: I mercanti %s1_civ_adjective stanno facendo sconti sul loro carbone di scarto, che и pieno di impuritа.
TEXT.Spanish: Los mercaderes %s1:3_civ_adjective estбn ofreciendo descuentos por la compra al por mayor de carbуn de turba, que estб lleno de impurezas.

TEXT.Russian: Most of the coal being mined from one of our sites is thick with rock, shale, and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of clunker coal!
TEXT.English: Most of the coal being mined from one of our sites is thick with rock, shale, and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of clunker coal!
TEXT.French: La majeure partie du charbon extrait de l'un de nos sites est chargй d'argile, de cailloux et autres impuretйs. Nous ne savons pas quoi faire de ce charbon impur !
TEXT.German: Der grцЯte Teil der Kohle, die in einer unserer Minen abgebaut wird, ist mit Gerцll, Schiefer und anderen Verunreinigungen durchsetzt. Wir sitzen auf einem Vorkommen minderwertiger Kohle!
TEXT.Italian: La maggior parte del carbone estratto da una delle nostre miniere и pieno di roccia, scisto e altre impuritа. Ci и capitata una fonte di carbone di scarto!
TEXT.Spanish: La mayor parte del carbуn extraнdo de uno de nuestros emplazamientos estб lleno de roca, esquisto y otras impurezas. ¡Hemos dado con un filуn de carbуn de turba!

TEXT.Russian: Clunker coal? What a mess. Less valuable per ton, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.
TEXT.English: Clunker coal? What a mess. Less valuable per ton, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.
TEXT.French: Du charbon impur ? Ah, zut. Bon d'accord, il a moins de valeur, mais il brыle, non ? Vendez-le !
TEXT.German: Minderwertige Kohle? Wie дrgerlich! Sie ist zwar weniger wert, aber sie brennt immerhin, oder nicht? Da kann man nichts machen.
TEXT.Italian: Carbone di scarto? Che disastro. Ha un valore unitario piщ basso, ma brucia comunque, no? Pensaci tu.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Carbуn de turba? Quй desastre. Bueno, cada tonelada vale menos, pero sigue quemando, ¿no? Tendremos que conformarnos.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are offering discounts on barrels of their sour crude oil, which is filled with impurities.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are offering discounts on barrels of their sour crude oil, which is filled with impurities.
TEXT.French: Les marchands %s1:3_civ_adjective proposent des rйductions sur des tonnes de pйtrole brut acide, infestй d'impuretйs.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Hдndler gewдhren auf jedes Fass ihres minderwertigen, ziemlich verunreinigten Rohцls einen Nachlass.
TEXT.Italian: I mercanti %s1_civ_adjective stanno facendo sconti sul loro petrolio grezzo, che и pieno di impuritа.
TEXT.Spanish: Los mercaderes %s1:3_civ_adjective estбn ofreciendo descuentos por la compra al por mayor de crudo бcido, que estб lleno de impurezas.

TEXT.Russian: Most of the crude oil being pumped from one of our sites is thick with sulfur and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of sour crude!
TEXT.English: Most of the crude oil being pumped from one of our sites is thick with sulfur and other impurities. We are stuck with a source of sour crude!
TEXT.French: La majeure partie du pйtrole extrait de l'un de nos sites est chargйe de sulfure et autres impuretйs. Nous ne savons pas quoi faire de ce pйtrole brut acide !
TEXT.German: Der grцЯte Teil des Rohцls, das in einer unserer Produktionsstдtten gefцrdert wird, ist mit Schwefel und anderen Verunreinigungen durchsetzt. Wir sitzen auf einem Vorkommen minderwertigen Rohцls!
TEXT.Italian: Gran parte del petrolio estratto da uno dei nostri pozzi и denso di zolfo e altre impuritа. Ci и capitata una fonte di petrolio impuro!
TEXT.Spanish: Todo el petrуleo en crudo que bombeamos estб lleno de azufre y otras impurezas. ¡Hemos dado con un depуsito de crudo бcido!

TEXT.Russian: Sour crude? What a mess. Less valuable per barrel, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.
TEXT.English: Sour crude? What a mess. Less valuable per barrel, but it still burns, right? Just deal with it.
TEXT.French: Du pйtrole brut acide ? Ah, zut. Bon d'accord, il a moins de valeur, mais il brыle, non ? Vendez-le !
TEXT.German: Minderwertiges Rohцl? Wie дrgerlich! Es ist zwar weniger wert, aber es brennt immerhin, oder nicht? Da kann man nichts machen.
TEXT.Italian: Petrolio impuro? Che disastro. Ha un valore unitario piщ basso, ma brucia comunque, no? Pensaci tu.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Crudo бcido? Quй desastre. Bueno, cada barril vale menos, pero sigue quemando, ¿no? Tendremos que conformarnos.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective people are bragging about their truffles, claiming they are the most delicious in the world.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective people are bragging about their truffles, claiming they are the most delicious in the world.
TEXT.French: Les %s1:3_civ_adjective se vantent de leurs truffes, allant jusqu'а prйtendre qu'elles sont les plus dйlicieuses au monde.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Bьrger brьsten sich mit ihren Trьffeln und behaupten, sie seien die schmackhaftesten der Welt.
TEXT.Italian: La popolazione %s1_civ_adjective si vanta dei propri tartufi, che decanta come i piщ deliziosi al mondo.
TEXT.Spanish: El pueblo %s1:1_civ_adjective se vanagloria de sus Trufas y dice que son las mбs ricas del mundo.

TEXT.Russian: A rich source of truffles has been discovered in a series of caves. The locals have begun to farm them.
TEXT.English: A rich source of truffles has been discovered in a series of caves. The locals have begun to farm them.
TEXT.French: Une source importante de truffes a йtй dйcouverte dans plusieurs cavernes. Les agriculteurs locaux ont commencй а les cultiver.
TEXT.German: In einer Reihe von Hцhlen sind reiche Trьffelvorkommen entdeckt worden. Die Einheimischen haben mit der Ernte begonnen.
TEXT.Italian: И stata scoperta in alcune caverne una zona ricca di tartufi. I locali hanno cominciato a coltivarli.
TEXT.Spanish: Se ha descubierto una gran fuente de Trufas en una serie de cuevas. Los lugareсos han empezado a cultivarlas.

TEXT.Russian: Truffles! How delicious. Our people eat richly, do they not?
TEXT.English: Truffles! How delicious. Our people eat richly, do they not?
TEXT.French: Des truffes ? Quel dйlice ! Nos citoyens mangent copieusement, n'est-ce pas ?
TEXT.German: Trьffel! Wie kцstlich! Unsere Bьrger ernдhren sich wirklich reichhaltig, nicht wahr?
TEXT.Italian: Tartufi! Che delizia. La nostra gente mangia bene, non и vero?

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective people are now harvesting sea turtles on an annual basis.

TEXT.Russian: The locals have figured out the mating cycles of the sea turtles who flock to the shore in massive quantities. They have begun to harvest the turtles and eggs, in a way that does not endanger the long term survival of the creatures.
TEXT.English: The locals have figured out the mating cycles of the sea turtles who flock to the shore in massive quantities. They have begun to harvest the turtles and eggs, in a way that does not endanger the long term survival of the creatures.

TEXT.German: Die Einheimischen haben die Paarungszyklen der Seeschildkrцten erforscht, die sich in Scharen an der Kьste einfinden. Sie haben damit begonnen, die Schildkrцten und ihre Eier zu "ernten", ohne das langfristige Ьberleben der Tiere zu gefдhrden.

TEXT.Russian: Turtles! What will they think of next?

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has become the world's leading producer of tin.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective merchants are now selling domesticated prairie dogs as exotic pets.

TEXT.Russian: A new art form involving the carving of large blocks of ice has been created in the icy tundra near the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.

TEXT.Russian: A %s1_civ_adjective folk hero has caused the creation of a new forest of apple trees.

TEXT.Russian: We are glad to see that the local culture is thriving.

TEXT.German: Wegen der Unterschlagung von Firmengeldern in unserer Kapitalgesellschaft [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s11_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] ist der Aktienwert der Firma rapide gefallen. Der gesamte Markt ist eingebrochen und das hat eine weltweite Wirtschaftskrise ausgelцst.

TEXT.Spanish: El fraude de nuestra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s11_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] ha hecho bajar en picado la cotizaciуn de sus acciones, ha arrastrado tras de sн al resto del mercado y ha desencadenando una recesiуn econуmica mundial.

TEXT.Russian: There is really not much we can do about this, is there?
TEXT.English: There is really not much we can do about this, is there?
TEXT.French: Il n'y a pas grand-chose а faire, si ?
TEXT.German: Dagegen kцnnen wir nicht wirklich viel unternehmen, oder?
TEXT.Italian: Non c'и molto che possiamo fare, non и vero?
TEXT.Spanish: No es que podamos hacer gran cosa, ¿verdad?

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]All nations in the world suffer the loss of %d1%% their national treasury.
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All nations in the world suffer the loss of %d1%% their national treasury.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Toutes les nations du monde subiront une perte de %d1%% de leur trйsor national.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective ships and planes have disappeared without a trace in the Bermuda Triangle!
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective ships and planes have disappeared without a trace in the Bermuda Triangle!
TEXT.French: Des navires et des avions %s1:3_civ_adjective ont disparu dans le triangle des Bermudes sans laisser de trace !
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Schiffe und Flugzeuge sind spurlos im Bermuda-Dreieck verschwunden!
TEXT.Italian: Navi e aerei %s1_civ_adjective sono spariti senza lasciare traccia nel Triangolo delle Bermuda!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡En el Triбngulo de las Bermudas han desaparecido barcos y aviones %s1:3_civ_adjective sin dejar ni rastro!

TEXT.Russian: On a sunny day, with no storms in sight, one of our vessels has been lost at sea. Not only is the cause unknown, but there is no trace whatsoever of the ship or its crew or cargo. Several smaller vessels and some airplanes in the same general region also have vanished without a trace. Rumors are flying concerning this mystery. This region has been dubbed by the press as the Bermuda Triangle, named after a small island nearby.
TEXT.English: On a sunny day, with no storms in sight, one of our vessels has been lost at sea. Not only is the cause unknown, but there is no trace whatsoever of the ship or its crew or cargo. Several smaller vessels and some airplanes in the same general region also have vanished without a trace. Rumors are flying concerning this mystery. This region has been dubbed by the press as the Bermuda Triangle, named after a small island nearby.
TEXT.French: Par une journйe ensoleillйe, sans aucune tempкte а l'horizon, un de nos navires a disparu en mer. Non seulement nous en ignorons la cause, mais il n'y a aucune trace du navire, ni de son йquipage, ni de sa cargaison. Plusieurs petits bateaux et quelques avions ont йgalement disparu dans la rйgion. Ce mystиre alimente dйsormais de nombreuses rumeurs et la rйgion a йtй surnommйe "le triangle des Bermudes" par la presse, d'aprиs le nom d'une petite оle voisine.
TEXT.German: Eins unserer Schiffe ist an einem sonnigen, wolkenlosen Tag auf hoher See verschollen. Es gibt weder eine offensichtliche Ursache dafьr noch die kleinste Spur von dem Schiff, seiner Besatzung oder seiner Ladung. In der gleichen Region sind bereits mehrere kleinere Schiffe und Flugzeuge spurlos verschwunden. Um dieses Mysterium ranken sich zahllose Geschichten und Gerьchte. Die Medien haben die Region nach einer kleinen Insel in der nдheren Umgebung das "Bermuda-Dreieck" getauft.
TEXT.Italian: In un giorno di sole, senza alcuna tempesta in vista, и scomparso uno dei nostri vascelli. Non solo la causa и sconosciuta, ma non c'и alcuna traccia della nave, dell'equipaggio o del carico. Diversi altri vascelli piщ piccoli e alcuni aeroplani sono anch'essi spariti in quella regione senza lasciare traccia. Molti parlano di questo mistero. La regione и stata chiamata il Triangolo delle Bermuda, per il nome di un'isola nelle vicinanze.
TEXT.Spanish: Uno de nuestros navнos ha desaparecido en el mar un dнa soleado sin ninguna tormenta a la vista. No solo se desconoce la causa de la desapariciуn, sino que, ademбs, no hay ni rastro de la tripulaciуn ni de la carga. Tambiйn han desaparecido sin dejar ni rastro en esa misma regiуn varios pequeсos navнos y aeroplanos. Se han disparado los rumores relativos a este misterio. La prensa ha apodado a esta zona "el Triбngulo de las Bermudas", debido a un islote que se encuentra cerca.

TEXT.Russian: Our investigations have turned up no worthwhile results? This is most peculiar.
TEXT.English: Our investigations have turned up no worthwhile results? This is most peculiar.
TEXT.French: Nos enquкtes n'ont donnй aucun rйsultat ? C'est plutфt curieux.
TEXT.German: Unsere Untersuchungen haben keinerlei Ergebnisse erbracht? Das ist hцchst sonderbar.
TEXT.Italian: Le nostre indagini non hanno dato alcun risultato valido? Molto strano.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Nuestra investigaciуn no ha arrojado resultados dignos de menciуn? Esto es muy raro.

TEXT.Russian: A patron of knowledge from the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city has donated a cache of rare writings to the local Library.

TEXT.Russian: Disperse the writing to our researchers so that we may obtain some immediate benefit.

TEXT.Russian: We applaud the accomplishments of our revered grand master blacksmith.

TEXT.English: The Market in %s2_city has attracted a number of prominent money changers and is becoming renowned for its dealings involving foreign currency.

TEXT.Russian: A master bowyer has developed techniques that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective war bows.

TEXT.Russian: A master smith has developed improved horseshoes, boosting the chance for %s1_civ_adjective mounted units to strike and then escape.
TEXT.English: A master smith has developed improved horseshoes, boosting the chance for %s1_civ_adjective mounted units to strike and then escape.
TEXT.French: Un maоtre marйchal-ferrant a dйveloppй de nouveaux fers permettant aux unitйs de cavalerie %s1:4_civ_adjectiv de fuir plus facilement aprиs une attaque.

TEXT.Russian: A champion unit has emerged from the war games conducted by the %s1_civ_adjective military. This unit is rumored to be the strongest and toughest amongst all their forces.

TEXT.Italian: Dalle manovre di guerra condotte dall'esercito %s1_civ_adjective и emersa un'unitа campione. Si dice che questa unitа sia la piщ forte e tenace delle loro forze.
TEXT.Spanish: Ha aparecido una unidad campeona de las olimpiadas militares llevadas a cabo por el ejйrcito %s1:1_civ_adjective. Se rumorea que esa unidad es la mбs fuerte y resistente de todos sus efectivos.

TEXT.Russian: Our military leaders have held internal war games to strengthen our training and grit. One unit has emerged as the champion.
TEXT.English: Our military leaders have held internal war games to strengthen our training and grit. One unit has emerged as the champion.
TEXT.French: Nos chefs militaires ont organisй des jeux de guerre pour renforcer notre entraоnement et notre courage. Une unitй en est sortie championne.
TEXT.German: Unsere Militдrfьhrer haben interne Kriegsspiele veranstaltet, um unseren Mut und unsere Entschlossenheit zu stдrken. Eine Einheit wurde zur Meistereinheit ausgebildet.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri leader militari hanno tenuto delle manovre di guerra per migliorare addestramento e grinta. Un'unitа si и rivelata campione.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros lнderes del ejйrcito han celebrado unas olimpiadas militares para reforzar el entrenamiento y los arrestos patrios. Una unidad se ha proclamado campeona.

TEXT.Russian: Decorate our champions! We shall celebrate their achievement.
TEXT.English: Decorate our champions! We shall celebrate their achievement.
TEXT.French: Dйcorer nos champions ! Nous allons cйlйbrer leurs exploits.
TEXT.German: Verleiht unseren Meistereinheiten eine Auszeichnung! Wir sollten ihre Leistungen gebьhrend feiern.
TEXT.Italian: Premiamo i nostri campioni! Festeggeremo la loro impresa.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Condecorad a nuestros campeones! Debemos celebrar sus logros.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Our %s1_unit will gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2_promotion[COLOR_REVERT] promotion
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Our %s1_unit will gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s2_promotion[COLOR_REVERT] promotion

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective chemists have developed an advanced refinement process for motor oil.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective chemists have developed an advanced refinement process for motor oil.
TEXT.French: Des chimistes %s1:3_civ_adjective ont dйveloppй un procйdй de raffinage amйliorй pour l'huile de moteur.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Chemiker haben ein verbessertes Raffinierungsverfahren fьr Motorцl entwickelt.
TEXT.Italian: I chimici %s1_civ_adjective hanno sviluppato un processo avanzato per la raffinazione dell'olio motore.
TEXT.Spanish: Los quнmicos %s1:3_civ_adjective han desarrollado un proceso de refinado avanzado para el aceite de motores.

TEXT.Russian: Our chemists have developed an improved motor oil that lasts longer and lubricates engines better.
TEXT.English: Our chemists have developed an improved motor oil that lasts longer and lubricates engines better.
TEXT.French: Nos chimistes ont dйveloppй une huile de moteur amйliorйe qui dure plus longtemps et lubrifie mieux les moteurs.
TEXT.German: Unsere Chemiker haben ein verbessertes Motorцl entwickelt, das lдnger hдlt und die Motoren besser schmiert.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri chimici hanno sviluppato un olio motore migliorato che dura di piщ e lubrifica meglio i motori.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros quнmicos han desarrollado un aceite para motores avanzado que dura mбs y lubrica mejor.

TEXT.Russian: Authorize the selling of the improved motor oil on the open market.
TEXT.English: Authorize the selling of the improved motor oil on the open market.
TEXT.French: Autoriser la vente sur le marchй de cette nouvelle huile de moteur.
TEXT.German: Autorisiert den Verkauf des verbesserten Motorцls fьr den freien Markt.
TEXT.Italian: Autorizza la vendita dell'olio motore migliorato sul libero mercato.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se autorice la venta en el mercado libre del aceite para motores avanzado.

TEXT.Russian: Fund upgrades to our army's vehicle fleet to make use of the new formula.
TEXT.English: Fund upgrades to our army's vehicle fleet to make use of the new formula.
TEXT.French: Financer la modernisation de notre flotte de vйhicules militaires afin de profiter de cette nouvelle formule.
TEXT.German: Finanziert die Modernisierung unserer militдrischen Fahrzeugflotte, damit wir die Neuentwicklung nutzen kцnnen.

TEXT.Spanish: Que se financie la modernizaciуn de nuestra flotilla de vehнculos militares para que pueda aprovechar la nueva fуrmula.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective economists have developed advanced economic theory pertaining to inflation costs.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective economists have developed advanced economic theory pertaining to inflation costs.
TEXT.French: Des йconomistes %s1:3_civ_adjective ont dйveloppй une nouvelle thйorie relative aux coыts d'inflation.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Wirtschaftswissenschaftler haben eine verbesserte Wirtschaftstheorie in Bezug auf Inflationskosten entwickelt.
