TEXT.Spanish: Los economistas %s1:3_civ_adjective han desarrollado una teorнa econуmica avanzada relativa a los costes de la inflaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Our economists have devised a system of regulating interest rates to help normalize economic growth.
TEXT.English: Our economists have devised a system of regulating interest rates to help normalize economic growth.
TEXT.French: Nos йconomistes ont trouvй un systиme de rйgulation des taux d'intйrкt qui favorise la normalisation de la croissance йconomique.
TEXT.German: Unsere Wirtschaftswissenschaftler haben ein System zur Regulierung der Zinssдtze fьr die Normalisierung des Wirtschaftswachstums entwickelt.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri economisti hanno ideato un sistema per la regolazione dei tassi di interesse che aiuta a normalizzare la crescita economica.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros economistas han ingeniado un sistema de regulaciуn de los tipos de interйs para ayudar a normalizar el crecimiento econуmico.

TEXT.Russian: Let the free market make use of these techniques.
TEXT.English: Let the free market make use of these techniques.
TEXT.French: Introduire ces nouvelles techniques dans l'йconomie de marchй.
TEXT.German: Stellt diese Techniken fьr den freien Markt zur Verfьgung.
TEXT.Italian: Lascia che il libero mercato faccia uso di queste tecniche.
TEXT.Spanish: Permitamos que el mercado libre haga uso de estas tйcnicas.

TEXT.Russian: Fund a national Federal Reserve Bank to carry out the new policy.
TEXT.English: Fund a national Federal Reserve Bank to carry out the new policy.
TEXT.French: Financer une banque de rйserve nationale pour conduire cette nouvelle politique.
TEXT.German: Finanziert eine nationale Zentralbank, um das neue Verfahren anwenden zu kцnnen.
TEXT.Italian: Finanzia la Banca Nazionale affinchй applichi la nuova politica.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se funde un Banco de la Reserva Federal nacional para llevar a cabo la nueva polнtica.

TEXT.Russian: Motivated by freedom and quality of life in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, the power company workers restore electricity outages rapidly, making the citizens there even happier.
TEXT.English: Motivated by freedom and quality of life in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire, the power company workers restore electricity outages rapidly, making the citizens there even happier.
TEXT.French: Motivйs par la libertй et la qualitй de vie dans l'empire %s1:1_civ_adjective, les ouvriers de la compagnie d'йlectricitй rйparent les coupures d'йlectricitй plus rapidement, augmentant ainsi le bonheur des citoyens.
TEXT.German: Dank der im %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich gewдhrten Freiheit und Lebensqualitдt beseitigen die Arbeiter des Elektrizitдtswerks Stromstцrungen sehr schnell und machen auf diese Weise die Bьrger noch glьcklicher.
TEXT.Italian: Motivati dalla libertа e dalla qualitа della vita nell'impero %s1_civ_adjective, gli operai della compagnia elettrica ripristinano l'energia ancor piщ velocemente, in caso di interruzioni, rendendo i cittadini ancor piщ felici.
TEXT.Spanish: Motivados por la libertad y la calidad de vida en el imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective, los trabajadores de la compaснa elйctrica arreglan los apagones rбpidamente, lo cual hace que los ciudadanos estйn aъn mбs felices.

TEXT.Russian: The workers for our electric companies are so happy and well motivated, they repair damaged lines quickly no matter the conditions.
TEXT.English: The workers for our electric companies are so happy and well motivated, they repair damaged lines quickly no matter the conditions.
TEXT.French: Les ouvriers de nos compagnies d'йlectricitй sont si heureux et si motivйs qu'ils rйparent les lignes rapidement et ce, quelles que soient les conditions.
TEXT.German: Die Arbeiter unserer Elektrizitдtswerke sind so zufrieden und motiviert, dass sie beschдdigte Stromleitungen jederzeit und unter allen Bedingungen zьgig reparieren.
TEXT.Italian: Gli operai delle nostre compagnie elettriche sono cosм felici e ben motivati che riparano le linee danneggiate rapidamente, a prescindere dalle condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: Los trabajadores de nuestras compaснas elйctricas estбn tan felices y motivados que reparan los tendidos averiados rбpidamente, por muy adversas que sean las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: Freedom is the best motivator. We are lucky to have workers like these, who keep the power flowing to our citizenry.
TEXT.English: Freedom is the best motivator. We are lucky to have workers like these, who keep the power flowing to our citizenry.
TEXT.French: La libertй est une excellente motivation. Nous sommes ravis que nos travailleurs puissent assurer un accиs continu а l'йlectricitй.
TEXT.German: Die Freiheit ist die beste Motivation. Wir kцnnen froh sein, solche Arbeiter zu haben, die jederzeit die Stromversorgung fьr unsere Bьrger sicherstellen.
TEXT.Italian: La libertа и il miglior motivatore. Siamo fortunati ad avere operai come questi, che mantengono l'afflusso di energia alla cittadinanza.
TEXT.Spanish: La libertad es la mejor motivaciуn. Somos afortunados por tener trabajadores como йstos, que velan para que la electricidad llegue a la ciudadanнa.

TEXT.Russian: A hydrogen-filled %s1_civ_adjective airship has exploded and crashed. Their government is scrambling to prevent a reoccurrence.
TEXT.English: A hydrogen-filled %s1_civ_adjective airship has exploded and crashed. Their government is scrambling to prevent a reoccurrence.
TEXT.French: Un ballon %s1:1_civ_adjective rempli d'hydrogиne a explosй puis s'est йcrasй. Leur gouvernement fait tout pour йviter que cela se reproduise.
TEXT.German: Ein mit Wasserstoff befьlltes Luftschiff des %s1:2_civ_adjective Volkes ist explodiert und abgestьrzt. Die dortige Regierung unternimmt alles, damit sich ein derartiger Vorfall nicht wiederholt.
TEXT.Italian: Un velivolo %s1_civ_adjective pieno di idrogeno и esploso ed и precipitato. Il loro governo si sta affannando affinchй ciт non succeda di nuovo.
TEXT.Spanish: Un dirigible %s1:1_civ_adjective llena de hidrуgeno ha explotado y se ha estrellado. Su gobierno se estб afanando para impedir que algo asн vuelva a ocurrir.

TEXT.Russian: Reckless merchants used hydrogen instead of helium to fill their dirigibles and one has caught fire and crashed in a spectacularly fatal accident.
TEXT.English: Reckless merchants used hydrogen instead of helium to fill their dirigibles and one has caught fire and crashed in a spectacularly fatal accident.
TEXT.French: Des marchands ont imprudemment utilisй de l'hydrogиne au lieu de l'hйlium pour remplir leurs dirigeables. L'un d'eux a pris feu et s'est йcrasй au cours d'un accident aussi spectaculaire que mortel.
TEXT.German: Skrupellose Hдndler haben Wasserstoff statt Helium als Fьllmittel fьr ihre Luftschiffe verwendet. Eines von ihnen hat Feuer gefangen und ist fatalerweise abgestьrzt.
TEXT.Italian: Dei mercanti sconsiderati hanno usato l'idrogeno, invece dell'elio, per riempire i loro dirigibili: uno di questi ha preso fuoco ed и precipitato con un fatale e spettacolare incidente.
TEXT.Spanish: Los imprudentes mercaderes han usado hidrуgeno en vez de helio para llenar sus dirigibles, y uno de ellos se ha incendiado y estrellado en un accidente tan espectacular como mortal.

TEXT.Russian: Outlaw the use of hydrogen in lighter-than-air vehicles.
TEXT.English: Outlaw the use of hydrogen in lighter-than-air vehicles.
TEXT.French: Interdire l'utilisation d'hydrogиne dans les vйhicules volants.
TEXT.German: Stellt die Verwendung von Wasserstoff in derartig leichten Luftfahrzeugen unter Strafe.
TEXT.Italian: Rendi illegale l'uso di idrogeno nei dirigibili.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se prohнba el uso de hidrуgeno en los vehнculos mбs ligeros que el aire.

TEXT.Russian: Fund a drive to regulate air traffic, improve safety and ensure the viability of commercial air travel.
TEXT.English: Fund a drive to regulate air traffic, improve safety and ensure the viability of commercial air travel.
TEXT.French: Financer une campagne pour rйguler le trafic aйrien, amйliorer la sйcuritй et assurer la viabilitй des voyages aйriens commerciaux.
TEXT.German: Finanziert MaЯnahmen zur Regulierung des Luftverkehrs, zur Verbesserung der Sicherheit und zur Sicherstellung der Durchfьhrbarkeit kommerzieller Luftfahrt.
TEXT.Italian: Finanzia un programma per regolarizzare il traffico aereo, migliorare la sicurezza e assicurare l'attuabilitа del traffico aereo commerciale.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se financie una campaсa de regulaciуn del trбfico aйreo, se mejore la seguridad y se asegure la viabilidad de los viajes comerciales aйreos.

TEXT.Russian: A comet fragment has struck the earth in a remote tundra region, obliterating a whole forest. %s1_civ_adjective scientists are scrambling like mad to learn more about potential threats posed to our planet by other rogue heavenly bodies: comets, asteroids, meteors, and whatever else may be lurking out there.
TEXT.English: A comet fragment has struck the earth in a remote tundra region, obliterating a whole forest. %s1_civ_adjective scientists are scrambling like mad to learn more about potential threats posed to our planet by other rogue heavenly bodies: comets, asteroids, meteors, and whatever else may be lurking out there.
TEXT.French: Un morceau de comиte a heurtй la Terre dans une toundra lointaine, anйantissant la forкt entiиre. Des scientifiques %s1:3_civ_adjective essayent dйsespйrement d'en savoir plus sur les йventuelles menaces posйes а notre planиte par d'autres corps astraux : comиtes, astйroпdes, mйtйores et tout ce qui pourrait errer dans l'espace.
TEXT.German: Ein Kometenbruchstьck ist in einer entlegenen Region der Tundra in die Erde eingeschlagen und hat ein ganzes Waldgebiet vernichtet. %s1:3_civ_adjective Wissenschaftler arbeiten fieberhaft daran, mehr ьber die von diversen instabilen Himmelskцrpern ausgehenden potenziellen Gefahren fьr unseren Planeten in Erfahrung zu bringen - wie Kometen, Asteroiden, Meteoriten und was sonst noch so da drauЯen lauern mag.
TEXT.Italian: Il frammento di una cometa и precipitato in una regione remota della tundra, distruggendo un'intera foresta. Gli scienziati %s1_civ_adjective stanno impazzendo per scoprire di piщ sulle potenziali minacce per il nostro pianeta rappresentate da altri corpi celesti: comete, asteroidi, meteoriti e qualsiasi altra cosa si nasconda lа fuori.
TEXT.Spanish: Un fragmento de un cometa ha impactado contra la Tierra en una remota regiуn de la Tundra, y ha arrasado todo un bosque. Los cientнficos %s1:3_civ_adjective se estбn devanando los sesos para aprender mбs de los peligros potenciales que presentan para nuestro planeta otros cuerpos celestes errantes: cometas, meteoritos, asteroides y lo que sea que pulule por ahн fuera.

TEXT.Russian: A comet fragment has crashed to earth in a remote tundra region, obliterating an entire forest and speeding the earth's rotation by two seconds.
TEXT.English: A comet fragment has crashed to earth in a remote tundra region, obliterating an entire forest and speeding the earth's rotation by two seconds.
TEXT.French: Un morceau de comиte a heurtй la Terre dans une toundra lointaine, anйantissant la forкt entiиre et accйlйrant la rotation de la Terre de deux secondes.
TEXT.German: Ein Kometenbruchstьck ist in einer entlegenen Region der Tundra in die Erde eingeschlagen und hat ein ganzes Waldgebiet vernichtet sowie die Erdrotation um zwei Sekunden beschleunigt.
TEXT.Italian: Il frammento di una cometa и precipitato in una regione remota della tundra, distruggendo un'intera foresta e velocizzando di due secondi la rotazione del pianeta.
TEXT.Spanish: El fragmento de un cometa ha impactado contra la Tierra en una remota regiуn de la Tundra, ha arrasado todo un bosque y ha aumentando en dos segundos la velocidad de rotaciуn del planeta.

TEXT.Russian: What if something even bigger is out there, on a collision course with our world? If so, we must find it. We must get into space!
TEXT.English: What if something even bigger is out there, on a collision course with our world? If so, we must find it. We must get into space!
TEXT.French: Et si quelque chose de plus gros risquait de s'йcraser sur notre monde ? Si c'est le cas, nous devons le dйcouvrir. Nous devons aller dans l'espace !
TEXT.German: Was, wenn es da drauЯen noch etwas GrцЯeres gibt, das sich auf Kollisionskurs mit unserer Welt befindet? Wir mьssen in den Weltraum!
TEXT.Italian: E se qualcosa di piщ grosso fosse lа fuori, in rotta di collisione con il nostro pianeta? Se и cosм dobbiamo trovarlo. Dobbiamo andare nello spazio!
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Y quй pasarнa si algo mбs grande estuviera en trayectoria de colisiуn contra nuestro mundo? Tenemos que averiguarlo. ¡Debemos ir al espacio!

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective metropolis of %s2_city has constructed a mass transit marvel: an underground railroad network. They are calling it the Subway.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective metropolis of %s2_city has constructed a mass transit marvel: an underground railroad network. They are calling it the Subway.
TEXT.French: La mйtropole %s1:2_civ_adjective de %s2_city a construit une merveille destinйe aux transports de masse : un rйseau ferrй souterrain. Ils appellent зa "le mйtropolitain".
TEXT.German: Die %s1:3_civ_adjective Metropole %s2_city hat ein Wunderwerk des Nahverkehrs errichtet: ein unterirdisches Schienennetz, U-Bahn genannt.
TEXT.Italian: La metropoli %s1_civ_adjective di %s2_city ha costruito una meraviglia per il trasporto di massa: una rete ferroviaria sotterranea. L'hanno chiamata Metropolitana.
TEXT.Spanish: La metrуpolis %s1:2_civ_adjective de %s2_city ha construido una maravilla de los transportes pъblicos: una red subterrбnea de ferrocarriles. La han llamado "metropolitano" o "metro".

TEXT.Russian: The glorious city of %s2_city has added an underground railroad network to its mass transit system, greatly boosting commercial traffic.
TEXT.English: The glorious city of %s2_city has added an underground railroad network to its mass transit system, greatly boosting commercial traffic.
TEXT.French: La glorieuse ville de %s2_city a ajoutй un rйseau de transport ferrй а son systиme de transport en commun, augmentant considйrablement le trafic commercial.
TEXT.German: Die prachtvolle Stadt %s2_city hat ihr Nahverkehrssystem durch ein unterirdisches Schienennetz erweitert, wodurch der Handelsverkehr erheblichen Auftrieb erhдlt.
TEXT.Italian: La gloriosa cittа di %s2_city ha aggiunto al proprio sistema di trasporti pubblici una rete ferroviaria sotterranea, aumentando di molto il traffico commerciale.
TEXT.Spanish: La gloriosa ciudad de %s2_city ha aсadido una red de ferrocarriles subterrбneos a sus transportes pъblicos, lo que ha impulsado mucho el trбfico comercial.

TEXT.Russian: This is a model for the entire world to follow! Great work.
TEXT.English: This is a model for the entire world to follow! Great work.
TEXT.French: Voilа un modиle а suivre pour le monde entier ! Beau travail.
TEXT.German: Dieses Modell wird in der ganzen Welt Schule machen! Gute Arbeit!
TEXT.Italian: Un modello da seguire per il mondo intero! Bel lavoro.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Es un ejemplo a seguir para todo el mundo! Buen trabajo.

TEXT.Russian: A gold rush has begun at the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city. Fortune seekers from across the world travel there in hopes of getting rich quickly.
TEXT.English: A gold rush has begun at the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city. Fortune seekers from across the world travel there in hopes of getting rich quickly.
TEXT.French: Une ruйe vers l'or a dйbutй dans la ville %s1:2_civ_adjective de %s2_city. Des chercheurs d'or du monde entier y affluent dans l'espoir de s'enrichir rapidement.
TEXT.German: In der %s1:2_civ_adjective Stadt %s2_city ist ein Goldrausch ausgebrochen. Abenteurer aus aller Welt reisen dorthin und hoffen, schnellstmцglich zu groЯem Reichtum zu gelangen.
TEXT.Italian: И cominciata la corsa all'oro nella cittа %s1_civ_adjective di %s2_city. Da tutto il mondo arrivano persone in cerca di fortuna e di rapida ricchezza.
TEXT.Spanish: Se ha desatado la fiebre del oro en la ciudad %s1:2_civ_adjective de %s2_city. Los buscadores de oro de todo el mundo se han ido allн con la esperanza de hacerse ricos rбpidamente.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire is enjoying a population increase at %s2_city thanks to a gold rush bringing in prospectors and hopefuls.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire is enjoying a population increase at %s2_city thanks to a gold rush bringing in prospectors and hopefuls.
TEXT.French: La ville %s1:2_civ_adjective de %s2_city connaоt une augmentation de sa population provoquйe par une ruйe vers l'or.
TEXT.German: Die Stadt %s2_city des %s1:2_civ_adjective Reiches erfreut sich dank des Goldrausches, der zahlreiche Schьrfer und Abenteurer anlockt, eines Bevцlkerungsanstiegs.
TEXT.Italian: L'impero %s1_civ_adjective vede un aumento della popolazione di %s2_city, grazie a una corsa all'oro che porta prospettori e gente piena di speranza.
TEXT.Spanish: El imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective estб disfrutando de un aumento de poblaciуn en %s2_city gracias a la fiebre del oro que ha atraнdo a buscadores y optimistas.

TEXT.Russian: Small amounts of gold panned from streams have sparked a gold rush to the area by immigrants looking to strike it rich.
TEXT.English: Small amounts of gold panned from streams have sparked a gold rush to the area by immigrants looking to strike it rich.
TEXT.French: De petites quantitйs d'or tamisйes dans des ruisseaux ont provoquй l'arrivйe massive d'immigrants qui espиrent devenir riches.
TEXT.German: Nachdem in den Flьssen der Umgebung kleinere Goldbrocken gefunden wurden, sind zahlreiche Abenteurer auf der Suche nach Reichtum angereist und haben einen Goldrausch ausgelцst.
TEXT.Italian: Piccole quantitа di oro estratte dai torrenti hanno innescato una corsa all'oro: arrivano immigranti che vogliono diventare ricchi.
TEXT.Spanish: Las pequeсas pepitas de oro que arrastran los rнos han propiciado una fiebre del oro en la zona por parte de inmigrantes, que buscan hacerse ricos.

TEXT.Russian: Prospectors have successfully mined newly discovered veins of gold near %s2_city. The news has produced a gold rush.
TEXT.English: Prospectors have successfully mined newly discovered veins of gold near %s2_city. The news has produced a gold rush.
TEXT.French: Des chercheurs d'or ont dйcouvert de nouvelles veines d'or prиs de %s2_city. La nouvelle a provoquй une ruйe vers l'or.
TEXT.German: Goldsucher haben in der Nдhe der Stadt %s2_city erfolgreich nach Gold geschьrft. Diese Nachricht hat einen wahren Goldrausch ausgelцst.
TEXT.Italian: I prospettori hanno scoperto nuovi filoni d'oro vicino a %s2_city. La notizia ha fatto partire una corsa all'oro.
TEXT.Spanish: Los prospectores han conseguido explotar los filones de oro reciйn descubiertos en %s2_city. Las noticias han producido una fiebre del oro.

TEXT.Russian: When the boom passes, many of the immigrants will settle down.
TEXT.English: When the boom passes, many of the immigrants will settle down.
TEXT.French: Quand la ruйe se sera calmйe, de nombreux immigrants s'installeront.
TEXT.German: Wenn der groЯe Boom vorbei ist, werden sicher viele der Immigranten dort ansдssig werden.
TEXT.Italian: Quando passerа il boom, molti immigranti si fermeranno.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando pase el "boom", muchos inmigrantes se establecerбn.

TEXT.Russian: Fund efforts to motivate more of the gold seekers to settle down when the rush ends.
TEXT.English: Fund efforts to motivate more of the gold seekers to settle down when the rush ends.

TEXT.English: Our engineers have conceived a national highway system of divided highways free of all traffic stops, built in straight lines on smooth grades.

TEXT.German: Unsere Ingenieure haben ein nationales Autobahnnetz entworfen, das verschiedene, gerade SchnellstraЯen ohne jegliche Engpдsse vereint.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri ingegneri hanno progettato un sistema nazionale di autostrade libero da ogni ogni tipo di blocco stradale, fatto di rettilinei e con pendenze leggere.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros ingenieros han diseсado un sistema de autopistas nacionales en el que los sentidos de la marcha estбn separados, no existen puntos de parada obligatoria y el trazado es recto con pendientes suaves.

TEXT.Russian: Construction will begin as soon as plans are finalized.
TEXT.English: Construction will begin as soon as plans are finalized.
TEXT.French: La construction commencera dиs que les plans seront finalisйs.
TEXT.German: Der Bau beginnt, sobald die Plдne fertig sind.
TEXT.Italian: La costruzione comincerа appena saranno pronti i progetti.
TEXT.Spanish: La construcciуn comenzarб en cuanto los planos estйn terminados.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has announced the first annual Earth Day, crusading for the cause of Environmentalism.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has announced the first annual Earth Day, crusading for the cause of Environmentalism.
TEXT.French: L'Empire %s1_civ_adjective a annoncй la premiиre Journйe annuelle de la Terre, pour promouvoir la cause de l'Ecologie.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Reich hat den ersten Tag der Erde ausgerufen, um den Umweltschutz zu fцrdern.
TEXT.Italian: L'impero %s1_civ_adjective ha annunciato la prima, annuale, Festa della Terra, impegnandosi nella crociata per l'ambientalismo.
TEXT.Spanish: El imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective ha anunciado el primer Dнa Anual de la Tierra como forma de abogar por el Ecologismo.

TEXT.Russian: Our government announces the first annual Earth Day to raise awareness of all environmental issues among the populace.
TEXT.English: Our government announces the first annual Earth Day to raise awareness of all environmental issues among the populace.
TEXT.French: Notre gouvernement annonce la premiиre Journйe annuelle de la Terre pour avertir la population des problиmes d'environnement.
TEXT.German: Unsere Regierung ruft den ersten Tag der Erde aus, um das Bewusstsein fьr umweltpolitische Probleme unter der Bevцlkerung zu steigern.
TEXT.Italian: Il nostro governo annuncia la prima Festa annuale della Terra, per aumentare la consapevolezza della popolazione sui problemi ambientali.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro gobierno anuncia el primer Dнa Anual de la Tierra para que la poblaciуn sea mбs consciente de las cuestiones medioambientales.

TEXT.Russian: Enshrine the day as a national holiday.
TEXT.English: Enshrine the day as a national holiday.
TEXT.French: Faites de ce jour une fкte nationale.
TEXT.German: Erhebt den Tag zu einem nationalen Feiertag.
TEXT.Italian: Celebra questo giorno come festa nazionale.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se distinga el dнa como fiesta nacional.

TEXT.Russian: Fund an international awareness effort in addition to our local efforts.
TEXT.English: Fund an international awareness effort in addition to our local efforts.
TEXT.French: Financez un effort international en plus de nos efforts locaux.
TEXT.German: Finanziert zusдtzlich zu unseren lokalen Anstrengungen eine internationale Kampagne.
TEXT.Italian: Finanzia un'opera di consapevolezza internazionale, oltre a quelle locali.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se financie un plan de concienciaciуn internacional como complemento a las iniciativas locales.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has donated funds raised at a charity event to the cause of religious freedom.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has donated funds raised at a charity event to the cause of religious freedom.
TEXT.French: L'Empire %s1_civ_adjective a donnй des fonds collectйs а un йvйnement caritatif pour la cause de la libertй de culte.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Reich hat die Einnahmen eines Wohltдtigkeitsereignisses fьr die Religionsfreiheit gespendet.
TEXT.Italian: L'impero %s1_civ_adjective ha donato i fondi raccolti con un evento di beneficenze alla causa della libertа religiosa.
TEXT.Spanish: El imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective ha donado los fondos reunidos en un acto benйfico a la causa de la libertad religiosa.

TEXT.Russian: Musical artists from across our nation have gathered in %s2_city to raise money and awareness for the cause of religious freedom.
TEXT.English: Musical artists from across our nation have gathered in %s2_city to raise money and awareness for the cause of religious freedom.
TEXT.French: Des artistes musicaux de toute la nation se sont rassemblйs а %s2_city pour collecter de l'argent et promouvoir la cause de la libertй de culte.
TEXT.German: Musiker unseres Landes haben sich in %s2_city versammelt, um Spenden fьr die Religionsfreiheit zu sammeln.
TEXT.Italian: Musicisti da tutta la nazione sono arrivati a %s2_city per raccogliere fondi e aumentare la consapevolezza a favore della libertа religiosa.
TEXT.Spanish: Mъsicos de toda la naciуn se han dado cita en %s2_city con el fin de dar a conocer la libertad religiosa y reunir dinero para dicha causa.

TEXT.Russian: Donate the money raised to the local temples.
TEXT.English: Donate the money raised to the local temples.
TEXT.French: Donner l'argent collectй aux petits lieux de culte locaux.
TEXT.German: Spendet das gesammelte Geld den lokalen Tempeln.
TEXT.Italian: Dona i soldi raccolti ai templi locali.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se done el dinero reunido a los templos locales.

TEXT.Russian: Use the money to fund a public service ad campaign for religious freedom and tolerance.
TEXT.English: Use the money to fund a public service ad campaign for religious freedom and tolerance.
TEXT.French: Utiliser l'argent pour fonder un service public et une campagne pour la libertй de culte et la tolйrance.
TEXT.German: Verwendet das Geld zur Finanzierung einer Kampagne fьr Religionsfreiheit und Toleranz.
TEXT.Italian: Utilizza i soldi per finanziare una campagna pubblicitaria pubblica in favore della libertа e della tolleranza religiosa.
TEXT.Spanish: Que el dinero se use para financiar como servicio pъblico una campaсa publicitaria de la libertad y la tolerancia religiosas.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Spread each of the religions present to a new city
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Spread each of the religions present to a new city
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Rйpandre chaque religion prйsente а une nouvelle ville
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verbreitet die vorhandenen Religionen in einer neuen Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Diffondi ogni religione presente in una nuova cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Que se difundan a una nueva ciudad cada una de las religiones presentes.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective craftsmen have improved the design of their axe manufacturing. These are the finest axes in the world.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective craftsmen have improved the design of their axe manufacturing. These are the finest axes in the world.
TEXT.French: Les artisans %s1:3_civ_adjective ont amйliorй la fabrication des haches. Ce sont les meilleures haches du monde.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Handwerker haben ihre Axtherstellung verbessert. Dies sind die besten Дxte der Welt.
TEXT.Italian: Gli artigiani %s1_civ_adjective hanno migliorato il progetto per la realizzazione di asce. Ora sono le migliori asce al mondo.
TEXT.Spanish: Los artesanos %s1:3_civ_adjective han mejorado el diseсo de su proceso de fabricaciуn de hachas. Йstas son las mejores hachas del mundo.

TEXT.Russian: Our craftsmen have devised a technique for improving the balance of our axes.
TEXT.English: Our craftsmen have devised a technique for improving the balance of our axes.
TEXT.French: Nos artisans ont inventй une technique pour amйliorer l'йquilibre de nos haches.
TEXT.German: Unsere Handwerker haben eine Technik entwickelt, durch die unsere Дxte besser ausbalanciert sind.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri artigiani hanno scoperto una tecnica per migliorare il bilanciamento delle nostre asce.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros artesanos han ideado una tйcnica para mejorar el equilibrio de nuestras hachas.

TEXT.Russian: Convert our axemen to the new axe handles immediately.
TEXT.English: Convert our axemen to the new axe handles immediately.
TEXT.French: Adoptons immйdiatement les nouveaux manches de hache pour nos soldats avec hache.
TEXT.German: Rьstet unsere Axtkдmpfer sofort mit den neuen Axtgriffen aus.
TEXT.Italian: Arma immediatamente i nostri guerrieri con le nuove asce.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestros soldados con hacha se adapten a las nuevas empuсaduras de hacha inmediatamente.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective Melee units are now deployed with new, larger shields, improving their defense versus Archery units.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Melee units are now deployed with new, larger shields, improving their defense versus Archery units.
TEXT.French: Les unitйs de combat rapprochй %s1:4_civ_adjective sont а prйsent dйployйes avec de nouveaux boucliers plus larges qui amйliorent leur dйfense face aux unitйs d'archers.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Nahkampfeinheiten werden nun mit neuen, grцЯeren Schilden ausgerьstet, die ihre Verteidigung gegen Bogenschьtzen verbessert.
TEXT.Italian: Le unitа da mischia %s1_civ_adjective ora sono equipaggiate con scudi nuovi e piщ grandi, che migliorano le loro difese contro le unitа di arcieri.
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades de cuerpo a cuerpo %s1:4_civ_adjective ya se han desplegado con nuevos escudos de mayor tamaсo, lo que mejora su capacidad defensiva frente a las unidades con armas de proyectil.

TEXT.Russian: Invention of the tower shield has provided our foot soldiers with some protection against archers.
TEXT.English: Invention of the tower shield has provided our foot soldiers with some protection against archers.
TEXT.French: L'invention de la tour de protection donne а nos soldats а pied une protection contre les archers.
TEXT.German: Die Erfindung des Turmschildes hat unsere FuЯsoldaten mit einem gewissen Schutz gegen Bogenschьtzen ausgestattet.
TEXT.Italian: L'invenzione dello scudo torre ha fornito ai nostri fanti un po' di protezione contro gli arcieri.
TEXT.Spanish: La invenciуn del escudo de torre ha proporcionado a nuestros soldados de infanterнa cierta protecciуn frente a los arqueros.

TEXT.Russian: Issue shields to our troops as supplies permit.
TEXT.English: Issue shields to our troops as supplies permit.
TEXT.French: Donner des boucliers а nos troupes, en fonction du matйriel disponible.
TEXT.German: Verteilt so viele Schilde an unsere Truppen, wie wir haben.
TEXT.Italian: Equipaggia le nostre truppe con gli scudi disponibili.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se envнen escudos a nuestras tropas en la medida en que los suministros lo permitan.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective weaponsmiths have invented smokeless powder, giving their musketmen a significant advantage.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective weaponsmiths have invented smokeless powder, giving their musketmen a significant advantage.
TEXT.French: Les fabricants d'armes %s1:2_civ_adjective ont inventй une poudre sans fumйe, qui donne aux arquebusiers un avantage significatif.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Waffenschmiede haben raucharmes Pulver erfunden, was ihren Musketieren einen erheblichen Vorteil verschafft.
TEXT.Italian: Gli armaioli %s1_civ_adjective hanno inventato polvere da sparo senza fumo, dando ai loro soldati con moschetto un notevole vantaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: Los forjadores de armas %s1:3_civ_adjective han inventado pуlvora sin humo, lo que proporciona a sus mosquetes una importante ventaja.

TEXT.Russian: The invention of smokeless powder has improved the effectiveness of our muskets on the battlefield.
TEXT.English: The invention of smokeless powder has improved the effectiveness of our muskets on the battlefield.
TEXT.French: L'invention de la poudre sans fumйe a amйliorй l'efficacitй de nos arquebuses sur le champ de bataille.
TEXT.German: Die Erfindung des raucharmen Pulvers hat die Effektivitдt unserer Musketiere auf dem Schlachtfeld verbessert.
TEXT.Italian: L'invenzione della polvere da sparo senza fumo ha aumentato l'efficacia dei nostri moschetti sul campo di battaglia.
TEXT.Spanish: La invenciуn de la pуlvora sin humo ha mejorado la efectividad de nuestros mosquetes en el campo de batalla.

TEXT.Russian: Convert our musketmen to the new gunpowder.
TEXT.English: Convert our musketmen to the new gunpowder.
TEXT.French: Adopter la nouvelle poudre pour nos arquebusiers.
TEXT.German: Rьstet unsere Musketiere mit dem neuen SchieЯpulver aus.
TEXT.Italian: Equipaggia i nostri soldati con moschetto con la nuova polvere da sparo.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestros mosquetes se adapten a la nueva pуlvora.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective Crossbow units are rumored to be carrying improved weapons. Specifics on how or why their bows are stronger remains a mystery.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Crossbow units are rumored to be carrying improved weapons. Specifics on how or why their bows are stronger remains a mystery.
TEXT.French: On raconte que les unitйs d'arbalйtriers %s1:4_civ_adjective portent des armes amйliorйes. Personne ne sait prйcisйment ni comment ni pourquoi leurs arbalиtes sont plus puissantes.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Armbrustschьtzen haben angeblich verbesserte Waffen. Wie oder warum ihre Armbrьste stдrker sind, ist unklar.
TEXT.Italian: Pare che i balestrieri %s1_civ_adjective abbiano armi migliorate. I motivi per cui le loro balestre risultino piщ forti rimangono un mistero.
TEXT.Spanish: Se rumorea que las unidades de ballesteros %s1:4_civ_adjective llevan armas mejoradas. Sigue siendo un misterio quй es exactamente lo que hace mбs potentes sus ballestas.

TEXT.Russian: Weaponsmiths have improved the strength and durability of fittings used to make crossbows. This allows for stronger tension and improved power.
TEXT.English: Weaponsmiths have improved the strength and durability of fittings used to make crossbows. This allows for stronger tension and improved power.
TEXT.French: Les fabricants d'armes ont amйliorй la force et la rйsistance des йlйments des arbalиtes. Cela permet une tension plus importante et une plus grande efficacitй.
TEXT.German: Die Waffenschmiede haben die Stдrke und Haltbarkeit der Armbrustbeschlдge verbessert. So halten sie eine hцhere Zugkraft aus und kцnnen mehr Kraft entwickeln.
TEXT.Italian: Gli armaioli hanno migliorato forza e resistenza dei materiali utilizzati per fare balestre. Ciт permette una maggiore tensione e piщ potenza.
TEXT.Spanish: Los forjadores de armas han mejorado la fuerza y durabilidad de los elementos empleados en la confecciуn de las ballestas. Esto permite una mayor tensiуn y una potencia mejorada.

TEXT.Russian: Commission the new fittings for all of our crossbow units.
TEXT.English: Commission the new fittings for all of our crossbow units.
TEXT.French: Armer toutes les unitйs d'arbalйtriers d'arbalиtes amйliorйes.
TEXT.German: Verteilt die neuen Beschlдge an alle unsere Armbrustschьtzen.
TEXT.Italian: Commissiona i nuovi materiali per tutte le nostre unitа di balestrieri.
TEXT.Spanish: Que los nuevos elementos lleguen a todas nuestras unidades de ballesteros.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective Grenadier units have been issued more effective explosives: bombs that do not need a fuse.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Grenadier units have been issued more effective explosives: bombs that do not need a fuse.
TEXT.French: Les unitйs de grenadiers %s1:4_civ_adjective ont йtй йquipйes d'explosifs plus efficaces : des bombes sans mиche.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Grenadiere wurden mit effektiveren Sprengsдtzen ausgerьstet: Bomben, die keine Zьndschnur benцtigen.
TEXT.Italian: I granatieri %s1_civ_adjective hanno ottenuto esplosivi piщ efficaci: bombe che non hanno bisogno di miccia.
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades de granaderos %s1:4_civ_adjective han sido dotadas de explosivos mбs eficaces: bombas que no requieren de mecha.

TEXT.Russian: A master smith has devised a firing pin for our grenades, ending the need to use fuses.
TEXT.English: A master smith has devised a firing pin for our grenades, ending the need to use fuses.
TEXT.French: Un maоtre artificier a crйй un percuteur pour nos grenades, pour remplacer les mиches.
TEXT.German: Ein Schmiedemeister hat einen Schlagbolzen entwickelt, der die Zьndschnur ьberflьssig macht.
TEXT.Italian: Un fabbro ha inventato un percussore per le nostre granate, rendendo inutile l'uso delle micce.
TEXT.Spanish: Un maestro herrero ha diseсado un percutor para nuestras granadas, lo que termina con la necesidad de emplear mechas.

TEXT.Russian: Supply our Grenadiers with the improved explosives.
TEXT.English: Supply our Grenadiers with the improved explosives.
TEXT.French: Equiper les grenadiers d'explosifs amйliorйs.
TEXT.German: Stattet unsere Grenadiere mit den verbesserten Sprengsдtzen aus.
TEXT.Italian: Equipaggia i nostri granatieri con gli esplosivi migliorati.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se les suministren explosivos mejorados a nuestros granaderos.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective Cannon units can now shoot farther and more accurately thanks to improved barrel design.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Cannon units can now shoot farther and more accurately thanks to improved barrel design.
TEXT.French: Les unitйs d'artillerie %s1:4_civ_adjective peuvent а prйsent tirer plus loin et plus prйcisйment grвce aux fыts amйliorйs.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Kanoneneinheiten kцnnen durch eine Verbesserung des Laufs nun weiter und genauer schieЯen.
TEXT.Italian: I cannoni %s1_civ_adjective ora possono sparare piщ lontano e con piщ precisione, grazie a un nuovo tipo di canna.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora, las unidades de caсones %s1:4_civ_adjective pueden disparar mбs lejos y con mayor precisiуn gracias a las mejoras en el diseсo del caсуn.

TEXT.Russian: Our knowledge of rifled barrels has been successfully applied to new cannon designs.
TEXT.English: Our knowledge of rifled barrels has been successfully applied to new cannon designs.
TEXT.French: Notre connaissance des canons rayйs a йtй appliquйe avec succиs aux nouveaux modиles de canons.
TEXT.German: Unsere Forschungen an gezogenen Lдufen konnten erfolgreich auf neue Kanonenentwьrfe angewendet werden.
TEXT.Italian: La nostra conoscenza delle canne rigate и stata applicata con successo a nuovi cannoni.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro conocimiento del бnima de los caсones ha sido aplicado con йxito a los nuevos diseсos de caсуn.

TEXT.Russian: Do we want stronger cannon? Is that a trick question?
TEXT.English: Do we want stronger cannon? Is that a trick question?
TEXT.French: Si nous voulons des canons plus puissants ? C'est une question piиge ?
TEXT.German: Ob wir stдrkere Kanonen wollen? Ist das eine Fangfrage?
TEXT.Italian: Se vogliamo cannoni migliori? Cos'и, una domanda col trucco?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Queremos un caсуn mбs potente? ¿Es una pregunta con trampa?

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has halted production of aircraft carriers with wooden decks. Their decks are now made of steel.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has halted production of aircraft carriers with wooden decks. Their decks are now made of steel.
TEXT.French: L'Empire %s1_civ_adjective a suspendu la production de porte-avions avec ponts en bois. Leurs ponts sont а prйsent en acier.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Reich fertigt keine Flugzeugtrдger mit Holzdeck mehr. Ihre Decks sind nun aus Stahl.
TEXT.Italian: L'impero %s1_civ_adjective ha terminato la produzione di portaerei con ponti in legno. I ponti ora sono fatti d'acciaio.
TEXT.Spanish: El imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective ha interrumpido la producciуn de portaaviones con cubiertas de madera. Ahora, sus cubiertas son de acero.

TEXT.Russian: Our shipmasters have concluded that switching to steel decks on our carriers instead of wooden decks would be to our advantage.
TEXT.English: Our shipmasters have concluded that switching to steel decks on our carriers instead of wooden decks would be to our advantage.
TEXT.French: Nos spйcialistes ont conclu que l'utilisation de ponts en acier sur les porte-avions nous donnerait un avantage.
TEXT.German: Unsere Kapitдne sind der Meinung, dass der Wechsel von Holz- auf Stahldecks fьr unsere Flugzeugtrдger von Vorteil wдre.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri esperti sono sicuri che passare a ponti d'acciaio sulle nostre portaerei, al posto di quelli di legno, sarebbe un vantaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros oficiales han llegado a la conclusiуn de que la sustituciуn de las cubiertas de madera por cubiertas de acero en nuestros portaaviones nos resultarнa beneficiosa.

TEXT.Russian: Make it so.
TEXT.English: Make it so.
TEXT.French: Faites donc.
TEXT.German: Tut es.
TEXT.Italian: Procedete.
TEXT.Spanish: Que asн sea.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has developed a long range Fighter plane.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has developed a long range Fighter plane.
TEXT.French: L'empire %s1_civ_adjective a dйveloppй un Chasseur а longue portйe.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Reich hat einen Langstreckenjдger entwickelt.
TEXT.Italian: L'impero %s1_civ_adjective ha sviluppato un aereo da caccia a lungo raggio.
TEXT.Spanish: El imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective ha desarrollado un aviуn caza de largo alcance.

TEXT.Russian: Our engineers have developed an advanced fighter design that is lighter and carries slightly more fuel, extending its operational range.
TEXT.English: Our engineers have developed an advanced fighter design that is lighter and carries slightly more fuel, extending its operational range.
TEXT.French: Nos ingйnieurs ont dйveloppй un modиle de chasseur avancй plus lйger et portant un peu plus de carburant, ce qui augmente sa portйe opйrationnelle.
TEXT.German: Unsere Ingenieure haben einen verbesserten Jдger entwickelt, der leichter ist und mehr Treibstoff fassen kann, wodurch sein Einsatzradius vergrцЯert wird.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri ingegneri hanno sviluppato il progetto di un aereo da caccia piщ leggero e con serbatoi leggermente piщ grandi: aumenta cosм il suo raggio d'azione.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros ingenieros han desarrollado un caza de diseсo avanzado, mбs ligero y capaz de llevar un poco mбs de combustible, lo que amplнa su alcance operativo.

TEXT.Russian: Begin production of the new fighter.
TEXT.English: Begin production of the new fighter.
TEXT.French: Commencer la production du nouveau chasseur.
TEXT.German: Beginnt mit der Produktion des neuen Jдgers.
TEXT.Italian: Cominciate a produrre il nuovo caccia.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se inicie la producciуn del nuevo caza.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective Pikemen have begun using a new type of halberd, boosting their strength versus foot soldiers.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Pikemen have begun using a new type of halberd, boosting their strength versus foot soldiers.
TEXT.French: Les piquiers %s1:2_civ_adjective ont commencй а utiliser un nouveau type de hallebarde, qui augmente leur force contre les soldats а pied.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Pikeniere verwenden seit kurzem eine neue Hellebarde, die ihnen einen Vorteil gegen FuЯsoldaten verschafft.
TEXT.Italian: I picchieri %s1_civ_adjective hanno cominciato a usare un nuovo tipo di alabarda, che ne aumenta la forza contro la fanteria.
TEXT.Spanish: Los piqueros %s1:3_civ_adjective han comenzado a usar un nuevo tipo de alabarda que aumenta su potencia respecto a los soldados de infanterнa.

TEXT.Russian: Our weapon masters have devised a halberd design that remains fully effective versus mounted units but will boost effectiveness versus foot soldiers.
TEXT.English: Our weapon masters have devised a halberd design that remains fully effective versus mounted units but will boost effectiveness versus foot soldiers.
TEXT.French: Nos maоtres armuriers ont inventй un modиle de hallebarde qui reste pleinement efficace contre les unitйs montйes et qui augmente l'efficacitй contre les soldats а pied.
TEXT.German: Unsere Waffenmeister haben eine Hellebarde entwickelt, die bei gleicher Effektivitдt gegenьber berittenen Einheiten viel stдrker gegen FuЯsoldaten ist.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri armaioli hanno creato un progetto di alabarda che rimane totalmente efficace contro le unitа montate, ma raggiunge il massimo dell'efficacia contro la fanteria.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros expertos en armas han diseсado un tipo de alabarda que conserva toda su eficacia contra unidades montadas y que aumenta su efectividad frente a los soldados de infanterнa.

TEXT.Russian: Issue the new weapons to all of our pikemen.
TEXT.English: Issue the new weapons to all of our pikemen.
TEXT.French: Donner les nouvelles armes а tous nos piquiers.
TEXT.German: Gebt die neuen Waffen an alle Pikeniere aus.
TEXT.Italian: Equipaggia tutti i nostri picchieri con le nuove armi.
TEXT.Spanish: Que todos nuestros piqueros reciban las nuevas armas.

TEXT.Russian: Rumors abound that %s1_civ_adjective shipmasters are doing extensive refitting work on their trireme fleet.
TEXT.English: Rumors abound that %s1_civ_adjective shipmasters are doing extensive refitting work on their trireme fleet.
TEXT.French: Selon certaines rumeurs, les capitaines de navires %s1:2_civ_adjective effectuent des modifications importantes sur leurs trirиmes.
TEXT.German: Es gibt Gerьchte, dass %s1:3_civ_adjective Schiffbauer ihre Trieren-Flotte ьberarbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: Pare che i capitani %s1_civ_adjective stiano facendo grossi lavori sulla loro flotta di triremi.
TEXT.Spanish: Numerosos rumores apuntan a que los oficiales %s1:3_civ_adjective estбn realizando amplios trabajos de mejora en su flota de trirremes.

TEXT.Russian: Our shipmasters have devised a way to reinforce the hulls of our triremes. This will help with both ramming and being rammed.
TEXT.English: Our shipmasters have devised a way to reinforce the hulls of our triremes. This will help with both ramming and being rammed.
TEXT.French: Nos capitaines de navire ont inventй un moyen de renforcer la coque des trirиmes. Cela sera utile en cas d'йperonnage.
TEXT.German: Unsere Schiffbauer haben einen Weg gefunden, den Rumpf unserer Trieren zu verstдrken. Dies kommt uns sowohl beim Rammen als auch beim Gerammtwerden zugute.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri capitani hanno trovato un modo per rinforzare gli scafi delle nostre triremi, che le aiuterа negli speronamenti (sia inflitti che subiti).
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros oficiales han ideado una forma de reforzar los cascos de nuestros trirremes. Esto serб ъtil tanto a la hora de embestir como de ser embestidos.

TEXT.Russian: Our existing ships can also be refitted? Begin immediately.
TEXT.English: Our existing ships can also be refitted? Begin immediately.
TEXT.French: Nos navires actuels peuvent кtre modifiйs ? Commencez immйdiatement.
TEXT.German: Unsere fertigen Schiffe kцnnen auch aufgerьstet werden? Beginnt sofort damit.
TEXT.Italian: Possiamo migliorare le nostre navi? Cominciate immediatamente.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Nuestros barcos actuales tambiйn pueden beneficiarse de esta mejora? Que se haga de inmediato.

TEXT.Russian: Fire has destroyed the Theatre in %s2_city.
TEXT.English: Fire has destroyed the Theatre in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Le feu a dйtruit le Thйвtre а %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein Feuer hat das Theater der Stadt %s2_city zerstцrt.
TEXT.Italian: Il teatro di %s2_city и stato distrutto dal fuoco.
TEXT.Spanish: El fuego ha destruido el teatro de %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: A careless cigarette smoker started a fire at the Theatre in %s2_city, during which the building was destroyed and numerous patrons died.
TEXT.English: A careless cigarette smoker started a fire at the Theatre in %s2_city, during which the building was destroyed and numerous patrons died.
TEXT.French: Un fumeur nйgligent a mis le feu au Thйвtre, а %s2_city. Le bвtiment a йtй dйtruit et de nombreuses personnes ont pйri lors de l'incendie.
TEXT.German: Ein unvorsichtiger Raucher hat im Theater der Stadt %s2_city ein Feuer verursacht, wodurch das Gebдude zerstцrt wurde und unzдhlige Besucher ums Leben kamen.
TEXT.Italian: Un incauto fumatore ha appiccato il fuoco nel teatro di %s2_city: durante l'incendio l'edificio и andato distrutto e sono morti diversi spettatori.
TEXT.Spanish: Un fumador descuidado ha provocado un incendio en el teatro de %s2_city. El edificio ha quedado destruido y numerosos mecenas han muerto.

TEXT.Russian: An accident on stage at the Theatre in %s2_city started a fire that burned down the building. Most of the audience escaped alive, thank goodness.
TEXT.English: An accident on stage at the Theatre in %s2_city started a fire that burned down the building. Most of the audience escaped alive, thank goodness.
TEXT.French: Un accident sur scиne au Thйвtre de la ville : %s2_city a provoquй un incendie qui a dйtruit le bвtiment. Fort heureusement, la plupart des spectateurs sont sains et saufs.
TEXT.German: Ein Bьhnenunfall im Theater der Stadt %s2_city hat ein Feuer ausgelцst, durch das das Gebдude ausbrannte. Die meisten Zuschauer konnten zum Glьck unverletzt entkommen.
TEXT.Italian: Un incidente di palcoscenico ha appiccato un incendio, nel teatro di %s2_city, che ha distrutto l'edificio. Il pubblico si и salvato quasi tutto, per fortuna.
TEXT.Spanish: Un accidente en el escenario del teatro de %s2_city ha provocado un incendio; el edificio ha sido pasto de las llamas. Afortunadamente, la mayor parte del pъblico pudo salvar la vida.

TEXT.Russian: Organize a rebuilding effort.
TEXT.English: Organize a rebuilding effort.
TEXT.French: Organiser la reconstruction.
TEXT.German: Organisiert den Wiederaufbau.
TEXT.Italian: Organizza la ricostruzione.
TEXT.Spanish: Que empiecen las tareas de reconstrucciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Investigate the cause of the fire.
TEXT.English: Investigate the cause of the fire.
TEXT.French: Enquкter sur la cause de l'incendie.
TEXT.German: Untersucht die Ursache des Feuers.
TEXT.Italian: Investiga le cause dell'incendio.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se investigue la causa del incendio.

TEXT.Russian: We are too pressed to spare any attention to a fire.
TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any attention to a fire.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes trop pressйs pour nous occuper d'un incendie.
TEXT.German: Wir sind zu beschдftigt, um uns um ein Feuer zu kьmmern.
TEXT.Italian: Siamo troppo presi per prestare attenzione a un incendio.
TEXT.Spanish: Estamos demasiado ocupados como para prestar atenciуn a un incendio.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective forces have unexpectedly shown mercy and compassion for our wounded, tending them on the battlefield and then returning the survivors safely to us.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective forces have unexpectedly shown mercy and compassion for our wounded, tending them on the battlefield and then returning the survivors safely to us.
TEXT.French: Exceptionnellement, les forces %s1:4_civ_adjective ont montrй clйmence et compassion envers nos blessйs, prenant soin d'eux sur le champ de bataille et nous retournant les survivants sains et saufs.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Truppen haben sich unseren Verletzten gegenьber unerwartet barmherzig erwiesen. Sie haben die Wunden versorgt und die Ьberlebenden zu uns zurьckgebracht.
TEXT.Italian: Le forze %s1_civ_adjective hanno mostrato un'inaspettata compassione per i nostri feriti, curandoli sul campo di battaglia e restituendoci i sopravvissuti.
TEXT.Spanish: Las fuerzas %s1:3_civ_adjective han mostrado piedad y compasiуn por nuestros heridos de forma inesperada, atendiйndolos en el campo de batalla y luego devolviйndonos a los supervivientes.

TEXT.Russian: No good deed shall go unpunished. Send our recovered soldiers back into battle the moment they are ready.
TEXT.English: No good deed shall go unpunished. Send our recovered soldiers back into battle the moment they are ready.
TEXT.French: Ils ne vont pas s'en tirer aussi facilement. Renvoyons nos soldats au combat, sitфt qu'ils seront prкts.
TEXT.German: Keine gute Tat soll ungestraft bleiben. Schickt unsere Soldaten sofort wieder ins Feld, sobald sie wieder gesund sind.
TEXT.Italian: Nessuna buona azione resterа impunita. Rimandate i nostri soldati in battaglia nel momento stesso in cui guariscono.
TEXT.Spanish: Ninguna buena acciуn debe quedar sin castigo. Que los soldados recuperados vuelvan al campo de batalla en cuanto estйn listos.

TEXT.Russian: Perhaps this is a sign that enough blood has been shed. Send our emissaries to see if they are ready to discuss peace.
TEXT.English: Perhaps this is a sign that enough blood has been shed. Send our emissaries to see if they are ready to discuss peace.
TEXT.French: C'est peut-кtre un signe. Trop de sang a dйjа йtй versй. Envoyons nos йmissaires pour voir s'ils sont prкts а parler de paix.
TEXT.German: Vielleicht ist das ein Zeichen dafьr, dass genug Blut vergossen wurde. Lasst durch unsere Abgesandten nachfragen, ob sie eine Friedensverhandlung wollen.
TEXT.Italian: Forse и un segno che и stato sparso abbastanza sangue. Inviate i nostri emissari per vedere se il nemico vuole parlare di pace.
TEXT.Spanish: Quizб йsta sea la seсal de que ya se ha derramado suficiente sangre. Que nuestros emisarios vayan a ver si existen posibilidades de negociar la paz.

TEXT.Russian: A heroic gesture of mercy by your forces in regard to %s1_civ_adjective wounded has opened the door to a possible peace treaty. Do you wish to end the war?
TEXT.English: A heroic gesture of mercy by your forces in regard to %s1_civ_adjective wounded has opened the door to a possible peace treaty. Do you wish to end the war?
TEXT.French: Vos troupes ont un geste de clйmence hйroпque envers les blessйs %s1:2_civ_adjective. Cela permet d'envisager un йventuel traitй de paix. Dйsirez-vous mettre un terme а la guerre ?
TEXT.German: Eine heldenhafte Geste der Gnade unserer Truppen gegenьber den verletzten %s1:2_civ_adjective Soldaten hat uns die Mцglichkeit eines Friedensvertrags erцffnet. Wollt Ihr den Krieg beenden?
TEXT.Italian: Un eroico gesto di pietа delle nostre forze nei confronti dei feriti %s1_civ_adjective ha aperto la porta a delle trattative per la pace. Vuoi porre fine alla guerra?
TEXT.Spanish: Un heroico gesto de piedad con los heridos %s1:3_civ_adjective por parte de tus fuerzas ha abierto la puerta a un posible tratado de paz. ¿Quieres terminar la guerra?

TEXT.Russian: A heroic gesture of mercy by the %s3_civ_adjective forces toward the %s1_civ_adjective wounded has brought an unexpected opportunity for peace. The two sides are at least pausing to consider the possibility.
TEXT.English: A heroic gesture of mercy by the %s3_civ_adjective forces toward the %s1_civ_adjective wounded has brought an unexpected opportunity for peace. The two sides are at least pausing to consider the possibility.
TEXT.French: Grвce а un geste de clйmence hйroпque des troupes %s3:4_civ_adjective envers les blessйs %s1:2_civ_adjective, une occasion de signer une paix est survenue. Les deux camps font une pause pour considйrer cette possibilitй.
TEXT.German: Eine heldenhafte Geste der Gnade der %s3:2_civ_adjective Truppen gegenьber den verletzten %s1:2_civ_adjective Soldaten hat die Mцglichkeit eines Friedensvertrags erцffnet. Die beiden Seiten denken darьber nach.
TEXT.Italian: Un eroico gesto di pietа da parte delle forze %s3_civ_adjective verso i feriti %s1_civ_adjective ha creato un'inaspettata opportunitа per la pace. Le due nazioni stanno quantomeno considerando la possibilitа.
TEXT.Spanish: Un heroico gesto de piedad con los heridos %s1:3_civ_adjective por parte de las fuerzas %s3:4_civ_adjective ha proporcionado una inesperada oportunidad de alcanzar la paz. Ambos bandos se han detenido para, al menos, considerar esta posibilidad.

TEXT.Russian: A great mediator has emerged, offering to arbitrate the dispute between %s1_civ_adjective leadership and our nation. This could be a chance for peace.
TEXT.English: A great mediator has emerged, offering to arbitrate the dispute between %s1_civ_adjective leadership and our nation. This could be a chance for peace.
TEXT.French: Un important mйdiateur est apparu, et il propose d'arbitrer le conflit entre le dirigeant %s1_civ_adjective et notre nation. Ce pourrait кtre une occasion de paix.
TEXT.German: Ein Vermittler bietet an, die Differenzen zwischen uns und der %s1:2_civ_adjective Fьhrung beizulegen. Dies kцnnte eine Chance auf Frieden sein.
TEXT.Italian: И comparso un grande mediatore, che si и offerto di arbitrare la disputa tra la leadership %s1_civ_adjective e la nostra nazione. Questa potrebbe essere un'opportunitа di pace.
TEXT.Spanish: Ha surgido un gran mediador que se ofrece como бrbitro en la disputa entre el liderazgo %s1:1_civ_adjective y nuestra naciуn. Podrнa ser la ocasiуn de alcanzar la paz.

TEXT.Russian: We do not want peace! Let the war continue.
TEXT.English: We do not want peace! Let the war continue.
TEXT.French: Nous ne voulons pas la paix ! Continuons la guerre.
TEXT.German: Wir wollen keinen Frieden! Der Krieg soll weitergehen.
TEXT.Italian: Non vogliamo la pace! Che continui la guerra.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡No queremos la paz! Que siga la guerra.

TEXT.Russian: Peace would benefit both sides. Give our blessing to this mediator, and may his words prove sharper than their hatreds.
TEXT.English: Peace would benefit both sides. Give our blessing to this mediator, and may his words prove sharper than their hatreds.
TEXT.French: La paix serait bйnйfique pour tous. Donnons notre bйnйdiction au mйdiateur et que ses mots soient plus forts que leur haine.
TEXT.German: Friede wдre fьr beide Seiten von Vorteil. Gebt diesem Vermittler unseren Segen. Mцgen sich seine Worte als stдrker erweisen als ihr Hass.
TEXT.Italian: La pace sarebbe un bene per entrambi. Approviamo questo mediatore e possano le sue parole dimostrarsi piщ acute del nostro odio.
TEXT.Spanish: La paz beneficiarнa a ambos bandos. Que este mediador reciba nuestra bendiciуn, y que sus palabras resulten mбs afiladas que el odio del enemigo.

TEXT.Russian: A great mediator has offered to arbitrate our grievance with the %s1_civ_adjective Empire. This opens the door to a possible peace treaty. Do you wish to end the war?
TEXT.English: A great mediator has offered to arbitrate our grievance with the %s1_civ_adjective Empire. This opens the door to a possible peace treaty. Do you wish to end the war?
TEXT.French: Un important mйdiateur a proposй d'arbitrer notre grief avec l'Empire %s1_civ_adjective. Cela ouvre la porte vers un possible traitй de paix. Dйsirez-vous mettre un terme а la guerre ?
TEXT.German: Ein Vermittler bietet an, die Feindseligkeiten zwischen uns und dem %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich beizulegen. Dies erцffnet uns die Mцglichkeit eines Friedensvertrags. Wollt Ihr den Krieg beenden?
TEXT.Italian: Un grande mediatore si и offerto di arbitrare i nostri problemi con l'impero %s1_civ_adjective. Ciт apre la porta a un possibile trattato di pace. Vuoi terminare la guerra?
TEXT.Spanish: Un gran mediador se ha ofrecido a intervenir como бrbitro en nuestra disputa con el imperio %s1:1_civ_adjective. Esto abre la puerta a un posible tratado de paz. ¿Quieres terminar la guerra?

TEXT.Russian: A great mediator has attempted to broker peace between the %s1_civ_adjective and %s3_adjective Empires!
TEXT.English: A great mediator has attempted to broker peace between the %s1_civ_adjective and %s3_adjective Empires!
TEXT.French: Un important mйdiateur a amenй les empires %s1_civ_adjective et %s3_adjective а faire la paix !
TEXT.German: Ein Vermittler hat fьr Frieden zwischen dem %s1:2_civ_adjective und dem %s3:2_adjective Reich gesorgt!
TEXT.Italian: Un grande mediatore ha negoziato la pace tra l'impero %s1_civ_adjective e quello %s3_adjective!
TEXT.Spanish: Un gran mediador ha negociado la paz entre los imperios %s1:1_civ_adjective y %s3:1_civ_adjective!

TEXT.Russian: The legend of Forty Thieves is luring treasure hunters and adventure seekers to %s2_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.English: The legend of Forty Thieves is luring treasure hunters and adventure seekers to %s2_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.French: La lйgende des Quarante voleurs attire les chasseurs de trйsors et les aventuriers vers les terres %s2:4_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Die Legende der Vierzig Diebe lockt Schatzsucher und Abenteurer in die %s2:2_civ_adjective Gebiete.
TEXT.Italian: La leggenda dei Quaranta ladroni sta attirando cacciatori di tesori e avventurieri nelle terre %s2_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: La leyenda de los Cuarenta Ladrones estб atrayendo a cazatesoros y aventureros a las tierras %s2:4_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: The legend of Forty Thieves has attracted treasure hunters and tourists to the area, boosting local commerce.
TEXT.English: The legend of Forty Thieves has attracted treasure hunters and tourists to the area, boosting local commerce.
TEXT.French: La lйgende des Quarante voleurs a attirй des chasseurs de trйsors et des touristes vers cette zone, ce qui aide le commerce local.
TEXT.German: Die Legende der Vierzig Diebe hat Schatzsucher und Abenteurer in die Gegend gelockt, wodurch die lokale Wirtschaft gesteigert wird.
TEXT.Italian: La leggenda dei Quaranta ladroni ha attirato in zona cacciatori di tesori e turisti, incrementando il commercio locale.
TEXT.Spanish: La leyenda de los Cuarenta Ladrones ha atraнdo a cazatesoros y turistas a la zona, lo que ha aumentado el comercio local.

TEXT.Russian: Excellent.
TEXT.English: Excellent.
TEXT.French: Excellent.
TEXT.German: Hervorragend.
TEXT.Italian: Eccellente.
TEXT.Spanish: Excelente.

TEXT.Russian: In the sands of a %s2_civ_adjective desert, archaeologists have unearthed a cache of ancient texts.
TEXT.English: In the sands of a %s2_civ_adjective desert, archaeologists have unearthed a cache of ancient texts.
TEXT.French: Dans les sables d'un dйsert %s2_civ_adjective, les archйologues ont dйterrй des textes anciens.
TEXT.German: Im Sand einer %s2:2_civ_adjective Wьste haben Archдologen antike Texte gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: Tra le sabbie di un deserto %s2_civ_adjective gli archeologi hanno scoperto un deposito di testi antichi.
TEXT.Spanish: En las arenas de un desierto %s2:1_civ_adjective, los arqueуlogos han desenterrado una colecciуn de textos antiguos.

TEXT.Russian: Archaeologists have unearthed a cache of scrolls and stone tablets buried in the desert sands.
TEXT.English: Archaeologists have unearthed a cache of scrolls and stone tablets buried in the desert sands.
TEXT.French: Les archйologues ont dйterrй parchemins et tablettes de pierre, enterrйs dans le sable, dans le dйsert.
TEXT.German: Archдologen haben im Wьstensand eine Truhe voller Schriftrollen und Steintafeln gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: Gli archeologi hanno scoperto un deposito di papiri e tavolette di pietra, nascosto tra le sabbie del deserto.
TEXT.Spanish: Los arqueуlogos han desenterrado una colecciуn de pergaminos y tablillas de piedra que estaban enterradas en las arenas del desierto.

TEXT.Russian: Disperse the texts to various researchers and specialists, to see what we might learn.
TEXT.English: Disperse the texts to various researchers and specialists, to see what we might learn.
TEXT.French: Distribuer les textes а plusieurs chercheurs et spйcialistes pour voir ce que nous pourrions apprendre.
TEXT.German: Verteilt die Texte an verschiedene Forscher und Spezialisten, um zu untersuchen, was wir daraus lernen kцnnen.
TEXT.Italian: Distribuisci i testi tra ricercatori e specialisti, per vedere cosa possiamo imparare.
TEXT.Spanish: Que los textos sean repartidos entre varios investigadores y especialistas para comprobar quй nos pueden aportar.

TEXT.Russian: Fund an effort to preserve these artifacts in museums, accessible only to the most careful scholars.
TEXT.English: Fund an effort to preserve these artifacts in museums, accessible only to the most careful scholars.
TEXT.French: Mettre tout en oeuvre pour prйserver ces artefacts dans des musйes, accessibles uniquement а des spйcialistes triйs sur le volet.
TEXT.German: Grьndet eine Initiative, um diese Artefakte in Museen zu lagern, wo sie nur den sorgfдltigsten Gelehrten zugдnglich sind.
TEXT.Italian: Finanzia il tentativo di preservare questi manufatti nei musei, rendendoli accessibili solo agli studiosi piщ attenti.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se financie un plan para conservar estos objetos en museos a los que solo puedan acceder los eruditos mбs cuidadosos.

TEXT.Russian: The Waters of Life, drawn from a certain oasis in %s2_civ_adjective lands, are rumored to be able to cure the sick and heal the injured.
TEXT.English: The Waters of Life, drawn from a certain oasis in %s2_civ_adjective lands, are rumored to be able to cure the sick and heal the injured.
TEXT.French: Les Eaux de la Vie, tirйes d'une certaine oasis des terres %s2:4_civ_adjective, sont supposйes pouvoir guйrir les malades et soigner les blessйs.
TEXT.German: Das Wasser des Lebens, das aus einer bestimmten %s2:2_civ_adjective Oase stammt, kann angeblich Kranke und Verletzte heilen.
TEXT.Italian: Le Acque della vita, che sgorgano in un'oasi nelle terre %s2_civ_adjective, sembrano essere in grado di curare i malati e guarire i feriti.
TEXT.Spanish: Segъn los rumores, las Aguas de la Vida, que se obtienen de cierto oasis de las tierras %s2:4_civ_adjective, tienen la capacidad de sanar a los enfermos y curar a los heridos.

TEXT.Russian: Folklore claims that the Waters of Life may be drawn from a certain oasis. Rumors are spreading that these waters can heal the sick and injured.
TEXT.English: Folklore claims that the Waters of Life may be drawn from a certain oasis. Rumors are spreading that these waters can heal the sick and injured.
TEXT.French: La lйgende affirme que les Eaux de la Vie peuvent кtre tirйes d'une certaine oasis. Selon certaines rumeurs, ces eaux pourraient soigner malades et blessйs.
TEXT.German: Laut Ьberlieferungen findet man das Wasser des Lebens in einer bestimmten Oase. Dieses Wasser kann angeblich Kranke und Verletzte heilen.
TEXT.Italian: Il folclore racconta che le Acque della vita sgorgano da una certa oasi. Circolano voci che queste acque possano guarire malati e feriti.
TEXT.Spanish: Segъn el folclore, las Aguas de la Vida se obtienen de cierto oasis. Se estб difundiendo el rumor de que dichas aguas pueden curar a los enfermos y a los heridos.

TEXT.Russian: This will attract more traffic to the oasis? That sounds good.
TEXT.English: This will attract more traffic to the oasis? That sounds good.
TEXT.French: Cela va augmenter l'activitй а l'oasis ? C'est bien.
TEXT.German: Dadurch kommen mehr Leute zu dieser Oase? Das klingt gut.
TEXT.Italian: In questo modo ci sarа un maggior afflusso di persone nell'oasi? Bene.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Esto atraerб mбs trбfico al oasis? Suena bien.

TEXT.Russian: Discovery of naturally occurring glass globules has been ignored by %s1_civ_adjective leadership and will pass in to the dustbin of history.
TEXT.English: Discovery of naturally occurring glass globules has been ignored by %s1_civ_adjective leadership and will pass in to the dustbin of history.
TEXT.French: La dйcouverte de globules de verre naturels a йtй ignorйe par le dirigeant %s1_civ_adjective et sera perdue pour l'humanitй.
TEXT.German: Die Entdeckung natьrlich vorkommender Glaskьgelchen wurde vom Staatsoberhaupt des %s1:2_civ_adjective Reiches ignoriert und wird in Vergessenheit geraten.
TEXT.Italian: La scoperta della formazione spontanea di gocce di vetro и stata ignorata dalla leadership %s1_civ_adjective e finirа nel dimenticatoio della storia.
TEXT.Spanish: El descubrimiento de ciertos glуbulos de cristal que aparecen de forma natural ha sido ignorado por el liderazgo %s1:1_civ_adjective. Este hallazgo caerб en el olvido de la historia.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective geologists have discovered a rich source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT] at what turned out to be a very large and ancient impact crater.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective geologists have discovered a rich source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT] at what turned out to be a very large and ancient impact crater.
TEXT.French: Les gйologues %s1:2_civ_adjective ont dйcouvert une source importante d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT] dans ce qui s'avиre кtre un cratиre trиs ancien, d'une taille considйrable.
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Geologen haben eine reichhaltige [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uran[COLOR_REVERT]quelle an einer Stelle entdeckt, die sich als riesiger Einschlagskrater herausstellte.
TEXT.Italian: I geologi %s1_civ_adjective hanno scoperto una ricca fonte di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranio[COLOR_REVERT] presso quello che poi si и scoperto essere un grande e antico cratere.
TEXT.Spanish: Geуlogos %s1:3_civ_adjective han descubierto una importante fuente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranio[COLOR_REVERT] en lo que ha resultado ser un enorme crбter dejado por un antiguo impacto.

TEXT.Russian: Researchers have discovered a large incidence of naturally formed glass globules in an area around a wide circular valley.
TEXT.English: Researchers have discovered a large incidence of naturally formed glass globules in an area around a wide circular valley.
TEXT.French: Les chercheurs ont dйcouvert un grand gisement de globules de verre naturels dans une zone situйe autour d'une large vallйe circulaire.
TEXT.German: Forscher haben ein groЯes Vorkommen natьrlicher Glaskьgelchen in einem ausgedehnten kreisfцrmigen Tal entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: I ricercatori hanno scoperto molti casi di formazione spontanea di gocce di vetro, nella zona che circonda una larga valle circolare.
TEXT.Spanish: Los investigadores han descubierto una gran formaciуn natural de glуbulos de cristal en una zona que rodea un amplio valle circular.

TEXT.Russian: Why is this important? Do not bother me with petty details.
TEXT.English: Why is this important? Do not bother me with petty details.
TEXT.French: En quoi est-ce important ? Ne me dйrangez pas avec des dйtails insignifiants.
TEXT.German: Warum soll das wichtig sein? Stцrt mich nicht mit unwichtigen Kleinigkeiten.
TEXT.Italian: E sarebbe importante? Non disturbatemi per cose di poco conto.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Quй tiene esto de importante? No quiero que me molesten por nimiedades.

TEXT.Russian: Commit our government to unlocking the secrets of this mystery.
TEXT.English: Commit our government to unlocking the secrets of this mystery.
TEXT.French: Demandons а notre gouvernement de dйcouvrir les secrets de ce mystиre.
TEXT.German: Lasst dieses Mysterium von unserer Regierung untersuchen.
TEXT.Italian: Impegna il nostro governo nella scoperta dei segreti di questo mistero.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestro gobierno se dedique a desentraсar los secretos de este misterio.

TEXT.Russian: We are likely to take the worst of the barbarian horde's fury.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.Russian: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.

You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.

You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.

Vous devrez aussi construire une flotte de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravelles[COLOR_REVERT] pour aider а transporter le fret en haute mer.

AuЯerdem mьsst Ihr eine Flotte von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Karavellen[COLOR_REVERT] bauen, um die Fracht ьber die Tiefsee zu bringen.
