Dovrai costruire anche una flotta di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravelle[COLOR_REVERT] per trasportare la merce oltreoceano.
TEXT.Spanish: El prбctico del puerto[PARAGRAPH:1]Los miembros de la industria mercante marina han encargado construir [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Puertos[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes para convertirlos en reyes indiscutibles del comercio por mar. Tambiйn serб necesario construir una flota de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carabelas[COLOR_REVERT] que colaboren en el transporte de cargamentos por alta mar.

TEXT.Russian: The seaworthy %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of The Harbormaster!
TEXT.English: The seaworthy %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of The Harbormaster!
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective au pied marin a achevй la quкte du Maоtre de port !
TEXT.German: Das seetaugliche %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die Quest "Der Hafenmeister" erfьllt!
TEXT.Italian: Il popolo marinaro %s1_civ_adjective ha completato l'impresa dell'Armatore!
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han hecho gala de su pericia naval completando la misiуn El prбctico del puerto.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your merchant marine and built for them enough ships and docks to empower their plans. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new trading empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your merchant marine and built for them enough ships and docks to empower their plans. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new trading empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez atteint les objectifs de votre marine marchande et lui avez construit suffisamment de navires et de docks pour qu'elle rйalise ses projets. Veuillez choisir une rйcompense parmi les avantages que votre nouvel empire commercial peut vous procurer.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben die Forderungen Ihrer Handelsmarine erfьllt und genug Schiffe und Hдfen gebaut, um ihre Plдne durchzufьhren. Wдhlen Sie eine Belohnung aus den Vorteilen aus, die Ihr neues Handelsimperium Ihnen bieten kann.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai raggiunto gli obiettivi della tua marina mercantile, costruendo abbastanza navi e porti per mettere in atto i loro piani. Scegli una ricompensa tra quelle messe a disposizione dal tuo nuovo impero commerciale.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Se han cumplido los objetivos de la marina mercante y se han construido los barcos y puertos necesarios para desarrollar sus planes. Elegid una de las recompensas que vuestro nuevo imperio comercial puede ofreceros.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of the Harbormaster
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Harbormaster
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte du Maоtre de port
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Der Hafenmeister" ist gescheitert.
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa dell'Armatore.
TEXT.Spanish: La misiуn El prбctico del puerto ha fracasado.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez construire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] dans plusieurs villes cфtiиres. Vous devrez aussi construire %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravelles[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte en avant vous ou si vous atteignez l'Ere Industrielle sans avoir rempli les conditions de victoire.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hдfen[COLOR_REVERT] in Ihren Kьstenstдdten bauen. AuЯerdem mьssen Sie %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Karavellen[COLOR_REVERT] bauen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt oder wenn Sie das Industriezeitalter erreichen, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Porti[COLOR_REVERT] nelle tue cittа costiere. Dovrai costruire anche %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravelle[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se un'altra civiltа la completa per prima, o se raggiungerai l'era industriale senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis construir %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Puertos[COLOR_REVERT] en vuestras diversas ciudades costeras. Tambiйn deberйis construir %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carabelas[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes o si se alcanza la era Industrial sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: Use our advantage to boost the seamanship of our current and future Naval units
TEXT.English: Use our advantage to boost the seamanship of our current and future Naval units
TEXT.French: Utiliser notre avantage pour augmenter les capacitйs de nos unitйs navales actuelles et futures.
TEXT.German: Setzt unseren Vorteil ein, um unsere momentanen und zukьnftigen Marineeinheiten zu verbessern.
TEXT.Italian: Usa il nostro vantaggio per aumentare l'efficacia marinara delle nostre unitа navali attuali e future.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestra ventaja se utilice para mejorar la capacidad de nuestras unidades navales actuales y futuras.

TEXT.Russian: Our trade empire should be leveraged in to producing lots of wealth.
TEXT.English: Our trade empire should be leveraged in to producing lots of wealth.
TEXT.French: Notre empire commercial devrait produire beaucoup de richesses.
TEXT.German: Unser Handelsimperium sollte uns einigen Wohlstand verschaffen.
TEXT.Italian: Bisognerebbe spingere il nostro impero commerciale a produrre molte ricchezze.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro imperio comercial debe ser explotado para obtener abundantes riquezas.

TEXT.Russian: Our ship captains gain extra experience, enabling them to better navigate.
TEXT.English: Our ship captains gain extra experience, enabling them to better navigate.
TEXT.French: Nos capitaines de navire gagnent de l'expйrience supplйmentaire qui leur permet de mieux naviguer.
TEXT.German: Unsere Schiffskapitдne bekommen zusдtzliche Erfahrung, so dass sie besser navigieren kцnnen.
TEXT.Italian: I capitani delle nostre navi guadagnano piщ esperienza, diventando piщ bravi a navigare.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros capitanes de barco obtienen mбs experiencia, lo que les permite navegar mejor.

TEXT.Russian: Our eldest scholars have collaborated on an effort to collect, record, and preserve all of our oral traditions and unwritten literature.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require storage space for pottery, stone tablets and other artifacts, as well as special repositories within our cities.
TEXT.English: Our eldest scholars have collaborated on an effort to collect, record, and preserve all of our oral traditions and unwritten literature.[PARAGRAPH:1]They require storage space for pottery, stone tablets and other artifacts, as well as special repositories within our cities.
TEXT.French: Nos йrudits les plus sages ont collaborй pour rassembler, consigner et prйserver toutes nos traditions orales et nos lйgendes.[PARAGRAPH:1]Ils ont besoin d'espace pour conserver les poteries, les tablettes de pierre et autres artefacts, et d'entrepфts spйciaux dans nos villes.
TEXT.German: Unsere дltesten Gelehrten haben sich zusammengeschlossen, um alle unsere ьberlieferten Traditionen zu sammeln, aufzuzeichnen und zu bewahren.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie verlangen groЯe Lagerrдume fьr Tцpferwaren, Steintafeln und andere Artefakte, sowie besondere Aufbewahrungsorte in unseren Stдdten.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri studiosi hanno collaborato nel tentativo di raccogliere, registrare e preservare tutte le nostre tradizioni e la letteratura orale.[PARAGRAPH:1]Hanno bisogno di spazio per immagazzinare ceramiche, tavolette di pietra e altri manufatti, oltre che speciali magazzini nelle cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros eruditos de mayor edad han colaborado en una iniciativa destinada a recolectar, registrar y conservar todas nuestras tradiciones no escritas y la literatura de transmisiуn oral.[PARAGRAPH:1]Necesitan espacio para almacenar objetos de alfarerнa, tablillas de piedra y otros artefactos, asн como depуsitos especiales dentro de nuestras ciudades.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ scholars have successfully recorded all of their oral traditions and stories in to a new compendium of literature, thereby completing the quest of Classic Literature!
TEXT.English: %s1_civ scholars have successfully recorded all of their oral traditions and stories in to a new compendium of literature, thereby completing the quest of Classic Literature!
TEXT.French: Les йrudits %s1_civ ont enregistrй avec succиs toutes leurs traditions et histoires orales dans un nouveau recueil de littйrature, achevant ainsi la quкte de la Littйrature Classique !
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ Gelehrte haben erfolgreich die gesamte mьndliche Tradition und alle Geschichten zu einer neuen Literatursammlung zusammengefasst und so die Quest "Klassische Literatur" erfьllt!
TEXT.Italian: Gli studiosi %s1_civ sono riusciti a registrare tutte le tradizioni orali e le storia in una nuova raccolta di letteratura, completando cosм l'impresa della Letteratura classica!
TEXT.Spanish: Eruditos del %s1_civ han logrado registrar todas sus tradiciones y relatos de transmisiуn oral en un nuevo compendio literario, ¡por lo que se ha cumplido la misiуn Literatura clбsica!

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your scholars and built for them enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to store their newly recorded works. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new treasure trove of written literature are able to provide to you.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your scholars and built for them enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to store their newly recorded works. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new treasure trove of written literature are able to provide to you.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez atteint les objectifs de vos йrudits et leur avez construit suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliothиques[COLOR_REVERT] pour entreposer leurs travaux nouvellement enregistrйs. Veuillez choisir une rйcompense parmi les avantages que votre nouveau trйsor de littйrature йcrite peut vous fournir.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben die Forderungen Ihrer Gelehrten erfьllt und genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotheken[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut, in denen sie ihre neuen Werke lagern kцnnen. Wдhlen Sie eine Belohnung aus den Vorteilen aus, die Ihr neuer Wissensschatz Ihnen bieten kann.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai raggiunto gli obiettivi dei tuoi studiosi, costruendo abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biblioteche[COLOR_REVERT] per ospitare il loro lavoro. Scegli una ricompensa tra quelle messe a disposizione dal nuovo tesoro di letteratura.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Se han cumplido los objetivos de los eruditos, que ahora disponen de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotecas[COLOR_REVERT] en las que guardar sus obras de nueva creaciуn. Elegid una de las recompensas que vuestro nuevo tesoro de la literatura escrita puede ofreceros.

TEXT.Russian: Classic Literature[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by our scholars to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to hold the newly recorded texts of our ancient stories and oral traditions.
TEXT.English: Classic Literature[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by our scholars to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] to hold the newly recorded texts of our ancient stories and oral traditions.
TEXT.French: Littйrature Classique[PARAGRAPH:1]Vos йrudits vous chargent de construire suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliothиques[COLOR_REVERT] pour accueillir les textes nouvellement enregistrйs de nos histoires anciennes et de nos traditions orales.
TEXT.German: Klassische Literatur[PARAGRAPH:1]Eure Gelehrten fordern von Euch, genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotheken[COLOR_REVERT] zu errichten, um die neu aufgezeichneten Texte der alten Geschichten und ьberlieferten Traditionen unterzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: Letteratura classica[PARAGRAPH:1]I nostri studiosi vogliono che tu costruisca abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biblioteche[COLOR_REVERT] per ospitare i testi appena realizzati con le nostre antiche storie e tradizioni orali.
TEXT.Spanish: Literatura clбsica[PARAGRAPH:1]Los eruditos han encargado la construcciуn de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotecas[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes para alojar los nuevos textos que contienen nuestras antiguas tradiciones y relatos de transmisiуn oral.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez construire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliothиques[COLOR_REVERT] dans diffйrentes villes.[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si vous contrфlez la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grande Bibliothиque[COLOR_REVERT] si et lorsque cette quкte est achevйe avec succиs.[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte avant vous ou si vous atteignez la Renaissance sans avoir rempli les conditions de victoire.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotheken[COLOR_REVERT] in Ihren Stдdten bauen. [PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn Sie bei Erfьllung der Quest die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]GroЯe Bibliothek[COLOR_REVERT] kontrollieren.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt oder wenn Sie die Renaissance erreichen, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Biblioteche[COLOR_REVERT] nelle tue cittа.[PARAGRAPH:1]Se controlli la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grande Biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT] ti verrа data un'ulteriore ricompensa, se e quando completerai l'impresa.[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se un'altra civiltа la completa per prima, o se raggiungerai il Rinascimento senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis construir %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bibliotecas[COLOR_REVERT] en vuestras diversas ciudades.[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si se ostenta el control de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gran Biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT] siempre y cuando esta misiуn se haya cumplido satisfactoriamente.[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes o si se alcanza la era del Renacimiento sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of Classic Literature.
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of Classic Literature.
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte de la Littйrature Classique.
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Klassische Literatur" ist gescheitert.
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa della Letteratura classica.
TEXT.Spanish: La misiуn Literatura clбsica ha fracasado.

TEXT.Russian: Our library with the largest repository of classic literature receives a research bonus.
TEXT.English: Our library with the largest repository of classic literature receives a research bonus.
TEXT.French: Notre bibliothиque avec la littйrature classique la plus importante reзoit un bonus de recherche.
TEXT.German: Die Bibliothek mit der grцЯten Auswahl klassischer Literatur bekommt einen Forschungsbonus.
TEXT.Italian: La nostra biblioteca col maggior numero di opere classiche riceve un bonus di ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestra biblioteca, dotada del mayor fondo de literatura clбsica, recibe una bonificaciуn de investigaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Discover and decipher lost knowledge from within some of the literature.
TEXT.English: Discover and decipher lost knowledge from within some of the literature.
TEXT.French: Dйcouvrir et dйcrypter les connaissances perdues а l'aide de la littйrature.
TEXT.German: Entdeckt und entziffert vergessenes Wissen aus der Literatur.
TEXT.Italian: Scopri e decifra conoscenza perduta, dalla letteratura a tua disposizione.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se descubra y se descifre el conocimiento perdido que contiene parte de la literatura.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Receive a random Technology from among Ancient Era techs not yet discovered.
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive a random Technology from among Ancient Era techs not yet discovered.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recevez une technologie alйatoire parmi les technologies perdues de l'Ere Ancienne.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Ihr erhaltet eine zufдllige Technologie aus der Antike, die noch nicht entdeckt wurde.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ricevi una tecnologia a caso tra le tecnologie dell'era antica che non hai ancora scoperto.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Recibir una tecnologнa al azar de las tecnologнas de la Antigьedad que todavнa no se han descubierto.

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] receives additional scholars to help boost research.
TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] receives additional scholars to help boost research.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Grande Bibliothиque[COLOR_REVERT] reзoit des йrudits supplйmentaires pour faire progresser la recherche.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Die GroЯe Bibliothek[COLOR_REVERT] erhдlt zusдtzliche Gelehrte, die die Forschung fцrdern.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grande Biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT] ottiene studiosi addizionali per incrementare la ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Gran Biblioteca[COLOR_REVERT] recibe eruditos adicionales para dar mayor impulso a la investigaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: The master blacksmith in %s2_city has offered to take on and train multiple apprentices if the government will build new forges for them to operate once their training has been completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities to accommodate the master's new students.
TEXT.English: The master blacksmith in %s2_city has offered to take on and train multiple apprentices if the government will build new forges for them to operate once their training has been completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities to accommodate the master's new students.
TEXT.French: Le maоtre forgeron de %s2_city a proposй d'entraоner plusieurs apprentis si le gouvernement construit de nouvelles forges pour que ceux-ci exercent une fois leur apprentissage achevй.[PARAGRAPH:1]Nous aurons besoin de construire suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] dans nos villes pour accueillir les nouveaux apprentis du maоtre.
TEXT.German: Der Meisterschmied der Stadt %s2_city hat angeboten, mehrere Lehrlinge gleichzeitig auszubilden, wenn die Regierung neue Schmieden baut, in denen die Lehrlinge nach der Ausbildung arbeiten kцnnen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Wir mьssen genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schmieden[COLOR_REVERT] in unseren Stдdten bauen, um die neuen Gesellen zu versorgen.
TEXT.Italian: Il maestro fabbro di %s2_city si и offerto di accettare e di addestrare piщ apprendisti, se il governo costruirа le fucine necessarie a farli lavorare, una volta che l'addestramento sarа terminato.[PARAGRAPH:1]Abbiamo bisogno di costruire abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fucine[COLOR_REVERT] nelle nostre cittа per accogliere i nuovi studenti del maestro.
TEXT.Spanish: El maestro herrero de %s2_city se ha ofrecido a acoger e instruir a varios aprendices si el gobierno construye nuevas forjas en las que ocuparlos una vez su entrenamiento concluya.[PARAGRAPH:1]Tendremos que construir suficientes [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forjas[COLOR_REVERT] en nuestras ciudades para alojar a los nuevos estudiantes del maestro.

TEXT.Russian: The Master Blacksmith[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the master blacksmith to build enough new [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] to provide acceptable working environments for all the students to whom he intends to pass on his trade secrets.
TEXT.English: The Master Blacksmith[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the master blacksmith to build enough new [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] to provide acceptable working environments for all the students to whom he intends to pass on his trade secrets.
TEXT.French: Le Maоtre Forgeron[PARAGRAPH:1]Le maоtre forgeron vous charge de construire suffisamment de nouvelles [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] pour fournir un environnement de travail acceptable а tous les apprentis а qui il compte transmettre ses secrets.
TEXT.German: Der Meisterschmied[PARAGRAPH:1]Der Meisterschmied fordert, dass Ihr genug neue [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schmieden[COLOR_REVERT] baut, um all jenen entsprechende Arbeitsplдtze zu bieten, an die er seine Geheimnisse weitergibt.
TEXT.Italian: Maestro fabbro[PARAGRAPH:1]Il maestro fabbro ti incarica di costruire abbastanza nuove [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fucine[COLOR_REVERT], in modo da fornire ambienti di lavoro accettabili a tutti gli studenti a cui trasmetterа i segreti della sua arte.
TEXT.Spanish: El maestro herrero[PARAGRAPH:1]El maestro herrero ha encargado la construcciуn de nuevas [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forjas[COLOR_REVERT] para proporcionar un entorno de trabajo aceptable a los estudiantes a quienes planea transmitir los secretos del oficio.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build a total of %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities. This may include Forges already completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]The master smith is a religious man. An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion if and when the quest is completed successfully.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, if you lose control over %s2_city and the master smith, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build a total of %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] in your various cities. This may include Forges already completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]The master smith is a religious man. An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has a state religion if and when the quest is completed successfully.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, if you lose control over %s2_city and the master smith, or if you reach the Renaissance Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez construire un total de %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] dans vos diffйrentes villes. Cela comprend les Forges dйjа construites.[PARAGRAPH:1]Le maоtre forgeron est un homme croyant. Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si votre civilisation a une religion d'йtat si et lorsque cette quкte est achevйe avec succиs.[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte avant vous, si vous perdez le contrфle de la ville : %s2_city et du maоtre forgeron ou si vous atteignez la Renaissance sans avoir rempli les conditions de victoire.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie insgesamt %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schmieden[COLOR_REVERT] in Ihren Stдdten bauen. Bereits fertige Schmieden werden mit einberechnet.[PARAGRAPH:1]Der Meisterschmied ist ein religiцser Mann. Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn Sie bei Erfьllung der Quest eine Staatsreligion haben.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen erfьllt, wenn Sie die Kontrolle ьber die Stadt %s2_city und den Meisterschmied verlieren oder wenn Sie die Renaissance erreichen, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire un totale di %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fucine[COLOR_REVERT] nelle tue cittа. Il numero puт includere anche fucine giа completate.[PARAGRAPH:1]Il maestro fabbro и un uomo religioso. Otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa se la tua civiltа avrа una religione di stato, se e quando completerai l'impresa.[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se un'altra civiltа la completa per prima, se perderai il controllo di %s2_city e del maestro fabbro, o se raggiungerai il Rinascimento senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis construir un total de %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forjas[COLOR_REVERT] en vuestras diversas ciudades. El total puede incluir las forjas ya terminadas.[PARAGRAPH:1]El maestro herrero es un hombre religioso. Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn posee una religiуn oficial, siempre y cuando la misiуn se haya cumplido satisfactoriamente.[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes, si se pierde el control de %s2_city y del maestro herrero o si se alcanza la era del Renacimiento sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your master blacksmith and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] for each for his students to have his own to operate. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new metalworking empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your master blacksmith and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] for each for his students to have his own to operate. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new metalworking empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez atteint les objectifs de votre maоtre forgeron et construit suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] pour que chacun de ses apprentis puisse exercer. Veuillez choisir une rйcompense parmi les avantages que votre nouvel empire de la ferronnerie peut vous fournir.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben die Forderungen des Meisterschmieds erfьllt und genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schmieden[COLOR_REVERT] fьr alle seine Gesellen gebaut. Wдhlen Sie eine Belohnung aus den Vorteilen aus, die Ihr neues Schmiedeimperium Ihnen bieten kann.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai raggiunto gli obiettivi del maestro fabbro, costruendo abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fucine[COLOR_REVERT] da far sм che ognuno dei suoi studenti abbia la propria. Scegli una ricompensa tra quelle messe a disposizione dal tuo nuovo impero metallurgico.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Se han cumplido los objetivos del maestro herrero y se han construido [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forjas[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes para que cada uno de los estudiantes tenga una en la que trabajar. Elegid una de las recompensas que vuestro nuevo imperio de la forja del metal puede ofreceros.

TEXT.Russian: The skilled %s1_civ_adjective metalworkers have completed the quest of The Master Blacksmith!
TEXT.English: The skilled %s1_civ_adjective metalworkers have completed the quest of The Master Blacksmith!
TEXT.French: Les adroits travailleurs du mйtal %s1:4_civ_adjective ont achevй la quкte du Maоtre Forgeron !

TEXT.Spanish: ¡Los hбbiles trabajadores del metal %s1:3_civ_adjective han completado la misiуn El maestro herrero!

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of The Master Blacksmith.
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of The Master Blacksmith.
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte du Maоtre Forgeron.
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Der Meisterschmied" ist gescheitert.
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa del Maestro fabbro.
TEXT.Spanish: La misiуn El maestro herrero ha fracasado.

TEXT.Russian: Use our advantage to discover a new source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.English: Use our advantage to discover a new source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Utilisons notre avantage pour dйcouvrir une nouvelle source de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cuivre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Setzt unseren Vorteil zur Entdeckung einer neuen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kupfer[COLOR_REVERT]quelle ein.
TEXT.Italian: Usa il nostro vantaggio per scoprire una nuova fonte di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rame[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestra ventaja se utilice para descubrir una nueva fuente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cobre[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Russian: Our metalworking empire should be leveraged into producing stronger weaponry.
TEXT.English: Our metalworking empire should be leveraged into producing stronger weaponry.
TEXT.French: Notre empire de la ferronnerie devrait produire un armement plus puissant.
TEXT.German: Unser Schmiedeimperium sollte dazu genutzt werden, um stдrkere Waffen zu produzieren.
TEXT.Italian: Bisognerebbe spingere il nostro impero metallurgico a produrre armi piщ potenti.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro imperio de la forja del metal debe ser aprovechado para producir un armamento mбs potente.

TEXT.Russian: The master's best student will be granted control over his forge when he retires, launching a tradition of metalcasting excellence in that city.
TEXT.English: The master's best student will be granted control over his forge when he retires, launching a tradition of metalcasting excellence in that city.
TEXT.French: Le meilleur йtudiant du maоtre dirigera sa forge lorsque ce dernier prendra sa retraite, ce qui sera le dйbut d'une tradition d'excellence de la ferronnerie dans cette ville.
TEXT.German: Der beste Lehrling des Meisterschmieds wird seine Schmiede ьbernehmen, wenn der Meister in den Ruhestand geht, und so die Tradition der Metallbearbeitung in dieser Stadt weiterfьhren.
TEXT.Italian: I migliori studenti del maestro otterranno il controllo della sua fucina, quando si ritirerа, cominciando una tradizione di grande metallurgia nella sua cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: El mejor estudiante del maestro pasarб a controlar su forja cuando йste se retire, iniciбndose de este modo una tradiciуn de excelencia en la forja del metal.

TEXT.Russian: Our generals request government aid in expanding our fortifications.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] to satisfy their views on mounting a proper defense for our nation.
TEXT.English: Our generals request government aid in expanding our fortifications.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] to satisfy their views on mounting a proper defense for our nation.
TEXT.French: Nos gйnйraux demandent une aide gouvernementale pour йtendre nos fortifications.[PARAGRAPH:1]Nous devrons construire suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chвteaux[COLOR_REVERT] pour satisfaire leurs dйsirs d'йriger une dйfense efficace pour notre nation.
TEXT.German: Unsere Generдle verlangen die Hilfe der Regierung bei der Ausdehnung unserer Befestigungsanlagen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Wir mьssen genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schlцsser[COLOR_REVERT] bauen, um unsere Nation ausreichend zu schьtzen.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri generali richiedono l'aiuto del governo per espandere le fortificazioni.[PARAGRAPH:1]Abbiamo bisogno di costruire abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castelli[COLOR_REVERT] per soddisfare la loro idea di un'adeguata difesa per la nostra nazione.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros generales solicitan la ayuda del gobierno para ampliar nuestras fortificaciones.[PARAGRAPH:1]Necesitamos construir [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castillos[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes para satisfacer sus planes defensivos para nuestra naciуn.

TEXT.Russian: The Best Defense[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your armed forces to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] for them to ward off invasion effectively.
TEXT.English: The Best Defense[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your armed forces to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] for them to ward off invasion effectively.
TEXT.French: La Meilleure Dйfense[PARAGRAPH:1]Vos forces armйes vous chargent de construire suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chвteaux[COLOR_REVERT] pour qu'ils puissent йcarter efficacement les invasions.
TEXT.German: Die beste Verteidigung[PARAGRAPH:1]Eure Armee hat Euch aufgetragen, genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schlцsser[COLOR_REVERT] zu bauen, um eine Invasion wirkungsvoll abzuwehren.
TEXT.Italian: Miglior difesa[PARAGRAPH:1]Hai ricevuto il compito, dalle tue forze armate, di costruire abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castelli[COLOR_REVERT] da poter respingere efficacemente un'invasione.
TEXT.Spanish: La mejor defensa[PARAGRAPH:1]Las fuerzas armadas han encargado la construcciуn de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castillos[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes para repeler una invasiуn de forma eficaz.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] in your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls the Great Wall.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] in your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls the Great Wall.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez construire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chвteaux[COLOR_REVERT] dans vos villes.[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si votre civilisation contrфle la Grande Muraille.[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte avant vous ou si vous dйcouvrez le [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusil[COLOR_REVERT], le [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemin de Fer[COLOR_REVERT] ou les [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Sciences Economiques[COLOR_REVERT] sans avoir rempli les conditions de victoire.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schlцsser[COLOR_REVERT] in Ihren Stдdten bauen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn Sie bei Erfьllung der Quest die GroЯe Mauer kontrollieren. [PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt oder wenn Sie die Technologie [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Drall[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Eisenbahn[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Wirtschaftswesen[COLOR_REVERT] entdecken, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castelli[COLOR_REVERT] nelle tue cittа.[PARAGRAPH:1]Se la tua civiltа controlla la Grande Muraglia otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa.[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se un'altra civiltа la completa per prima, o se scoprirai [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rigatura delle canne[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ferrovia[COLOR_REVERT] o [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economia[COLOR_REVERT] senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis construir %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castillos[COLOR_REVERT] en vuestras ciudades.[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn controla la Gran Muralla.[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes o si descubres el [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusil[COLOR_REVERT], el [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ferrocarril[COLOR_REVERT] o la [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economнa[COLOR_REVERT] sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: The sturdy %s1_civ_adjective people have completed The Best Defense quest!
TEXT.English: The sturdy %s1_civ_adjective people have completed The Best Defense quest!
TEXT.French: Le robuste peuple %s1_civ_adjective a achevй la quкte de La Meilleure Dйfense !

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your military planners and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] to serve as fortresses against invaders. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your defense is able to provide to you.

TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben die Forderungen Ihrer Militдrstrategen erfьllt und genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schlцsser[COLOR_REVERT] gebaut, die es Invasoren schwer machen. Wдhlen Sie eine Belohnung aus den Vorteilen aus, die Ihre neue Verteidigung Ihnen bieten kann.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of The Best Defense

TEXT.Russian: Use our advantage to help better train our forces.

TEXT.French: Utiliser notre avantage pour mieux entraоner nos troupes.
TEXT.German: Setzt unseren Vorteil ein, um unsere Truppen besser auszubilden.
TEXT.Italian: Usa il nostro vantaggio per addestrare meglio le nostre forze.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestra ventaja se utilice para entrenar mejor a nuestras fuerzas.

TEXT.Russian: Leverage our defensive advantage in to political capital.

TEXT.Italian: Trasforma il nostro vantaggio difensivo in capitale politico.
TEXT.Spanish: Rentabilicemos nuestra ventaja defensiva en forma de capital polнtico.

TEXT.Russian: Now that we are safe, focus on learning what others are planning.
TEXT.English: Now that we are safe, focus on learning what others are planning.
TEXT.French: Maintenant que nous sommes en sйcuritй, concentrons-nous sur ce que manigancent les autres.
TEXT.German: Nun, da wir in Sicherheit sind, konzentriert Euch darauf herauszufinden, was die anderen planen.
TEXT.Italian: Ora che siamo al sicuro, cerca di scoprire cosa pianificano gli altri.
TEXT.Spanish: Ahora que estamos a salvo, concentrйmonos en averiguar lo que otros estбn planeando.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude from all leaders
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recevez [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] attitude des autre dirigeants
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verbessert die Haltung aller Staatsoberhдupter um [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Recibir [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%D1[COLOR_REVERT] de actitud de todos los lнderes.

TEXT.Russian: Our cultural advisors believe that our nation could benefit from city-based sports franchises if we built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT] to support national sports leagues.[PARAGRAPH:1]Each major city would require its own facility in which its teams could play.
TEXT.English: Our cultural advisors believe that our nation could benefit from city-based sports franchises if we built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT] to support national sports leagues.[PARAGRAPH:1]Each major city would require its own facility in which its teams could play.
TEXT.French: Nos conseillers culturels pensent que notre nation pourrait profiter des franchises sportives dans les villes si nous construisons suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colisйes[COLOR_REVERT] pour soutenir les ligues sportives nationales.[PARAGRAPH:1]Chaque grande ville aura besoin de ses propres installations pour que ses йquipes puissent jouer.
TEXT.German: Unsere Kulturberater meinen, dass unsere Nation von stadtbezogenen Sportlizenzen profitieren kцnnte, wenn wir genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kolosseen[COLOR_REVERT] bauen, um eine nationale Sportliga zu unterstьtzen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Jede grцЯere Stadt wьrde ihr eigenes Gebдude benцtigen, in dem das Team spielen kцnnte.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri consiglieri culturali sostengono che la nostra nazione trarrebbe beneficio dalla presenza di squadre cittadine, se costruissimo abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossei[COLOR_REVERT] da supportare campionati sportivi nazionali.[PARAGRAPH:1]Ogni grande cittа avrа bisogno del proprio impianto sportivo, in cui potranno giocare le sue squadre.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros consejeros culturales creen que nuestra naciуn podrнa beneficiarse de franquicias deportivas con sede en una ciudad si construyйsemos suficientes [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coliseos[COLOR_REVERT] para dar apoyo a las ligas deportivas nacionales.[PARAGRAPH:1]Cada una de las principales ciudades deberнa disponer de instalaciones propias donde los equipos pudiesen jugar.

TEXT.Russian: National Sports League[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your cultural advisors to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT] to support viable sports leagues.
TEXT.English: National Sports League[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your cultural advisors to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT] to support viable sports leagues.
TEXT.French: Ligue Sportive Nationale.[PARAGRAPH:1]Vos conseillers culturels vous chargent de construire suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colisйes[COLOR_REVERT] pour soutenir des ligues sportives viables.
TEXT.German: Nationale Sportliga[PARAGRAPH:1]Eure Kulturberater tragen Euch auf, genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kolosseen[COLOR_REVERT] zu bauen, um nationale Sportereignisse zu unterstьtzen.
TEXT.Italian: Campionato nazionale[PARAGRAPH:1]Hai ricevuto il compito, dai tuoi consiglieri culturali, di costruire abbastanza [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossei[COLOR_REVERT] da supportare campionati sportivi nazionali.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT] in your cities.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if you control [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] if and when this quest is successfully completed.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Modern Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez construire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colisйes[COLOR_REVERT] dans vos villes.[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si vous contrфlez le bвtiment : [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] si et lorsque cette quкte est achevйe avec succиs.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kolosseen[COLOR_REVERT] in Ihren Stдdten bauen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn Sie bei Erfьllung der Quest das Gebдude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] kontrollieren.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt oder wenn Sie die Moderne erreichen, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossei[COLOR_REVERT] nelle tue cittа.[PARAGRAPH:1]Se controlli [NUM2:il:la] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] ti verrа data un'ulteriore ricompensa, se e quando completerai l'impresa.[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se un'altra civiltа la completa per prima, o se raggiungerai l'era moderna senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis construir %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coliseos[COLOR_REVERT] en vuestras ciudades.[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si se ostenta el control [NUM2:del:de la:de los:de las] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] siempre y cuando esta misiуn se haya cumplido satisfactoriamente.[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes o si se alcanza la era Moderna sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective cities have built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT] to complete the National Sports League quest, strengthening their social fabric and their national identity.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your sports entrepreneurs and built enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT] to support viable leagues. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new national pastimes can provide to you.

TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez atteint les objectifs de vos entrepreneurs sportifs et construit suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colisйes[COLOR_REVERT] pour soutenir des ligues viables. Veuillez choisir une rйcompense parmi les avantages que vos passe-temps nationaux peuvent vous fournir.

TEXT.Spanish: Un apreciado caudillo que opera desde el castillo de %s2_city se ha ofrecido a sufragar la creaciуn de una academia militar especial.

TEXT.Russian: We have no need of his services. Ask him instead to donate his money to the state.
TEXT.English: We have no need of his services. Ask him instead to donate his money to the state.
TEXT.French: Nous n'avons pas besoin de ses services. Demandons-lui de donner plutфt son argent а l'йtat.
TEXT.German: Wir haben keine Verwendung fьr seine Dienste. Bittet ihn stattdessen, sein Geld dem Staat zu spenden.
TEXT.Italian: Non abbiamo bisogno dei suoi servigi. Chiediamogli piuttosto di donare il denaro allo stato.
TEXT.Spanish: No necesitamos sus servicios. En vez de hacer eso, que done el dinero al estado.

TEXT.Russian: Excellent! Have him train Pikeman units for us.
TEXT.English: Excellent! Have him train Pikeman units for us.

TEXT.German: Ausgezeichnet! Er soll Pikeniere fьr uns ausbilden.

TEXT.Russian: Superb! Have all our military recruits in that city undergo a training regimen at the new academy.
TEXT.English: Superb! Have all our military recruits in that city undergo a training regimen at the new academy.
TEXT.French: Superbe ! Faisons subir а toutes les recrues militaires de cette ville un rйgime d'entraоnement а la nouvelle acadйmie.
TEXT.German: GroЯartig! Alle unsere Militдrrekruten in dieser Stadt sollen eine Ausbildung in der neuen Akademie absolvieren.
TEXT.Italian: Superbo! Che tutte le nostre reclute in quella cittа facciano un turno di addestramento alla nuova accademia.
