TEXT.Russian: Vermin got in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there was ruined.
TEXT.English: Vermin got in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there was ruined.
TEXT.French: La vermine a infestй les greniers de la ville : %s2_city. Toute la nourriture qui y йtait stockйe a йtй perdue.
TEXT.German: Ungeziefer ist in den Kornspeicher von %s2_city gelangt. Alle dort gelagerten Nahrungsvorrдte wurden vernichtet.
TEXT.Italian: I ratti si sono intrufolati nel granaio a %s2_city. Tutto il cibo immagazzinato и stato rovinato.
TEXT.Spanish: Las alimaсas entraron en el granero de %s2_city. Toda la comida que allн habнa almacenada se ha perdido.

TEXT.Russian: Vermin have gotten in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there is spoiled.
TEXT.English: Vermin have gotten in to the granary in %s2_city. All the food stored there is spoiled.
TEXT.French: la vermine a infestй les greniers de la ville : %s2_city. Toute la nourriture stockйe ici est gвtйe.
TEXT.German: Ungeziefer ist in den Kornspeicher von %s2_city gelangt. Alle dort gelagerten Nahrungsvorrдte sind verdorben.
TEXT.Italian: I ratti si sono intrufolati nel granaio a %s2_city. Tutto il cibo immagazzinato и stato danneggiato.
TEXT.Spanish: Las alimaсas han entrado en el granero de %s2_city. Toda la comida que allн habнa almacenada se ha echado a perder.

TEXT.Russian: That sounds like bad news, but what can we do? Nothing.
TEXT.English: That sounds like bad news, but what can we do? Nothing.
TEXT.French: Ce sont des mauvaises nouvelles, mais qu'y faire ? Rien.
TEXT.German: Das sind schlechte Nachrichten, aber was kцnnen wir dagegen tun? Nichts.
TEXT.Italian: Sembrano brutte notizie, ma cosa ci possiamo fare? Niente.
TEXT.Spanish: Son malas noticias, pero ¿quй podemos hacer? Nada.

TEXT.Russian: Pay to have the lost grain replaced.
TEXT.English: Pay to have the lost grain replaced.
TEXT.French: Payer pour remplacer le grain perdu.
TEXT.German: Bezahlt und ersetzt das verlorene Getreide.
TEXT.Italian: Paga affinchй il grano perduto sia sostituito.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se pague la reposiciуn de los cereales perdidos.

TEXT.Russian: The hospital in %s2_city is gaining favor among the pious because it is believed to be blessed by a spirit angel.
TEXT.English: The hospital in %s2_city is gaining favor among the pious because it is believed to be blessed by a spirit angel.
TEXT.French: L'hфpital de la ville : %s2_city gagne les faveurs des pieux car il est supposй avoir йtй bйni par un ange.
TEXT.German: Das Krankenhaus in %s2_city findet zunehmend Gefallen unter den Glдubigen, da es von einem Engel gesegnet sein soll.
TEXT.Italian: L'ospedale di %s2_city sta diventando il favorito dei fedeli, perchй si crede che sia benedetto da un angelo.
TEXT.Spanish: El hospital de %s2_city se estб ganando el favor de los devotos porque creen que estб bendecido por un бngel.

TEXT.Russian: Rumors that a spirit angel of mercy is watching over the patients in the hospital in %s2_city are leading many devout believers to seek treatment there.
TEXT.English: Rumors that a spirit angel of mercy is watching over the patients in the hospital in %s2_city are leading many devout believers to seek treatment there.
TEXT.French: Grвce а des rumeurs selon lesquelles un ange misйricordieux prend soin des patients de l'hфpital de la ville : %s2_city, de nombreux croyants viennent s'y faire soigner.
TEXT.German: Die Gerьchte, dass ein Engel der Barmherzigkeit ьber die Patienten des Krankenhauses in %s2_city wacht, bewirken, dass viele fromme Glдubige sich dort einer Behandlung unterziehen.
TEXT.Italian: Corrono voci che un angelo misericordioso vegli sui pazienti nell'ospedale di %s2_city e molti devoti cercano di venirci ricoverati.
TEXT.Spanish: Muchos devotos creyentes acuden en busca de tratamiento al hospital de %s2_city tras escuchar los rumores de que un бngel misericordioso cuida de los pacientes que allн se encuentran.

TEXT.Russian: The extra patients will enhance city revenue.
TEXT.English: The extra patients will enhance city revenue.
TEXT.French: Les patients supplйmentaires vont amйliorer les revenus de la ville.
TEXT.German: Die zusдtzlichen Patienten werden die Einnahmen der Stadt erhцhen.
TEXT.Italian: I pazienti extra aumenteranno le entrate della cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: Los pacientes extra mejorarбn los ingresos de la ciudad.

TEXT.Russian: We could sanction the hospital as a state holy site. This may please the local populace.
TEXT.English: We could sanction the hospital as a state holy site. This may please the local populace.
TEXT.French: Nous pouvons faire de l'hфpital un lieu saint national. Cela fera plaisir а la population locale.
TEXT.German: Wir kцnnen das Krankenhaus zu einer staatlichen heiligen Stдtte machen. Darьber kцnnte sich die einheimische Bevцlkerung freuen.
TEXT.Italian: Potremmo riconoscere l'ospedale come luogo sacro. Potrebbe far piacere alla popolazione locale.
TEXT.Spanish: Podrнamos declarar el hospital como un lugar santo del estado. Esto posiblemente agradarнa a la poblaciуn local.

TEXT.Russian: A pilot from %s2_city has inspired pride amongst the %s1_civ_adjective people by becoming the first to fly solo over the North Pole.
TEXT.English: A pilot from %s2_city has inspired pride amongst the %s1_civ_adjective people by becoming the first to fly solo over the North Pole.
TEXT.French: Un pilote de la ville : %s2_city a inspirй la fiertй des %s1:2_civ_adjective en devenant le premier homme а voler en solitaire au-dessus du Pфle Nord.
TEXT.German: Ein Pilot aus %s2_city hat den Stolz des %s1:2_civ_adjective Volks erweckt, als er im Alleingang ьber den Nordpol geflogen ist.
TEXT.Italian: Un pilota di %s2_city ha inorgoglito la popolazione %s1_civ_adjective avendo sorvolato per primo il Polo Nord da solo.
TEXT.Spanish: Un piloto de %s2_city ha despertado el orgullo del pueblo %s1:1_civ_adjective al convertirse en el primero en sobrevolar el Polo Norte en solitario.

TEXT.Russian: A pilot from %s2_city has become the first to fly solo over the North Pole and return safely.
TEXT.English: A pilot from %s2_city has become the first to fly solo over the North Pole and return safely.
TEXT.French: Un pilote de la ville : %s2_city est devenu le premier homme а voler en solitaire au-dessus du Pфle Nord et а revenir sain et sauf.
TEXT.German: Ein Pilot aus %s2_city ist erstmals alleine ьber den Nordpol geflogen und sicher zurьckgekehrt.
TEXT.Italian: Un pilota di %s2_city ha sorvolato il Polo Nord in solitaria ed и tornato tutto intero.
TEXT.Spanish: Un piloto de %s2_city se ha convertido en el primero que sobrevuela el Polo Norte en solitario y regresa sano y salvo.

TEXT.Russian: Set up a monument at the airport to produce tourism.
TEXT.English: Set up a monument at the airport to produce tourism.
TEXT.French: Eriger un monument а l'aйroport pour encourager le tourisme.
TEXT.German: Errichtet ein Denkmal am Flughafen, um den Tourismus anzukurbeln.
TEXT.Italian: Erigi un monumento all'aeroporto per produrre turismo.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se coloque un monumento en el aeropuerto para que genere turismo.

TEXT.Russian: An industrial accident started a fire that gutted the Factory in %s2_city.
TEXT.English: An industrial accident started a fire that gutted the Factory in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un accident industriel a dйclenchй un incendie qui a ravagй l'Usine de la ville : %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Bei einem Industrieunfall brach ein Feuer aus, aufgrund dessen die Fabrik in %s2_city ausgebrannt ist.
TEXT.Italian: Un incidente industriale ha causato un incendio che ha distrutto la fabbrica a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un accidente industrial ha provocado un incendio. La fбbrica de %s2_city ha sido pasto de las llamas.

TEXT.Russian: A fire at the Factory in %s2_city, which was started by a worker's mistake, has gutted the building.
TEXT.English: A fire at the Factory in %s2_city, which was started by a worker's mistake, has gutted the building.
TEXT.French: Suite а l'erreur d'un ouvrier, l'Usine de la ville : %s2_city a йtй dйtruite par un incendie.
TEXT.German: Aufgrund eines Feuers in der Fabrik in %s2_city, das durch das Fehlverhalten eines Arbeiters ausgelцst wurde, ist das Gebдude ausgebrannt.
TEXT.Italian: Un incendio nella fabbrica di %s2_city, scoppiato a causa dell'errore di un operaio, ha distrutto l'edificio.
TEXT.Spanish: Un incendio en la fбbrica de %s2_city, provocado por el fallo de un trabajador, ha consumido el edificio.

TEXT.Russian: Emphasize improved safety so that this particular type of accident should never happen again.
TEXT.English: Emphasize improved safety so that this particular type of accident should never happen again.
TEXT.French: Souligner le besoin de sйcuritй accrue pour que ce type d'accident ne se reproduise plus.
TEXT.German: Legt mehr Wert auf verbesserte Sicherheit, damit so ein Unfall nie wieder passiert.
TEXT.Italian: Dai piщ importanza alla sicurezza, in modo che questo tipo di incidente non possa piщ accadere.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se recalque la importancia de mejorar la seguridad para que nunca se repita un accidente de estas caracterнsticas concretas.

TEXT.Russian: Fund an emergency rebuilding effort.
TEXT.English: Fund an emergency rebuilding effort.
TEXT.French: Mettre tout en oeuvre pour reconstruire.
TEXT.German: Finanziert einen Wiederaufbauplan.
TEXT.Italian: Finanzia una ricostruzione d'emergenza.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se financie un plan de reconstrucciуn de emergencia.

TEXT.Russian: A scientific breakthrough at the laboratory in %s2_city is credited in part to the free flow of ideas and information nurtured by the %s1_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.English: A scientific breakthrough at the laboratory in %s2_city is credited in part to the free flow of ideas and information nurtured by the %s1_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.French: Une dйcouverte scientifique au laboratoire de la ville : %s2_city est en partie attribuйe au flot d'idйes et d'informations encouragйes par le gouvernement %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Ein wissenschaftlicher Durchbruch im Labor in %s2_city wird zum Teil dem freien Ideen- und Informationsfluss zugeschrieben, der von der %s1:2_civ_adjective Regierung gefцrdert wird.
TEXT.Italian: Una scoperta scientifica nel laboratorio di %s2_city и dovuta in parte alla libera circolazione di idee e informazioni alimentata dal governo %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Un gran avance cientнfico que ha tenido lugar en el laboratorio de %s2_city se atribuye en parte al libre flujo de ideas e informaciуn fomentado por el gobierno %s1:1_civ_adjective

TEXT.Russian: A scientific breakthrough has occurred at the Laboratory in %s2_city.
TEXT.English: A scientific breakthrough has occurred at the Laboratory in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Une dйcouverte scientifique a eu lieu au laboratoire de la ville : %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Im Labor in %s2_city hat es einen wissenschaftlichen Durchbruch gegeben.
TEXT.Italian: C'и stata una scoperta scientifica nel laboratorio di %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un avance cientнfico ha tenido lugar en el laboratorio de %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: This should speed our current research.
TEXT.English: This should speed our current research.
TEXT.French: Cela devrait accйlйrer nos recherches actuelles.
TEXT.German: Damit sollte unsere aktuelle Forschung beschleunigt werden.
TEXT.Italian: Dovrebbe velocizzare la nostra ricerca in corso.
TEXT.Spanish: Esto acelerarб nuestras investigaciones.

TEXT.Russian: A retiring %s1_civ_adjective naval captain has pledged his expertise to assist the Drydock located in %s2_city.
TEXT.English: A retiring %s1_civ_adjective naval captain has pledged his expertise to assist the Drydock located in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un capitaine de marine %s1_civ_adjective а la retraite a mis son expertise au service des cales sиches de la ville : %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein %s1:3_civ_adjectiver Schiffskapitдn im Ruhestand stellt im Trockendock von %s2_city sein Fachwissen zur Verfьgung.
TEXT.Italian: Un capitano %s1_civ_adjective che sta andando in pensione ha offerto la propria esperienza per collaborare col cantiere navale di %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un capitбn naval %s1:1_civ_adjective retirado se ha ofrecido a colaborar con su experiencia en el astillero ubicado en %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: A retiring captain from one of our most elite naval vessels has pledged his wisdom and abilities toward shipbuilding at the drydock in %s2_city.
TEXT.English: A retiring captain from one of our most elite naval vessels has pledged his wisdom and abilities toward shipbuilding at the drydock in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Le capitaine а la retraite de l'un de nos meilleurs navires a mis ses connaissances et son expйrience au service de la construction de la cale sиche dans la ville : %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein im Ruhestand befindlicher Kapitдn eines unserer besten Schiffe stellt sein Wissen und seine Fдhigkeiten fьr den Schiffbau im Trockendock von %s2_city zur Verfьgung.
TEXT.Italian: Il capitano di uno dei nostri migliori vascelli sta andando in pensione e ha offerto la propria saggezza e capacitа per aiutare nella costruzione di navi presso il cantiere navale di %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un capitбn retirado de un destacado navнo de йlite ha puesto sus conocimientos y aptitudes al servicio de la construcciуn de barcos en el astillero de %s2_city.

TEXT.Russian: The reputation boost should enhance revenues.
TEXT.English: The reputation boost should enhance revenues.
TEXT.French: La rйputation croissante devrait amйliorer les revenus.
TEXT.German: Das erhцhte Ansehen sollte die Einnahmen steigern.
TEXT.Italian: L'incremento di reputazione dovrebbe aumentare le entrate.
TEXT.Spanish: Es de esperar que la mejora en la reputaciуn aumente los ingresos.

TEXT.Russian: We should fund an effort to translate his experience into a format that can be passed on to future generations.
TEXT.English: We should fund an effort to translate his experience into a format that can be passed on to future generations.
TEXT.French: Nous devrions faire en sorte de consigner cette expйrience pour pouvoir la transmettre aux gйnйrations futures.
TEXT.German: Wir sollten uns darum bemьhen, einen Weg zu finden, seine Erfahrung an zukьnftige Generationen weiterzugeben.
TEXT.Italian: Dovremmo finanziare il tentativo di trasformare le sue esperienze in un formato che possa essere trasmesso alle generazioni future.
TEXT.Spanish: Deberнamos financiar un plan para que su experiencia quede registrada en algъn formato que pueda ser transmitido a las futuras generaciones.

TEXT.Russian: The thoroughly religious %s1_civ_adjective state is dealing with an outbreak of heresy in some segments of its population.
TEXT.English: The thoroughly religious %s1_civ_adjective state is dealing with an outbreak of heresy in some segments of its population.
TEXT.French: L'йtat religieux %s1_civ_adjective fait face а une hйrйsie naissante chez certaines catйgories de population.
TEXT.German: Der strengglдubige %s1:3_civ_adjective Staat hat mit einem Ausbruch von Ketzerei in manchen Teilen der Bevцlkerung zu kдmpfen.
TEXT.Italian: Lo stato %s1_civ_adjective, altamente religioso, sta affrontando un'ondata di eresia in alcuni segmenti della propria popolazione.
TEXT.Spanish: El estado %s1:1_civ_adjective, de profundas convicciones religiosas, se estб ocupando de los brotes de herejнa que han surgido en algunos segmentos de su poblaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: A heretical spiritual movement has started in %s2_city and is gaining strength among some sections of our populace.
TEXT.English: A heretical spiritual movement has started in %s2_city and is gaining strength among some sections of our populace.
TEXT.French: Un mouvement spirituel hйrйtique a commencй dans la ville : %s2_city et gagne du terrain au sein d'une partie de la population.
TEXT.German: Eine ketzerische spirituelle Bewegung hat sich in %s2_city gebildet und gewinnt Einfluss in manchen Teilen unserer Bevцlkerung.
TEXT.Italian: Un movimento spirituale eretico и nato a %s2_city e sta acquistando forza presso alcuni segmenti della nostra popolazione.
TEXT.Spanish: En %s2_city se ha iniciado un movimiento espiritual hereje que estб ganando fuerza en algunos sectores de la poblaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Suppress the heresy! Then launch a drive to remind our people that we already adhere to the one true faith.
TEXT.English: Suppress the heresy! Then launch a drive to remind our people that we already adhere to the one true faith.
TEXT.French: Eradiquer l'hйrйsie puis mener une action pour rappeler а notre peuple que nous n'adhйrons qu'а la seule vraie foi.
TEXT.German: Macht der Ketzerei ein Ende! Dann startet eine Kampagne, um unser Volk daran zu erinnern, dass wir uns bereits an den einen wahren Glauben halten.
TEXT.Italian: Sopprimi l'eresia! Poi lancia una campagna per ricordare alla nostra gente che seguiamo giа l'unica vera fede!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Que la herejнa sea eliminada! Y que luego se inicie una campaсa que recuerde a los nuestros que ya hemos elegido nuestra ъnica y verdadera fe.

TEXT.Russian: Tolerate the heresy, yet reward the faithful with reduced taxes for a while, to send a message.
TEXT.English: Tolerate the heresy, yet reward the faithful with reduced taxes for a while, to send a message.
TEXT.French: Tolйrer l'hйrйsie, mais rйcompenser toutefois les croyants fidиles avec une baisse d'impфts pendant un moment.
TEXT.German: Toleriert die Ketzerei, aber belohnt die Glдubigen eine Zeit lang mit gesenkten Steuern, um ein Zeichen zu setzen.
TEXT.Italian: Tollera l'eresia, ma premia i fedeli con una riduzione temporanea delle tasse, per inviare un messaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se tolere la herejнa, pero que se recompense a los fieles con impuestos reducidos durante una temporada, para dar a conocer nuestra postura.

TEXT.Russian: Ignore the heresy.
TEXT.English: Ignore the heresy.
TEXT.French: Ignorer l'hйrйsie.
TEXT.German: Ignoriert die Ketzerei.
TEXT.Italian: Ignora l'eresia.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se ignore la herejнa.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people from the city of %s5_city have seen their homes burned! They are rising up against the wicked %s4_civ_adjective invaders, forming Partisan units to join the resistance as militia fighters!
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people from the city of %s5_city have seen their homes burned! They are rising up against the wicked %s4_civ_adjective invaders, forming Partisan units to join the resistance as militia fighters!
TEXT.French: Les habitations du peuple %s1_civ_adjective de la ville : %s5_city ont йtй brыlйes ! Le peuple s'йlиve contre les fourbes envahisseurs %s4:2_civ_adjective et forment des unitйs de Partisans pour rejoindre la rйsistance en tant que miliciens !
TEXT.German: Die Hдuser des %s1:2_civ_adjective Volkes aus der Stadt %s5_city wurden vor ihren Augen verbrannt! Sie beginnen einen Aufstand gegen die niedertrдchtigen %s4:2_civ_adjective Angreifer und bilden Partisanengruppen, um den Widerstand als Milizkдmpfer zu unterstьtzen!
TEXT.Italian: La popolazione %s1_civ_adjective della cittа di %s5_city ha visto bruciare le proprie case! Si sta sollevando contro i malvagi invasori %s4_civ_adjective, formando unitа partigiane per combattere per la resistenza!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Los %s1:3_civ_adjective de la ciudad de %s5_city han visto arder sus casas! ¡Se estбn levantando contra los malvados invasores %s4:3_civ_adjective, formando unidades de partisanos que se unen a la resistencia como milicianos!

TEXT.Russian: Our city of %s6_city has been destroyed by the rampaging %s1_civ_adjective army. Some of our citizens are forming partisan resistance!
TEXT.English: Our city of %s6_city has been destroyed by the rampaging %s1_civ_adjective army. Some of our citizens are forming partisan resistance!
TEXT.French: La ville : %s6_city a йtй dйtruite par les ravages de l'armйe %s1:3_civ_adjective. Certains de nos citoyens forment une rйsistance partisane !
TEXT.German: Unsere Stadt %s6_city wurde von der zerstцrerischen %s1:2_civ_adjective Armee vernichtet. Einige unserer Bewohner bilden Partisanengruppen!
TEXT.Italian: La nostra cittа di %s6_city и stata distrutta dall'esercito %s1_civ_adjective. Alcuni dei nostri cittadini stanno formando unitа partigiane!
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestra ciudad de %s6_city ha sido destruida por el envite del ejйrcito %s1:1_civ_adjective. ¡Algunos de nuestros ciudadanos estбn formando una resistencia de partisanos!

TEXT.Russian: Send word to the new partisan units to continue the fight near their destroyed homes.
TEXT.English: Send word to the new partisan units to continue the fight near their destroyed homes.
TEXT.French: Envoyer un message aux nouvelles unitйs de partisans pour qu'ils continuent le combat prиs de leurs habitations dйtruites.
TEXT.German: Teilt den neuen Partisanen-Einheiten mit, dass sie den Kampf in der Nдhe ihrer zerstцrten Hдuser fortsetzen sollen.
TEXT.Italian: Invita le unitа partigiane a continuare la lotta vicino alle proprie case distrutte.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se avise a las nuevas unidades de partisanos para que continъen la lucha cerca de sus casas destruidas.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective citizens from the city we just razed are taking to the surrounding countryside to form Partisan resistance units!
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective citizens from the city we just razed are taking to the surrounding countryside to form Partisan resistance units!
TEXT.French: Les citoyens %s1:2_civ_adjective de la ville que nous venons de raser forment des unitйs de rйsistance partisane dans la campagne environnante !
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Bewohner aus der Stadt, die wir gerade zerstцrt haben, flьchten in die umliegenden Gebiete, um fьr den Widerstand Partisanen-Einheiten zu bilden!
TEXT.Italian: I cittadini %s1_civ_adjective della cittа che abbiamo appena razziato stanno fuggendo nelle campagne, per formare unitа partigiane per la resistenza!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Ciudadanos %s1:3_civ_adjective de la ciudad que acabamos de arrasar estбn tomando la campiсa de los alrededores para crear unidades de resistencia formadas por partisanos!

TEXT.Russian: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] near the ruins of the city.
TEXT.English: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] near the ruins of the city.
TEXT.French: Recevoir %d1[NUM1:unitй:unitйs] [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] prиs des ruines de la ville.
TEXT.German: Ihr erhaltet %d1 [NUM1:Einheit:Einheiten] [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] nahe den Trьmmern der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Ricevi %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unitа:unitа] presso le rovine della cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: Recibir %d1 [NUM1:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2:2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] cerca de las ruinas de la ciudad.

TEXT.Russian: Although we will lose up to half their number to exhaustion, desertion and willful refusal to leave the area, we must convince these units to retreat. Have them march to our capital city, where they will reform into units.
TEXT.English: Although we will lose up to half their number to exhaustion, desertion and willful refusal to leave the area, we must convince these units to retreat. Have them march to our capital city, where they will reform into units.
TEXT.French: Nous devons convaincre ces unitйs de battre en retraite, mкme si la moitiй de notre armйe risque de pйrir de fatigue, de dйserter ou de refuser de quitter la zone. Qu'ils se retirent а la capitale, oщ ils reformeront leurs unitйs.
TEXT.German: Obwohl wir nahezu die Hдlfte aufgrund von Erschцpfung, Fahnenflucht und vorsдtzlicher Weigerung, das Gebiet zu verlassen, verlieren werden, mьssen wir diese Einheiten zum Rьckzug ьberreden. Sie sollen zu unserer Hauptstadt marschieren und neue Einheiten bilden.
TEXT.Italian: Anche se ne perderemo metа per stanchezza, diserzione e rifiuto volontario di muoversi dalla zona, dobbiamo convincere queste unitа a ritirarsi. Falle marciare verso la nostra capitale, dove potranno riorganizzarsi.
TEXT.Spanish: Aunque perderemos hasta la mitad de ellos por agotamiento y deserciуn, o por negarse a salir voluntariamente de la zona, debemos convencer a estas unidades de que se retiren. Que marchen hacia nuestra capital, donde serбn formados como unidades.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective citizens from the city we just razed are fleeing toward their capital and are expected to form Partisan resistance units there!
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective citizens from the city we just razed are fleeing toward their capital and are expected to form Partisan resistance units there!
TEXT.French: Les citoyens %s1:2_civ_adjective de la ville que nous venons de raser fuient vers leur capitale et espиrent former des unitйs de rйsistance partisane lа-bas !
TEXT.German: %s1:3_civ_adjective Bewohner aus der Stadt, die wir gerade zerstцrt haben, fliehen zu ihrer Hauptstadt und werden dort wahrscheinlich Partisanen-Einheiten fьr den Widerstand bilden!
TEXT.Italian: I cittadini %s1_civ_adjective della cittа che abbiamo appena razziato stanno fuggendo verso la propria capitale, dove crediamo formeranno unitа partigiane!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Ciudadanos %s1:3_civ_adjective de la ciudad que acabamos de arrasar huyen hacia su capital, donde se espera que creen unidades de resistencia formadas por partisanos!

TEXT.Russian: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] in our capital city of %s3_city.
TEXT.English: Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units] in our capital city of %s3_city.
TEXT.French: Recevoir %d1 [NUM1:unitй:unitйs] [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] dans notre capitale : %s3_city.
TEXT.German: Ihr erhaltet %d1 [NUM1:Einheit:Einheiten] [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] in unserer Hauptstadt %s3_city.
TEXT.Italian: Ricevi %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unitа:unitа] nella nostra capitale %s3_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Recibir %d1 [NUM2:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2:2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] en vuestra capital, %s3_city.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective hereditary dynasty has died out. A new faction has claimed the throne and is off to a roaringly successful start.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective hereditary dynasty has died out. A new faction has claimed the throne and is off to a roaringly successful start.
TEXT.French: La dynastie hйrйditaire %s1_civ_adjective a disparu. Une nouvelle faction a revendiquй le trфne et paraоt dйmarrer sur les chapeaux de roues.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:3_civ_adjective Erbdynastie ist ausgestorben. Eine neue Gruppierung hat den Thron erklommen und verkьndet lautstark ihre neue Politik.
TEXT.Italian: La dinastia ereditaria %s1_civ_adjective si и interrotta. Una nuova fazione ha rivendicato il trono e ha cominciato con un grande successo.
TEXT.Spanish: La dinastнa hereditaria %s1:2_civ_adjective se ha extinguido. Una nueva facciуn ha reclamado el trono y se prepara para un estridente y exitoso inicio.

TEXT.Russian: The old dynasty has died out! No more hereditary heirs remain to claim the throne!
TEXT.English: The old dynasty has died out! No more hereditary heirs remain to claim the throne!
TEXT.French: L'ancienne dynastie a disparu ! Il n'y a plus d'hйritiers pour rйclamer le trфne !
TEXT.German: Die alte Dynastie ist ausgestorben! Es sind keine rechtmдЯigen Thronerben ьbrig!
TEXT.Italian: La vecchia dinastia si и interrotta! Non ci sono eredi in grado di rivendicare il trono!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡La vieja dinastнa se ha extinguido! ¡No quedan herederos que puedan reclamar el trono!

TEXT.Russian: Throw support behind the leading general to become the new monarch via coup d'йtat.
TEXT.English: Throw support behind the leading general to become the new monarch via coup d'йtat.
TEXT.French: Soutenir le gйnйral dirigeant pour qu'il devienne le nouveau monarque grвce а un coup d'йtat.
TEXT.German: Unterstьtzt den fьhrenden General bei einem Putsch, um zum neuen Monarchen zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: Sostieni il generale capo, affinchй diventi il nuovo monarca con un colpo di stato.
TEXT.Spanish: Dйmosle apoyo al general lнder para que alcance el trono mediante un golpe de estado.

TEXT.Russian: Let the nobles fight amongst themselves. The strongest or cleverest will emerge as the new monarch.
TEXT.English: Let the nobles fight amongst themselves. The strongest or cleverest will emerge as the new monarch.
TEXT.French: Laissons les nobles se battre entre eux. Le plus fort ou le plus intelligent deviendra le nouveau monarque.
TEXT.German: Sollen die Adligen sich gegenseitig bekдmpfen. Der Stдrkste oder Klьgste wird als neuer Monarch hervorgehen.
TEXT.Italian: Lascia che i nobili combattano tra loro. Il piщ forte o il piщ intelligente emergerа come nuovo monarca.
TEXT.Spanish: Que los nobles luchen entre ellos. El mбs fuerte o el mбs listo se alzarб como nuevo monarca.

TEXT.Russian: Follow the guidance of spiritual leadership in identifying who enjoys divine favor, then support that claimant.
TEXT.English: Follow the guidance of spiritual leadership in identifying who enjoys divine favor, then support that claimant.
TEXT.French: Suivre les conseils des dirigeants spirituels pour savoir qui bйnйficie de la faveur divine, puis soutenir ce candidat.
TEXT.German: Folgt dem Rat der spirituellen Fьhrer, die den von Gott Auserwдhlten erkennen, und unterstьtzt dann diesen Anwдrter.
TEXT.Italian: Segui la guida dei capi spirituali per identificare il favorito degli dei, poi sostienilo.
TEXT.Spanish: Que los lнderes espirituales identifiquen al que cuente con el favor divino; apoyaremos a dicho aspirante.

TEXT.Russian: Scandal has thrown the %s1_civ_adjective senate in to chaos. A constitutional crisis has emerged. Yet this also opens the door to political reforms.
TEXT.English: Scandal has thrown the %s1_civ_adjective senate in to chaos. A constitutional crisis has emerged. Yet this also opens the door to political reforms.
TEXT.French: Un scandale a plongй le sйnat %s1_civ_adjective dans le chaos. Une crise constitutionnelle en a dйcoulй. Cela ouvre cependant la porte а des rйformes politiques.
TEXT.German: Ein Skandal hat im %s1:2_civ_adjective Senat Chaos verursacht. Dadurch wurde eine konstitutionelle Krise ausgelцst. Allerdings цffnen sich jetzt auch neue Wege fьr politische Reformen.
TEXT.Italian: Uno scandalo ha fatto cadere nel caos il senato %s1_civ_adjective. Ne и nata una crisi costituzionale. Questo perт apre la porta alle riforme politiche.
TEXT.Spanish: Un escбndalo ha sumido en el caos al senado %s1:1_civ_adjective. Se ha producido una crisis institucional. Pero esto tambiйn abre la puerta a reformas polнticas.

TEXT.Russian: The eldest senator of the leading opposition party has been disgraced by scandal. The entire senate has been thrown into chaos.
TEXT.English: The eldest senator of the leading opposition party has been disgraced by scandal. The entire senate has been thrown into chaos.
TEXT.French: Le plus vieux sйnateur du principal parti d'opposition est en disgrвce а cause d'un scandale. Le sйnat tout entier est plongй dans le chaos.
TEXT.German: Der дlteste Senator der fьhrenden Oppositionspartei ist wegen eines Skandals in Ungnade gefallen. Im gesamten Senat ist das Chaos ausgebrochen.
TEXT.Italian: Il senatore piщ anziano del piщ importante partito d'opposizione и caduto in disgrazia per via di uno scandalo. L'intero senato и nel caos.
TEXT.Spanish: El senador de mayor edad del principal partido opositor ha caнdo en desgracia por un escбndalo. El senado al completo se encuentra sumido en el caos.

TEXT.Russian: Let the senators fight amongst themselves. When both sides are weakened, step in and assert presidential authority.
TEXT.English: Let the senators fight amongst themselves. When both sides are weakened, step in and assert presidential authority.
TEXT.French: Laisser les sйnateurs se battre entre eux. Lorsque les deux cфtйs seront affaiblis, intervenir et dйclarer l'autoritй prйsidentielle.
TEXT.German: Sollen die Senatoren einander bekдmpfen. Schreitet ein, wenn beide Seiten geschwдcht sind, und sichert die Autoritдt des Prдsidenten.
TEXT.Italian: Lascia che i senatori combattano tra loro. Quando entrambe le coalizioni saranno indebolite, entra in gioco e rivendica l'autoritа presidenziale.
TEXT.Spanish: Que los senadores luchen entre ellos. Cuando ambos bandos estйn debilitados, daremos un paso al frente y haremos valer la autoridad presidencial.

TEXT.Russian: Support the ruling party in impeaching numerous members of the scandalized party, destroying all effective opposition to the ruling party.
TEXT.English: Support the ruling party in impeaching numerous members of the scandalized party, destroying all effective opposition to the ruling party.
TEXT.French: Soutenir le parti dirigeant, en accusant plusieurs membres du parti lйsй, afin de dйtruire toute opposition.
TEXT.German: Unterstьtzt die regierende Partei dabei, zahlreiche Mitglieder der skandaltrдchtigen Partei aus ihren Дmtern zu entheben und so die gesamte effektive Opposition der Regierungspartei zu zerstцren.
TEXT.Italian: Sostieni il partito al governo nella condanna di numerosi membri del partito coinvolto nello scandalo, distruggendo tutta l'opposizione.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se dй apoyo al partido gobernante mediante la presentaciуn de cargos contra numerosos miembros del partido envuelto en el escбndalo. De este modo se eliminarб la oposiciуn del partido en el poder.

TEXT.Russian: Rely on judicial authority to enforce the letter of the constitution.
TEXT.English: Rely on judicial authority to enforce the letter of the constitution.
TEXT.French: Se fier а l'autoritй juridique pour renforcer la lettre de la constitution.
TEXT.German: Verlasst Euch darauf, dass die Justiz die Verfassung durchsetzt.
TEXT.Italian: Affidati all'autoritа giudiziaria affinchй sostenga la costituzione.
TEXT.Spanish: Confiaremos en que la autoridad judicial haga cumplir el texto de la constituciуn.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective election results were so close, the courts had to rule on the vote-counting procedures to arrive at an outcome.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective election results were so close, the courts had to rule on the vote-counting procedures to arrive at an outcome.
TEXT.French: Les rйsultats de l'йlection %s1:2_civ_adjective йtaient si proches que la Justice a dы diriger les procйdures de recompte pour arriver а un rйsultat.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Wahlergebnisse waren so knapp, dass die Gerichte ьber die Stimmzдhlungsverfahren entscheiden mussten, um zu einem Ergebnis zu gelangen.
TEXT.Italian: I risultati delle elezioni %s1_civ_adjective erano cosм vicini che le corti hanno dovuto giudicare le procedure di spoglio per ottenere un risultato.
TEXT.Spanish: Los resultados de las elecciones %s1:4_civ_adjective han sido tan similares entre sн, que los tribunales han tenido que pronunciarse sobre los procedimientos de recuento de votos para validar uno de los resultados.

TEXT.Russian: Election results are so close, they fall within the margin of error typically written off to system inadequacies such as lost or mismarked ballots, hanging chads, or counting errors. With no indisputable way to decipher the true vote count, the election's outcome has been placed in the hands of the courts.
TEXT.English: Election results are so close, they fall within the margin of error typically written off to system inadequacies such as lost or mismarked ballots, hanging chads, or counting errors. With no indisputable way to decipher the true vote count, the election's outcome has been placed in the hands of the courts.
TEXT.French: Les rйsultats des йlections sont si proches qu'ils sont sujets а une marge d'erreur due aux insuffisance du systиme : pertes de bulletins, bulletins mal validйs, poinзons mal faits ou erreurs de dйcompte. Comme rien ne permet de connaоtre les vrais rйsultats, ceux-ci ont йtй placйs entre les mains de la Justice.
TEXT.German: Die Wahlergebnisse sind so knapp, dass sie innerhalb der Fehlerspanne liegen, die normalerweise aufgrund von Systemmдngeln wie verlorenen oder falsch angekreuzten Wahlzetteln, fehlerhaften Lochkarten oder Zдhlfehlern auftreten. Da es nun unmцglich ist, ein korrektes Wahlergebnis bekannt zu geben, wurde diese Entscheidung in die Hдnde der Gerichte gelegt.
TEXT.Italian: I risultati delle elezioni sono cosм vicini che ricadono nei margini di errore tipicamente imputati alle inadeguatezze del sistema come schede perse o errori di conteggio. Senza un metodo sicuro per arrivare al vero conteggio, il risultato dell'elezione и stato posto nelle mani delle corti.
TEXT.Spanish: Los resultados de las elecciones han sido tan similares entre sн, que la diferencia puede atribuirse al margen de error asociado a defectos del sistema como papeletas perdidas o ilegibles asн como a errores en el escrutinio. Dado que no existe un mйtodo infalible para determinar el autйntico recuento de votos, el resultado de las elecciones dependerб de la decisiуn de los tribunales.

TEXT.Russian: Let the court case take its course, even if the judges seem to split their vote along a purely partisan basis. Follow the constitution to its letter, even though the outcome appears to come down to which party in the dispute had more supporters on the bench.
TEXT.English: Let the court case take its course, even if the judges seem to split their vote along a purely partisan basis. Follow the constitution to its letter, even though the outcome appears to come down to which party in the dispute had more supporters on the bench.
TEXT.French: Laisser la Justice s'en charger, mкme si les juges semblent donner leur vote de faзon totalement partiale ; suivre la constitution а la lettre, mкme si les rйsultats semblent en accord avec la majoritй siйgeant а la Cour.
TEXT.German: Soll der Prozess seinen Lauf nehmen, auch wenn sich die Richter mцglicherweise zugunsten der Partisanen entscheiden. Haltet Euch an die Verfassung, auch wenn das Ergebnis wohl davon abhдngt, welche Partei des Konflikts mehr Befьrworter hat.
TEXT.Italian: Lascia che la giustizia faccia il proprio corso, anche se i giudici sembrano decidere sulla base di preferenze personali. Segui la costituzione alla lettera, anche se il risultato delle elezioni sembra ridursi al numero di giudici che preferiscono l'una o l'altra fazione.
TEXT.Spanish: Que el caso siga su curso en los tribunales, incluso aunque el veredicto de los jueces estй sujeto a favoritismos. La constituciуn debe aplicarse estrictamente, si bien parece que el resultado acabarб favoreciendo al partido con mбs simpatizantes en el tribunal.

TEXT.Russian: Refuse to submit to constitutional rule of law, citing wishful reinterpretations of the constitution or arguments based on passion and principle. Arrive at the desired outcome without heed to the actual constitution.
TEXT.English: Refuse to submit to constitutional rule of law, citing wishful reinterpretations of the constitution or arguments based on passion and principle. Arrive at the desired outcome without heed to the actual constitution.
TEXT.French: Refuser de soumettre le vote а la Justice, qui se base sur ses propres rйinterprйtations de la constitution ou sur des arguments fondйs sur la passion et les principes ; aboutir au rйsultat dйsirй sans faire attention а la constitution.
TEXT.German: Weigert Euch, Euch der konstitutionellen Rechtsstaatlichkeit zu unterwerfen, und legt die Verfassung nach Euren Wьnschen aus oder bringt andere Argumente aufgrund Eurer Ьberzeugung und Prinzipien vor. Kommt ohne Rьcksicht auf die Verfassung zum gewьnschten Ergebnis.
TEXT.Italian: Rifiutati di sottometterti alla costituzione, citando faziose reinterpretazioni della costituzione o discussioni basate su passione e principi. Arriva al risultato che desideri senza dare retta alla costituzione.
TEXT.Spanish: Nada de someterse a las leyes constitucionales: que se apliquen reinterpretaciones interesadas de la constituciуn basando la argumentaciуn en la pasiуn y los principios. Debe llegarse al resultado deseado sin prestar atenciуn a lo que realmente diga la constituciуn.

TEXT.Russian: A charismatic %s1_civ_adjective dictator has risen to control the Party. This strong man is reshaping the government to suit his plans.
TEXT.English: A charismatic %s1_civ_adjective dictator has risen to control the Party. This strong man is reshaping the government to suit his plans.
TEXT.French: Un dictateur %s1_civ_adjective charismatique a pris le contrфle du Parti. Cette homme fort remodиle le gouvernement pour suivre ses plans.
TEXT.German: Ein charismatischer %s1:3_civ_adjectiver Diktator hat die Kontrolle ьber die Partei ьbernommen. Dieser mдchtige Mann bildet die Regierung zu seinen Gunsten neu.
TEXT.Italian: Un carismatico dittatore %s1_civ_adjective и arrivato al controllo del partito. Questo forte uomo sta cambiando il governo secondo i propri piani.
TEXT.Spanish: Un carismбtico dictador %s1:1_civ_adjective se ha hecho con el control del partido. Este hombre fuerte estб remodelando el gobierno para adaptarlo a sus planes.

TEXT.Russian: A stronger, more charismatic dictator has seized control of the Party and the nation!
TEXT.English: A stronger, more charismatic dictator has seized control of the Party and the nation!
TEXT.French: Un dictateur plus fort et plus charismatique a pris le contrфle du Parti et de la nation !
TEXT.German: Ein mдchtigerer, charismatischerer Diktator hat die Kontrolle ьber Partei und Nation ьbernommen!
TEXT.Italian: Un dittatore forte e carismatico ha preso il controllo del partito e della nazione!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Un dictador mбs carismбtico y fuerte se ha hecho con el control del partido y de la naciуn!

TEXT.Russian: Advise him to focus on his relationship with the armed forces.
TEXT.English: Advise him to focus on his relationship with the armed forces.
TEXT.French: Lui conseiller de se concentrer sur ses relations avec les forces armйes.
TEXT.German: Ratet ihm, sich auf die Beziehungen zwischen den Streitkrдften zu konzentrieren.
TEXT.Italian: Avvertilo di concentrarsi sulla sua relazione con le forze armate.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se le recomiende concentrarse en su relaciуn con las fuerzas armadas.

TEXT.Russian: Advise him to focus on domestic harmony and stamping out sources of opposition.
TEXT.English: Advise him to focus on domestic harmony and stamping out sources of opposition.
TEXT.French: Lui conseiller de se concentrer sur l'harmonie domestique et de rйprimer toute source d'opposition.
TEXT.German: Ratet ihm, sich auf die Harmonie im Land zu konzentrieren und oppositionelle Elemente auszuschalten.
TEXT.Italian: Consigliagli di concentrarsi sull'armonia interna e sull'eliminazione dell'opposizione.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se le recomiende concentrarse en la armonнa interna y en erradicar todo tipo de oposiciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Friendly locals have granted sanctuary to a wounded %s1_civ_adjective unit.
TEXT.English: Friendly locals have granted sanctuary to a wounded %s1_civ_adjective unit.
TEXT.French: Des gens amicaux de la rйgion ont fourni un refuge а une unitй %s1:3_civ_adjective blessйe.
TEXT.German: Hilfsbereite Einheimische haben einer verwundeten %s1:2_civ_adjective Einheit Asyl gewдhrt.
TEXT.Italian: L'amichevole popolazione locale ha accolto un'unitа %s1_civ_adjective ferita.
TEXT.Spanish: Lugareсos amistosos han concedido asilo a una unidad %s1:2_civ_adjective herida.

TEXT.Russian: A wounded %s1_civ_adjective unit has received assistance from a small faction who resists the rule of their enemy.
TEXT.English: A wounded %s1_civ_adjective unit has received assistance from a small faction who resists the rule of their enemy.
TEXT.French: Une unitй %s1:3_civ_adjective blessйe a reзu de l'assistance de la part d'une petite faction qui rйsiste а l'ennemi.
TEXT.German: Eine verwundete %s1:3_civ_adjective Einheit hat Hilfe von einer kleinen Gruppe erhalten, die sich der Herrschaft ihrer Gegner widersetzt.
TEXT.Italian: Un'unitа %s1_civ_adjective ferita ha ricevuto aiuto dai membri di una piccola fazione che resiste al governo del nemico.
TEXT.Spanish: Una unidad %s1:2_civ_adjective herida ha recibido ayuda de una pequeсa facciуn que se resiste al mandato del enemigo.

TEXT.Russian: A pious tribe who believe in mercy have extended religious protection to a wounded unit of %s1_civ_adjective origin.
TEXT.English: A pious tribe who believe in mercy have extended religious protection to a wounded unit of %s1_civ_adjective origin.
TEXT.French: Une tribu pieuse et misйricordieuse a йtendu sa protection religieuse а une unitй blessйe d'origine %s1:3_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Ein frommes Volk, das an Barmherzigkeit glaubt, hat seinen religiцsen Schutz auf eine verwundete %s1:3_civ_adjective Einheit ausgedehnt.
TEXT.Italian: Una tribщ misericordiosa ha esteso la propria protezione religiosa a un'unitа ferita di origine %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Una devota tribu que cree en la misericordia ha proporcionado protecciуn religiosa a una unidad herida de origen %s1:1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: A small tribe of friendly locals have granted sanctuary to our beleaguered %s3_unit.
TEXT.English: A small tribe of friendly locals have granted sanctuary to our beleaguered %s3_unit.
TEXT.French: Une petite tribu amicale a fourni un refuge а notre unitй : %s3_unit assiйgйe.
TEXT.German: Eine kleine Gruppe hilfsbereiter Einheimischer hat unserer belagerten Einheit %s3_unit Asyl gewдhrt.
TEXT.Italian: Una piccola e amichevole tribщ locale ha aiutato questa nostra unitа: %s3_unit.
TEXT.Spanish: Una pequeсa tribu de lugareсos amistosos ha concedido asilo a [NUM3:nuestro:nuestra:nuestros:nuestras] %s3_unit en dificultades.

TEXT.Russian: This assistance should help our unit recover its strength.
TEXT.English: This assistance should help our unit recover its strength.
TEXT.French: Cette aide devrait permettre а notre unitй а recouvrer ses forces.
TEXT.German: Mit dieser Hilfe wird unsere Einheit wieder zu Krдften gelangen.
TEXT.Italian: Questo aiuto dovrebbe favorire la ripresa della nostra unitа.
TEXT.Spanish: Se espera que esta ayuda contribuya a que nuestra unidad recupere su fuerza.

TEXT.Russian: Our generals covet a source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] that lies within %s1_civ_adjective borders. Without it, we cannot properly train and equip our troops!
TEXT.English: Our generals covet a source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] that lies within %s1_civ_adjective borders. Without it, we cannot properly train and equip our troops!
TEXT.French: Nos gйnйraux convoitent une source de la ressource : [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] qui repose dans les frontiиres %s1:4_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Unsere Generдle verlangen nach der Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT], die innerhalb der %s1:2_civ_adjective Grenzen liegt. Ohne sie kцnnen wir unsere Truppen nicht angemessen ausbilden und ausrьsten!
TEXT.Italian: Ai nostri generali interessa una fonte di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] che si trova entro i confini %s1_civ_adjective. Senza di essa non possiamo addestrare ed equipaggiare in modo adeguato le nostre truppe!
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros generales codician una fuente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] que se encuentra dentro de las fronteras %s1:4_civ_adjective. ¡Sin este recurso, no podemos entrenar y equipar adecuadamente a nuestras tropas!

TEXT.Russian: Greed[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to seize control of that resource.
TEXT.English: Greed[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to seize control of that resource.
TEXT.French: Cupiditй[PARAGRAPH:1]Vos dirigeants militaires vous chargent de prendre le contrфle de cette ressource.
TEXT.German: Gier[PARAGRAPH:1]Eure Militдrfьhrer verlangen von Euch, die Macht ьber diese Ressource zu ergreifen.
TEXT.Italian: Aviditа[PARAGRAPH:1]I capi militari ti hanno incaricato di prendere il controllo di quella risorsa.
TEXT.Spanish: Avaricia[PARAGRAPH:1]Los lнderes militares han encargado realizar las tareas necesarias para controlar dicho recurso.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must invade %s1_civ and gain control of the %s2_resource resource.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization captures the target city first, if the city is destroyed, or if %d3 turns pass without achieving the objective.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must invade %s1_civ and gain control of the %s2_resource resource.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization captures the target city first, if the city is destroyed, or if %d3 turns pass without achieving the objective.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez envahir le %s1_civ et gagner le contrфle de la ressource %s2_resource.[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale capture la ville cible en premier, si la ville est dйtruite ou si %d3 tours passent sans que vous ayez atteint l'objectif.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie nach %s1_civ vordringen und die Kontrolle ьber die Ressource %s2_resource erlangen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine gegnerische Zivilisation die Zielstadt zuerst einnimmt, die Stadt zerstцrt wird oder wenn das Ziel %d3 Runden lang nicht erreicht wird.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi invadere %s1_civ e prendere il controllo della risorsa %s2_resource.[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se una civiltа rivale la cattura per prima, se viene distrutta o se passano %d3 turni senza che tu raggiunga l'obiettivo.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, es necesario invadir el %s1_civ y hacerse con el control [NUM2:del:de la:de los:de las] %s2_resource.[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival se apodera antes de la ciudad objetivo, si la ciudad es destruida o si pasan %d3 turno(s) sin que se alcance el objetivo.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! Your Greed is unmatched! You have managed to wrest control of the coveted %s1_civ_adjective [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] resource! Your generals are already expanding their military planning.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! Your Greed is unmatched! You have managed to wrest control of the coveted %s1_civ_adjective [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] resource! Your generals are already expanding their military planning.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Votre Cupiditй est inйgalable ! Vous avez rйussi а prendre le contrфle de la ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] %s1_civ_adjective convoitйe ! Vos gйnйraux йlargissent dйjа leur calendrier militaire.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Ihre Gier ist unьbertroffen! Sie haben gewaltsam die Kontrolle ьber die begehrte %s1:3_civ_adjective Ressource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT] ьbernommen! Ihre Generдle erweitern bereits ihre militдrische Planung.

TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! ¡Tu avaricia no tiene par! ¡Has logrado hacerte con el control [NUM9:del codiciado:de la codiciada:de los codiciados:de las codiciadas] [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s9_resource[COLOR_REVERT]! Vuestros generales ya estбn ampliando sus planes militares.

TEXT.Russian: Recruit and train units that take advantage of our new resources.
TEXT.English: Recruit and train units that take advantage of our new resources.
TEXT.French: Recruter et entraоner des unitйs qui profitent de nos nouvelles ressources.
TEXT.German: Rekrutiert Einheiten, die Nutzen aus unseren neuen Ressourcen ziehen, und bildet diese aus.
TEXT.Italian: Recluta e addestra unitа che si avvantaggino delle nuove risorse.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se recluten y entrenen unidades que saquen provecho de los nuevos recursos.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ricevi %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unitа:unitа].
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Recibir %d1 [NUM1:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2:2_unit[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective army, in a purely greedy bid for strategic resources, have attacked the %s4:2_civ_adjective and seized control of resources they lacked within their own borders.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective army, in a purely greedy bid for strategic resources, have attacked the %s4:2_civ_adjective and seized control of resources they lacked within their own borders.
TEXT.French: L'armйe %s1:3_civ_adjective, dans son aviditй de ressources stratйgiques, a attaquй les %s4:2_civ_adjectiv et pris le contrфle de ressources dont ils ne disposaient pas dans leur pays.
TEXT.German: Die habgierige %s1:3_civ_adjective Armee hat auf Suche nach strategischen Ressourcen das %s4:3_civ_adjective Reich angegriffen und die Kontrolle ьber Ressourcen ьbernommen, die innerhalb der eigenen Grenzen nicht vorhanden sind.
TEXT.Italian: L'esercito %s1_civ_adjective, in un avido tentativo di recuperare risorse strategiche, ha attaccato i %s4:2_civ_adjective e preso il controllo di risorse che mancano all'interno dei loro confini.
TEXT.Spanish: El ejйrcito %s1:1_civ_adjective, en una codiciosa maniobra para hacerse con recursos estratйgicos, ha atacado a los %s4:3_civ_adjective y se ha apoderado de los recursos que no poseнa dentro de sus propias fronteras.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the Quest of Greed!

TEXT.Russian: Our military commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to rout our enemies on the field of battle!
TEXT.English: Our military commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to rout our enemies on the field of battle!
TEXT.French: Nos commandants militaires dйsirent se prйparer а la guerre.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si nous entraоnons suffisamment d'unitйs de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chars[COLOR_REVERT], nous serons en mesure de mettre nos ennemis en dйroute sur le champ de bataille !

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.

TEXT.Russian: Leverage our military advantage into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.French: Utiliser notre avantage militaire pour rйpandre notre foi.
TEXT.German: Setzt unseren militдrischen Vorteil geschickt fьr eine Kampagne ein, um unseren Glauben zu verbreiten.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of Chariot units. Advisors across the known world are panicking at the thought of their nation being ground under the thundering hooves and churning wheels of these mighty war machines.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of Chariot units. Advisors across the known world are panicking at the thought of their nation being ground under the thundering hooves and churning wheels of these mighty war machines.
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective a entraоnй la plus importante armйe de Chars. Les conseillers du monde entier paniquent а l'idйe que leur nation puisse кtre attaquйe par ces puissantes machines de guerre.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die grцЯte Truppe Streitwagen-Einheiten ausgebildet. Berater der gesamten entdeckten Welt geraten in Panik beim Gedanken daran, dass ihre Nation unter den donnernden Hufen und krachenden Rдdern dieser mдchtigen Kriegsmaschinen zermalmt wird.
TEXT.Italian: La popolazione %s1_civ_adjective ha addestrato la piщ grande forza militare composta da bighe. I consiglieri di tutto il mondo si stanno lasciando prendere dal panico, al pensiero della propria nazione investita dagli zoccoli e dalle pesanti ruote di queste macchine da guerra.

TEXT.French: Notre monarque va йtablir une institution qui permettra aux troupes actuelles et futures d'obtenir un entraоnement supplйmentaire.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of Swordsman units. Advisors across the known world are wondering if their civilizations will survive long enough to see what lies beyond the sword.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of Swordsman units. Advisors across the known world are wondering if their civilizations will survive long enough to see what lies beyond the sword.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Elite Swordsmen!
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte des Spadassins d'йlite !
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Elite-Schwertkдmpfer" ist gescheitert!
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa dei Spadaccini d'elite!
TEXT.Spanish: La misiуn Soldados con espada de йlite ha fracasado.

TEXT.Russian: Our naval commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme units[COLOR_REVERT], we could dominate the seas!
TEXT.English: Our naval commanders wish to prepare for war.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme units[COLOR_REVERT], we could dominate the seas!
TEXT.French: Nos commandants navals dйsirent se prйparer а la guerre.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si nous entraоnons suffisamment d'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unitйs de Trirиmes[COLOR_REVERT], nous pourrons dominer les ocйans !
TEXT.German: Unsere Marinekommandanten wollen sich auf den Krieg vorbereiten.[PARAGRAPH:1]Wenn wir genьgend [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trieren[COLOR_REVERT]-Einheiten ausbilden, kцnnten wir ьber die Meere herrschen!
TEXT.Italian: I nostri comandanti di marina desiderano prepararsi per la guerra.[PARAGRAPH:1]Se addestriamo abbastanza [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremi[COLOR_REVERT] potremo dominare il mondo!
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros mandos navales quieren prepararse para la guerra.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si entrenamos a las unidades de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trirremes[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes, ¡podrнamos dominar los mares!

TEXT.Russian: Warships[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your naval commanders to build a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.English: Warships[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your naval commanders to build a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Navires de guerre[PARAGRAPH:1]Vos commandants navals vous chargent de construire un nombre important de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trirиmes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Kriegsschiffe[PARAGRAPH:1]Eure Marinekommandanten verlangen von Euch, eine groЯe [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trieren[COLOR_REVERT]-Flotte aufzubauen.
TEXT.Italian: Navi da guerra[PARAGRAPH:1]I comandanti di marina ti hanno incaricato di creare una flotta di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremi[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Barco de guerra[PARAGRAPH:1]Los lнderes navales han encargado la creaciуn de una fuerza considerable de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trirremes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Renaissance without having met the conditions.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trireme[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units].[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization has built [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Renaissance without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achevez cette quкte, vous devez entraоner %d1 [NUM1:unitй:unitйs] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trirиmes[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si votre civilisation a construit le bвtiment [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte avant vous ou si vous atteignez la Renaissance sans avoir rempli les conditions de victoire.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trieren[COLOR_REVERT]-[NUM1:Einheit:Einheiten] ausbilden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn Ihre Zivilisation das Gebдude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet hat.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine gegnerische Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt oder wenn Sie die Renaissance erreichen, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Trireme:Triremi][COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa se la tua civiltа avrа costruito [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se un'altra civiltа la completa per prima, o se raggiungerai il Rinascimento senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, es necesario entrenar a %d1 [NUM1:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trirremes[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn ha construido [NUM2:un:una:unos:unas] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes o si se alcanza el Renacimiento sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have built the world's largest combat navy. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have built the world's largest combat navy. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez construit la plus grande marine de guerre du monde. Veuillez choisir votre rйcompense.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben die weltweit grцЯte Kampfmarine aufgebaut. Wдhlen Sie Ihre Belohnung aus.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai costruito la marina da guerra piщ grande al mondo. Scegli la ricompensa.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Habйis creado la mayor flota naval de combate del mundo. Elegid vuestra recompensa.

TEXT.Russian: With such a large fleet of warships, additional training for the crews can be achieved.
TEXT.English: With such a large fleet of warships, additional training for the crews can be achieved.
TEXT.French: Avec une telle flotte de guerre, un entraоnement supplйmentaire pour l'йquipage peut кtre effectuй.
TEXT.German: Mit einer so groЯen Kriegsschiffflotte kann die Besatzung weiter ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Con una tale flotta di navi da guerra и possibile ottenere un ulteriore addestramento per queste unitа.
TEXT.Spanish: Al tratarse de una flota de barcos de guerra tan grande, las tripulaciones podrбn recibir entrenamiento adicional.

TEXT.Russian: Leverage our dominance of the sea to better protect our trade routes.
TEXT.English: Leverage our dominance of the sea to better protect our trade routes.
TEXT.French: Utiliser notre prйdominance navale pour mieux protйger nos routes commerciales.
TEXT.German: Setzt unsere militдrische Vorherrschaft auf See ein, um unsere Handelswege besser zu schьtzen.
TEXT.Italian: Sfrutta il dominio dei mari per proteggere meglio le nostre rotte commerciali.
TEXT.Spanish: Que se aproveche nuestro dominio del mar para proteger mejor nuestras rutas comerciales.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest fleet of warships. Advisors across the known world whisper of their fears that this fleet will dominate the seas for centuries to come.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest fleet of warships. Advisors across the known world whisper of their fears that this fleet will dominate the seas for centuries to come.
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective a construit la plus grande flotte de navires de guerre. Les conseillers du monde entier craignent que cette flotte ne domine les ocйans pour les siиcles а venir.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die grцЯte Kriegsschiffflotte ausgebildet. Berater der gesamten entdeckten Welt fьrchten, dass diese Flotte jahrhundertelang die Meere beherrschen wird.
TEXT.Italian: La popolazione %s1_civ_adjective ha costruito la piщ grande flotta di navi da guerra. I consiglieri di tutto il mondo hanno paura che la flotta dominerа i mari per i prossimi secoli.
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han entrenado a la mayor flota de barcos de guerra. Consejeros de todo el mundo conocido confiesan entre susurros su temor de que esta flota domine los mares durante los siglos venideros.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of the Warships!
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Warships!
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte des Navires de Guerre !
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Kriegsschiffe" ist gescheitert!
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa delle Navi da guerra!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡La misiуn Barcos de guerra ha fracasado!

TEXT.Russian: Our generals request that we focus on making guns. These are the weapons of the future! [PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to command any battlefield.
TEXT.English: Our generals request that we focus on making guns. These are the weapons of the future! [PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units, we should be able to command any battlefield.
TEXT.French: Nos gйnйraux nous demandent de nous concentrer sur la fabrication d'armes а feu. Ce sont les armes du futur ! [PARAGRAPH:1]Si nous entraоnons suffisamment d'unitйs d'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusiers[COLOR_REVERT], nous serons en mesure de dominer tous les champs de bataille.
TEXT.German: Unsere Generдle verlangen, dass wir uns auf die Herstellung von Feuerwaffen konzentrieren. Das sind die Waffen der Zukunft! [PARAGRAPH:1]Wenn wir genьgend [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketier[COLOR_REVERT]-Einheiten ausbilden, kцnnen wir jedes Schlachtfeld beherrschen.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri generali richiedono che ci concentriamo nella produzione di armi da fuoco. Sono le armi del futuro! [PARAGRAPH:1]Se addestriamo abbastanza [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Soldati con moschetto[COLOR_REVERT], dovremmo riuscire a dominare qualsiasi campo di battaglia!
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros generales solicitan que nos concentremos en fabricar armas de fuego. ¡Son las armas del futuro! [PARAGRAPH:1]Si entrenamos a las unidades de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mosquetes[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes, seremos capaces de dominar cualquier campo de batalla.

TEXT.Russian: Guns Not Butter[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of musket units.
TEXT.English: Guns Not Butter[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to train a sizable force of musket units.
TEXT.French: Pas de beurre, mais des canons[PARAGRAPH:1]Vos dirigeants militaires vous chargent d'entraоner un nombre important d'unitйs d'arquebusiers.
TEXT.German: Feuer statt Butter[PARAGRAPH:1]Eure Militдrfьhrer verlangen von Euch, eine groЯe Truppe Musketier-Einheiten auszubilden.
TEXT.Italian: Fucili, non banane.[PARAGRAPH:1]I capi militari ti hanno incaricato di creare un esercito di unitа con moschetto.
TEXT.Spanish: Armas de fuego, no mantequilla[PARAGRAPH:1]Los lнderes militares han encargado llevar a cabo el entrenamiento de una fuerza considerable de unidades de mosquete.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez entraоner %d1 unitйs d'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusiers[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si votre civilisation utilise la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalitй[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si votre civilisation contrфle le bвtiment [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte avant vous ou si vous dйcouvrez les armes а feu avancйes (technologies du [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusil[COLOR_REVERT] ou du [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemin de fer[COLOR_REVERT]) sans avoir rempli les conditions de victoire.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [NUM1:Einheit:Einheiten] [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketiere[COLOR_REVERT] ausbilden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn in Ihrer Zivilisation die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vasallentum[COLOR_REVERT] herrscht.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine weitere Belohnung, wenn Ihre Zivilisation das Gebдude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] kontrolliert.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine gegnerische Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt oder wenn Sie fortgeschrittene Feuerwaffen (die Technologien [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Drall[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Eisenbahn[COLOR_REVERT]) entdecken, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire %d1 unitа di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Soldati con moschetto[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa se la tua civiltа ha come forma di governo preferita il [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassallaggio[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa se la tua civiltа controlla [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se una civiltа rivale la completa per prima, o se scoprirai armi da fuoco avanzate (le tecnologie [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rigatura delle canne[COLOR_REVERT] o [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ferrovia[COLOR_REVERT]) senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, es necesario entrenar a %d1 [NUM1:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mosquetes[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn utiliza el principio de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vasallaje[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn controla [NUM2:un:una:unos:unas] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes o si descubres armas de fuego avanzadas (las tecnologнas [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusil[COLOR_REVERT] o [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ferrocarril[COLOR_REVERT]) sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of musket units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of musket units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez entraоnй suffisamment d'arquebusiers. Veuillez choisir votre rйcompense.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Die von Ihnen ausgebildete Truppe Musketier-Einheiten ist groЯ genug. Wдhlen Sie Ihre Belohnung aus.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai addestrato abbastanza unitа con moschetto. Scegli la ricompensa.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Se ha entrenado a una fuerza lo bastante grande de unidades de mosquetes. Elegid vuestra recompensa.

TEXT.Russian: With such a large force of musketmen working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.English: With such a large force of musketmen working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.French: Avec un tel nombre d'arquebusiers opйrant ensemble, un entraоnement supplйmentaire pour ces unitйs peut кtre effectuй.
TEXT.German: Mit einer so groЯen Truppe Musketiere kцnnen diese Einheiten weiter ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Con tanti soldati con moschetto che lavorano insieme и possibile ottenere un ulteriore addestramento per queste unitа.
TEXT.Spanish: Al tratarse de una fuerza de mosquetes tan grande y unida, estas unidades pueden obtener mбs entrenamiento.

TEXT.Russian: Leverage our military advantage to collect harsh taxes from our feudal lords and their counties.
TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage to collect harsh taxes from our feudal lords and their counties.
TEXT.French: Utiliser notre avantage militaire pour collecter des impфts йlevйs auprиs de nos seigneurs fйodaux et de leurs provinces.
TEXT.German: Setzt unseren militдrischen Vorteil geschickt ein, um von unseren Feudalherren und ihren Lдndereien erbarmungslos hohe Steuern einzutreiben.
TEXT.Italian: Sfrutta il nostro vantaggio militare per esigere pesanti tasse dai nostri signori feudali e dalle loro contee.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestra ventaja militar se utilice para recaudar impuestos onerosos de nuestros seсores feudales y sus condados.

TEXT.Russian: Enjoy our Golden Age of Muskets.
TEXT.English: Enjoy our Golden Age of Muskets.
TEXT.French: Profitons de notre Age d'Or des arquebuses.
TEXT.German: GenieЯt das Goldene Zeitalter der Musketiere.
TEXT.Italian: Goditi l'etа dell'oro dei moschetti.
TEXT.Spanish: Disfrutad de vuestra edad de oro de los mosquetes.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of musket units. Advisors across the known world are panicking at the thought of their nation being ground under the thundering clatter and deadly terror of an endless hail of bullets.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of musket units. Advisors across the known world are panicking at the thought of their nation being ground under the thundering clatter and deadly terror of an endless hail of bullets.
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective a entraоnй le plus grand nombre d'unitйs d'arquebusiers. Les conseillers de tout le monde connu paniquent а la pensйe de leur nation mise а terre par le fracas assourdissant et la terreur mortelle d'une grкle de balles sans fin.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die grцЯte Truppe Musketier-Einheiten ausgebildet. Berater der gesamten entdeckten Welt brechen in Panik aus beim Gedanken daran, dass ihre Nation unter dem donnernden Lдrm des endlosen Kugelhagels zermalmt wird.
TEXT.Italian: La popolazione %s1_civ_adjective ha addestrato la piщ grande forza militare composta da soldati con moschetto. I consiglieri di tutto il mondo si stanno lasciando prendere dal panico, al pensiero della propria nazione investita da un'interminabile pioggia di proiettili.
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han entrenado a la mayor fuerza de mosquetes. Consejeros de todo el mundo conocido tiemblan ante la idea de que su naciуn pueda ser aplastada por el estrйpito y el terror de una interminable lluvia de balas.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of "Guns not Butter!"
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of "Guns not Butter!"
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte Pas de beurre mais des canons.
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Feuer statt Butter" ist gescheitert!
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa Fucili, non banane!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡La misiуn Armas de fuego, no mantequilla ha fracasado!

TEXT.Russian: Our civilization cries out for nobility to lead our people forward into a brighter future. [PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT], we should be able to find our way forward, through times peaceful or warlike.
TEXT.English: Our civilization cries out for nobility to lead our people forward into a brighter future. [PARAGRAPH:1]If we train enough [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT], we should be able to find our way forward, through times peaceful or warlike.
TEXT.French: Notre civilisation rйclame а la noblesse de guider le peuple vers un futur meilleur. [PARAGRAPH:1]Si nous entraоnons suffisamment de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chevaliers[COLOR_REVERT], nous pourrons aller de l'avant, en temps de paix comme en temps de guerre.
TEXT.German: Unsere Zivilisation dьrstet nach Adeligen, die unser Volk in eine bessere Zukunft fьhren werden. [PARAGRAPH:1]Wenn wir genьgend [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ritter[COLOR_REVERT] ausbilden, sollten wir unseren Weg finden, sei es in Zeiten des Friedens oder in Zeiten des Krieges.
TEXT.Italian: La nostra civiltа chiede a gran voce che la nobiltа la guidi verso un futuro piщ luminoso. [PARAGRAPH:1]Se addestriamo abbastanza [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalieri[COLOR_REVERT], dovremmo riuscire a sopravvivere ai tempi che verranno, siano essi pacifici o meno.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestra civilizaciуn implora a la nobleza que guнe a nuestra gente hacia un futuro mбs brillante. [PARAGRAPH:1]Si entrenamos a los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caballeros[COLOR_REVERT] suficientes, deberнamos ser capaces de encontrar la forma de avanzar a travйs de tiempos de paz o de guerra.

TEXT.Russian: Noble Knights[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the mandate of your people to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.English: Noble Knights[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by the mandate of your people to train a sizable force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.French: Nobles Chevaliers[PARAGRAPH:1]Votre peuple vous charge d'entraоner un nombre important d'unitйs de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chevaliers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Edle Ritter[PARAGRAPH:1]Das Volk verlangt von Euch, dass Ihr eine groЯe Truppe [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ritter[COLOR_REVERT] ausbildet.
TEXT.Italian: Nobili cavalieri[PARAGRAPH:1]Il tuo popolo ti ha incaricato di creare un esercito di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalieri[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Caballeros nobles[PARAGRAPH:1]Por mandato de vuestra gente, debйis entrenar a una fuerza considerable de unidades de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caballeros[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organized Religion[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
