TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organized Religion[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez entraоner %d1 unitйs de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chevaliers[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si votre civilisation contrфle le bвtiment : [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte avant vous ou si vous dйcouvrez les armes а feu avancйes (technologie du [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Tradition militaire[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusil[COLOR_REVERT], ou du [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemin de fer[COLOR_REVERT]) sans avoir rempli les conditions de victoire.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ritter[COLOR_REVERT]-Einheiten ausbilden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn in Ihrer Zivilisation die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organisierte Religion[COLOR_REVERT] herrscht.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn Ihre Zivilisation das Gebдude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] kontrolliert.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine gegnerische Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt oder wenn Sie Fortgeschrittene Feuerwaffen (die Technologien [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Militдrwesen[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Drall[COLOR_REVERT], oder [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Eisenbahn[COLOR_REVERT]) entdecken, ohne die Bedingungen erfьllt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire %d1 unitа di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalieri[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa se la tua civiltа ha come forma di governo preferita la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religione organizzata[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa se la tua civiltа controlla [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se una civiltа rivale la completa per prima, o se scoprirai armi da fuoco avanzate (le tecnologie [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Tradizione militare[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rigatura delle canne[COLOR_REVERT], o [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ferrovia[COLOR_REVERT]) senza aver soddisfatto le condizioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, es necesario entrenar a %d1 [NUM1:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caballeros[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn utiliza el principio de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religiуn organizada[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn controla [NUM2:un:una:unos:unas] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la cumple antes o si descubres armas de fuego avanzadas (las tecnologнas [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Tradiciуn militar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusil[COLOR_REVERT], o [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ferrocarril[COLOR_REVERT]) sin haber cumplido las condiciones.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have trained a large enough force of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez entraоnй suffisamment d'unitйs de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chevaliers[COLOR_REVERT]. Veuillez choisir votre rйcompense.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Die von Ihnen ausgebildete Truppe [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ritter[COLOR_REVERT] ist groЯ genug. Wдhlen Sie Ihre Belohnung aus.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai addestrato abbastanza [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalieri[COLOR_REVERT]. Scegli la ricompensa.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Se ha entrenado a una fuerza lo bastante grande de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caballeros[COLOR_REVERT]. Elegid vuestra recompensa.

TEXT.Russian: With such a large force of Knights working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.English: With such a large force of Knights working together, additional training for these units can be achieved.
TEXT.French: Avec autant de chevaliers opйrant ensemble, un entraоnement supplйmentaire pour ces unitйs peut кtre effectuй.
TEXT.German: Mit einer so groЯen Truppe Ritter kцnnen diese Einheiten weiter ausgebildet werden.
TEXT.Italian: Con tanti cavalieri che lavorano insieme и possibile ottenere un ulteriore addestramento per queste unitа.
TEXT.Spanish: Al tratarse de una fuerza de caballeros tan grande y unida, estas unidades pueden obtener mбs entrenamiento.

TEXT.Russian: Enlist our noble Knights into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.English: Enlist our noble Knights into a drive to spread our faith.
TEXT.French: Engager les nobles chevaliers pour rйpandre notre foi.
TEXT.German: Startet mit Euren edlen Rittern eine Kampagne, um unseren Glauben zu verbreiten.
TEXT.Italian: Sprona i nostri nobili cavalieri a diffondere la nostra fede.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestros caballeros nobles se inscriban en una campaсa de difusiуn de nuestra fe.

TEXT.Russian: From among our most faithful knights emerges one with holy vision.
TEXT.English: From among our most faithful knights emerges one with holy vision.
TEXT.French: L'un de nos chevaliers les plus zйlйs reзoit une vision divine.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer glдubigsten Ritter hatte eine gцttliche Vision.
TEXT.Italian: Dai nostri cavalieri piщ fedeli ne emerge uno con una visione sacra.
TEXT.Spanish: De entre nuestros mбs fieles caballeros, surge uno iluminado por la divinidad.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of knights. Advisors across the known world tremble at the thought of facing rows of lances powered by the thundering hooves of a full battle charge.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have trained the largest force of knights. Advisors across the known world tremble at the thought of facing rows of lances powered by the thundering hooves of a full battle charge.
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective a entraоnй le plus grand nombre de chevaliers. Les conseillers du monde entier tremblent а l'idйe de faire face aux rangйes de lances qui chargent au grand galop au coeur de la bataille.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die grцЯte Ritter-Truppe ausgebildet. Berater der gesamten entdeckten Welt erzittern beim Gedanken an die von donnernden Hufen angetriebenen Lanzenreihen auf dem Schlachtfeld.
TEXT.Italian: La popolazione %s1_civ_adjective ha addestrato la piщ grande forza militare composta da cavalieri. I consiglieri di tutto il mondo tremano al pensiero di affrontare le file di lance spinte da tonanti zoccoli di una carica di cavalleria.
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han entrenado a la mayor fuerza de caballeros. Consejeros de todo el mundo conocido se estremecen al pensar en hileras de lanzas impulsadas por el atronador galope de una carga en plena batalla.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of "Noble Knights!"
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of "Noble Knights!"
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte des Nobles chevaliers !
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Edle Ritter" ist gescheitert!
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa dei Nobili cavalieri!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡La misiуn Caballeros nobles ha fracasado!

TEXT.Russian: Our brightest admiral has proposed an amphibious assault strategy designed to capture port cities with lightning strikes.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we construct a large enough aircraft carrier battle fleet, we can bring any coastal city to its knees, making it much easier to attack amphibiously. We need a force large enough to disable all defenses with heavy shore bombardment and soften the defenders by bombing from the air. Then our troops may land on the same day the battle begins and thrust inland against a foe who will be in total disarray.
TEXT.English: Our brightest admiral has proposed an amphibious assault strategy designed to capture port cities with lightning strikes.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we construct a large enough aircraft carrier battle fleet, we can bring any coastal city to its knees, making it much easier to attack amphibiously. We need a force large enough to disable all defenses with heavy shore bombardment and soften the defenders by bombing from the air. Then our troops may land on the same day the battle begins and thrust inland against a foe who will be in total disarray.
TEXT.French: Notre amiral le plus brillant a proposй une stratйgie d'assaut amphibie, afin de capturer les villes portuaires lors de frappes йclairs.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si nous construisons une flotte de porte-avions assez importante, nous pouvons soumettre toutes les villes portuaires pour faciliter l'assaut amphibie. Nous devons disposer d'une force assez importante, afin de dйtruire toutes les dйfenses avec des bombardements cфtiers et d'affaiblir les dйfenseurs avec des bombardements aйriens. Ensuite, nos troupes accosteront le jour du dйbut de la bataille et avanceront dans les terres pour affronter un ennemi en plein dйsarroi.
TEXT.German: Unser klьgster Admiral hat eine Amphibienangriffsstrategie vorgeschlagen, mit der Hafenstдdte per Blitzangriff eingenommen werden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Wenn wir eine Flugzeugtrдger-Schlachtflotte bauen, die groЯ genug ist, kцnnen wir jede Kьstenstadt in die Knie zwingen, was einen Amphibienangriff bedeutend erleichtert. Unsere Streitmacht muss groЯ genug sein, um die gesamte Verteidigung mit schwerer Kьstenbombardierung auszuschalten und die Verteidiger durch Luftangriffe zu schwдchen. Dann kцnnen unsere Truppen an dem Tag, an dem die Schlacht beginnt, bereits landen und ins Landesinnere gegen einen Feind vorrьcken, der in vollkommenem Chaos versinkt.
TEXT.Italian: Il nostro ammiraglio piщ brillante ha proposto una strategia di assalto anfibio progettata per catturare le cittа con i porti con attacchi fulminei.[PARAGRAPH:1]Se costruiamo una flotta abbastanza grande di portaerei, possiamo mettere in ginocchio qualsiasi cittа costiera, rendendo molto piщ facile un attacco anfibio. Abbiamo bisogno di una forza abbastanza grande da disabilitare le difese con pesanti bombardamenti e ammorbidire i difensori bombardandoli dal cielo. Quindi le nostre truppe potranno sbarcare il giorno dell'inizio della battaglia e penetrare in un territorio difeso da un nemico in totale confusione.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro mбs brillante almirante ha propuesto una estrategia de asalto anfibio diseсada para apoderarse de ciudades portuarias con ataques relбmpago.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si construimos una flota de combate de portaaviones lo bastante grande, podremos doblegar a cualquier ciudad costera, lo que facilitarб mucho el ataque anfibio. Necesitamos una fuerza lo bastante grande como para anular todas las defensas mediante un intenso bombardeo en la costa y debilitar a los defensores bombardeando desde el aire. Entonces nuestras tropas podrбn aterrizar el mismo dнa que la batalla empiece y presionar hacia el interior a un enemigo que estarб totalmente confundido.

TEXT.Russian: The Overwhelm Doctrine[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to construct a fully functional aircraft carrier battle fleet.
TEXT.English: The Overwhelm Doctrine[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your military leaders to construct a fully functional aircraft carrier battle fleet.
TEXT.French: La Doctrine de l'Ecrasement[PARAGRAPH:1]Vos dirigeants militaires vous chargent de construire une flotte opйrationnelle de porte-avions.
TEXT.German: Die Ьberwдltigungsdoktrin[PARAGRAPH:1]Eure Militдrfьhrer verlangen von Euch, eine voll funktionale Flugzeugtrдger-Schlachtflotte zu bauen.
TEXT.Italian: Dottrina della sopraffazione[PARAGRAPH:1]I capi militari ti hanno incaricato di costruire una flotta da battaglia con tanto di portaerei.
TEXT.Spanish: Doctrina del doblegamiento[PARAGRAPH:1]Los lнderes militares encargan la construcciуn de una flota de combate de portaaviones plenamente operativa.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT], and %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT] units. A source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] will be required to fuel the planes.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization was the one to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must build %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT], and %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT] units. A source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] will be required to fuel the planes.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization was the one to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez construire %d1 unitйs : [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 unitйs : [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 unitйs : [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT] et %d7 unitйs : [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT]. Une source de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pйtrole[COLOR_REVERT] sera nйcessaire pour ravitailler les avions.[PARAGRAPH:1]Une option de rйcompense supplйmentaire sera disponible si votre civilisation est la seule а construire le bвtiment : [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale achиve cette quкte avant vous.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT]-, %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT]-, %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT]- und %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT]-Einheiten errichten. Fьr den Flugzeugtreibstoff wird [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Цl[COLOR_REVERT] benцtigt.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie erhalten eine zusдtzliche Belohnung, wenn Ihre Zivilisation das Gebдude [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet hat.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine gegnerische Zivilisation die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi costruire queste unitа: %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6_unit[COLOR_REVERT], e %d7 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8_unit[COLOR_REVERT]. И necessaria una fonte di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Petrolio[COLOR_REVERT] per fornire carburante agli aerei.[PARAGRAPH:1]Otterrai un'ulteriore ricompensa se sarа stata la tua civiltа a costruire [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se un'altra civiltа la completa per prima.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis construir %d1 [NUM1:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2:2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d3 [NUM3:unidad:unidades] de[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s4:2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], %d5 [NUM5:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s6:2_unit[COLOR_REVERT], y %d7 [NUM7:unidad:unidades] de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s8:2_unit[COLOR_REVERT]. Serб necesaria una fuente de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Petrуleo[COLOR_REVERT] para alimentar los aviones.[PARAGRAPH:1]Serб posible elegir una opciуn de recompensa adicional si vuestra civilizaciуn es la que construye [NUM9:un:una:unos:unas] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s9_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival la completa antes.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have built a powerful Aircraft Carrier battle fleet capable of conquering enemy cities in a single attack. A force capable of executing the Overwhelm Doctrine is now yours to command. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have built a powerful Aircraft Carrier battle fleet capable of conquering enemy cities in a single attack. A force capable of executing the Overwhelm Doctrine is now yours to command. Please choose your reward.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez construit une puissante flotte de porte-avions capable de conquйrir les villes ennemies en une seule attaque. Vous dirigez а prйsent une armйe capable d'exйcuter la Doctrine d'Ecrasement. Veuillez choisir votre rйcompense.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben eine mдchtige Flugzeugtrдger-Schlachtflotte aufgebaut, mit der feindliche Stдdte in einem einzigen Angriff erobert werden kцnnen. Sie befehligen jetzt eine Streitmacht, welche die Ьberwдltigungsdoktrin ausfьhren kann. Wдhlen Sie Ihre Belohnung aus.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai costruito una potente flotta da battaglia con portaerei, in grado di conquistare cittа nemiche con un singolo attacco. Ora al tuo comando c'и una forza in grado di mettere in atto la dottrina della sopraffazione. Scegli la ricompensa.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Habйis creado una poderosa flota de combate de portaaviones capaz de conquistar ciudades enemigas con un solo ataque. Ahora tenйis a vuestras уrdenes a una fuerza capaz de ejecutar la doctrina del doblegamiento. Elegid vuestra recompensa.

TEXT.Russian: Take advantage of our momentum to provide additional training for these crews. Prepare them for battle.
TEXT.English: Take advantage of our momentum to provide additional training for these crews. Prepare them for battle.
TEXT.French: Profiter de notre avantage pour fournir un entraоnement supplйmentaire aux йquipages et les prйparer pour la bataille.
TEXT.German: Nutzt die gьnstige Situation, um die Besatzung weiter auszubilden. Bereitet sie auf die Schlacht vor.
TEXT.Italian: Approfitta dello slancio per addestrare ulteriormente le truppe. Preparale per la battaglia.
TEXT.Spanish: Aprovechemos estos favorables momentos para dar entrenamiento adicional a estas tripulaciones. Que se preparen para la batalla.

TEXT.Russian: Our intent is to keep the peace through strength. Leverage our might in to commercial opportunity.
TEXT.English: Our intent is to keep the peace through strength. Leverage our might in to commercial opportunity.
TEXT.French: Notre intention est de conserver la paix en impressionnant. Utiliser notre puissance а des fins commerciales.
TEXT.German: Unser Ziel ist es, den Frieden durch Stдrke aufrechtzuerhalten. Setzt unsere Macht geschickt ein, um daraus wirtschaftliche Vorteile zu ziehen.
TEXT.Italian: Il nostro scopo и di mantenere la pace con la forza. Trasforma la nostra potenza in un'opportunitа commerciale.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestra intenciуn es emplear la fuerza para mantener la paz. Que nuestro poder sea utilizado para explotar las oportunidades comerciales.

TEXT.Russian: Leverage our military advantage to persuade the world to ban nuclear weapons.
TEXT.English: Leverage our military advantage to persuade the world to ban nuclear weapons.
TEXT.French: Utiliser notre avantage militaire pour persuader le monde de bannir les armes nuclйaires.
TEXT.German: Setzt unseren militдrischen Vorteil dazu ein, die Welt vom Nuklearwaffenverbot zu ьberzeugen.
TEXT.Italian: Sfrutta il nostro vantaggio militare per persuadere il mondo a bandire le armi nucleari.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestra ventaja militar se aproveche para convencer al mundo de que se deben prohibir las armas nucleares.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]No nuclear weapons.
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No nuclear weapons.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas d'armes nuclйaires.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Keine Nuklearwaffen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Niente armi nucleari.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Armas nucleares no.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have constructed what is by far the most deadly fleet of warships in the history of warfare. Their aircraft carrier battle group could crush anything that gets in its way.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have constructed what is by far the most deadly fleet of warships in the history of warfare. Their aircraft carrier battle group could crush anything that gets in its way.
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective a construit ce qui est de loin la plus impressionnante flotte de navires de guerre de l'histoire. Leur groupe de porte-avions de combat pourrait йcraser quiconque se met en travers son chemin.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die weitaus mдchtigste Kriegsschiffflotte in der Geschichte der Kriegsfьhrung errichtet. Ihre Flugzeugtrдger-Kampftruppe kцnnte alles zerschmettern, das sich ihr in den Weg stellt.
TEXT.Italian: La popolazione %s1_civ_adjective ha costruito la piщ letale flotta di navi da guerra della storia. Il loro gruppo da battaglia con portaerei puт schiacciare qualsiasi cosa si metta sulla sua strada.
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han construido la que es, con mucho, la mбs letal flota de barcos de guerra de la historia bйlica. Su grupo de portaaviones de combate podrнa aplastar cualquier cosa que se cruzase en su camino.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of the "Overwhelm Doctrine!"
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the "Overwhelm Doctrine!"
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte de la Doctrine de l'Ecrasement !
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Ьberwдltigungsdoktrin" ist gescheitert!
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa della Dottrina della sopraffazione!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡La misiуn Doctrina del doblegamiento ha fracasado!

TEXT.Russian: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation seeks government incentives to better enable his company to expand.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can assist in spreading his corporation to new cities, profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.English: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation seeks government incentives to better enable his company to expand.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can assist in spreading his corporation to new cities, profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.French: Le PDG de l'entreprise : %s11_corporation demande des aides gouvernementales pour permettre а son entreprise de s'йtendre.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si nous pouvons aider а l'expansion de cette corporation а de nouvelles villes, les profits vont dйcoller.
TEXT.German: Der Vorstandsvorsitzende von %s11_corporation verlangt nach Anreizen der Regierung, um die Expansion seines Unternehmens voranzutreiben.[PARAGRAPH:1]Wenn wir die Ausbreitung seiner Kapitalgesellschaft in neue Stдdte unterstьtzen, werden die Gewinne in die Hцhe schieЯen.
TEXT.Italian: Il direttore esecutivo della %s11_corporation desidera incentivi governativi che permettano alla compagnia di espandersi meglio.[PARAGRAPH:1]Se aiutiamo la corporazione a espandersi in nuove cittа, i profitti saliranno alle stelle.
TEXT.Spanish: El director ejecutivo de %s11_corporation busca incentivos gubernamentales que le posibiliten la expansiуn de su compaснa.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si le ayudamos a extender su corporaciуn a nuevas ciudades, los beneficios subirбn como la espuma.

TEXT.Russian: Corporate Expansion[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to expand the reach of their corporation.
TEXT.English: Corporate Expansion[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to expand the reach of their corporation.
TEXT.French: Expansion d'entreprise[PARAGRAPH:1]Les dirigeants de vos entreprises vous chargent d'йtendre l'influence de leur sociйtй.
TEXT.German: Unternehmensexpansion[PARAGRAPH:1]Die Unternehmensvorstдnde verlangen von Euch, die Reichweite ihrer Kapitalgesellschaft auszudehnen.
TEXT.Italian: Espansione corporativa[PARAGRAPH:1]I capi della corporazione ti hanno incaricato di espandere la loro influenza.
TEXT.Spanish: Expansiуn corporativa[PARAGRAPH:1]Los lнderes corporativos encargan aumentar la expansiуn y alcance de su corporaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] to %d2 new cities.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] to %d2 new cities.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez йtendre l'entreprise [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] а %d2 nouvelles villes.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie die Kapitalgesellschaft [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] in %d2 neue Stдdte expandieren.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi diffondere la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] in %d2 nuove cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis extender [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_corporation[COLOR_REVERT] a %d2 nuevas ciudades.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez achevй la quкte d'Expansion d'entreprise et permis а l'entreprise : %s11_corporation de faire des profits supplйmentaires.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben die Quest "Unternehmensexpansion" abgeschlossen und der Kapitalgesellschaft %s11_corporation zusдtzliche Gewinne ermцglicht.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai completato l'impresa dell'Espansione corporativa, permettendo alla %s11_corporation di realizzare profitti extra.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Habйis completado la misiуn Expansiуn corporativa; %s11_corporation podrб obtener beneficios adicionales.

TEXT.Russian: Cha-ching! Show me the money!
TEXT.English: Cha-ching! Show me the money!
TEXT.French: Gling gling ! Par ici la monnaie !
TEXT.German: Ka-ching! Her mit den Moneten!
TEXT.Italian: Pling! Fatemi vedere i soldi!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Clinc, clinc! ¡Quiero ver el dinero!

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion. %s6_corporation profits expected to skyrocket.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion. %s6_corporation profits expected to skyrocket.
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective a achevй la quкte d'Expansion d'entreprise. On s'attend а ce que les profits de l'entreprise : %s6_corporation dйcollent.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die Quest Unternehmensexpansion abgeschlossen. Die Gewinne der Kapitalgesellschaft %s6_corporation werden in die Hцhe schieЯen.
TEXT.Italian: Il popolo %s1_civ_adjective ha completato l'impresa dell'Espansione corporativa. I profitti della %s6_corporation saliranno alle stelle.
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han completado la misiуn Expansiуn corporativa. Se espera que los beneficios de %s6_corporation suban como la espuma.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of the Corporate Expansion!
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Corporate Expansion!
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte d'Expansion d'entreprise.
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Unternehmensexpansion" ist gescheitert!
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa dell'Espansione corporativa!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡La misiуn Expansiуn corporativa ha fracasado!

TEXT.Russian: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation covets getting out from under the thumb of foreign suppliers of raw materials.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can obtain control over all resource types his corporation needs for industrial use, their profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.English: The Chief Executive Officer of %s11_corporation covets getting out from under the thumb of foreign suppliers of raw materials.[PARAGRAPH:1]If we can obtain control over all resource types his corporation needs for industrial use, their profits will skyrocket.
TEXT.French: Le PDG de l'entreprise %s11_corporation voudrait se dйtacher de l'emprise de ses fournisseurs de matiиres premiиres йtrangers.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si nous pouvons obtenir le contrфle de tous les types de ressources dont sa sociйtй a besoin pour ses fins industrielles, leurs profits dйcolleront.
TEXT.German: Der Vorstandsvorsitzende der Kapitalgesellschaft %s11_corporation strebt danach, sich aus der Abhдngigkeit von auslдndischen Rohstofflieferanten zu lцsen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Wenn wir die Kontrolle ьber alle Ressourcen erlangen, die seine Kapitalgesellschaft fьr die industrielle Nutzung benцtigt, werden ihre Gewinne in die Hцhe schieЯen.
TEXT.Italian: Il direttore esecutivo della %s11_corporation vorrebbe sottrarsi al controllo straniero per la fornitura di materie prime.[PARAGRAPH:1]Se riusciamo a ottenere il controllo di tutti i tipi di risorse di cui ha bisogno la corporazione per l'uso industriale, i profitti saliranno alle stelle.
TEXT.Spanish: El director ejecutivo de %s11_corporation anhela acabar con su dependencia de los proveedores extranjeros de materias primas.[PARAGRAPH:1]Si logramos obtener el control de todos los tipos de recurso que esta corporaciуn necesita para sus procesos industriales, sus beneficios subirбn como la espuma.

TEXT.Russian: Hostile Takeover[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to obtain (by any means necessary) our own source of all resource types they need to conduct their operations.
TEXT.English: Hostile Takeover[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your corporate leaders to obtain (by any means necessary) our own source of all resource types they need to conduct their operations.
TEXT.French: OPA hostile[PARAGRAPH:1]Les entrepreneurs nationaux vous chargent d'obtenir (par n'importe quel moyen) une source nationale pour les ressources dont ils ont besoin.
TEXT.German: Feindliche Ьbernahme[PARAGRAPH:1]Die Vorsitzenden Eurer Kapitalgesellschaften verlangen von Euch, eigene Vorkommen fьr alle Ressourcen zu erschlieЯen, die sie fьr die Ausьbung ihrer Geschдfte benцtigen, egal mit welchen Mitteln.
TEXT.Italian: Rilevamento ostile[PARAGRAPH:1]I capi della corporazione ti hanno incaricato di ottenere (con ogni mezzo) il controllo di ogni tipo di risorsa necessaria per le loro operazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: Opa hostil[PARAGRAPH:1]Los lнderes corporativos piden que se consiga una fuente propia para todos los tipos de recurso que necesitan para desarrollar sus operaciones, y que se empleen para ello todos los medios necesarios.

TEXT.Russian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must settle near uncontrolled resources or attack rival civilizations and take over their resources.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will need to obtain new sources of %d1 [NUM1:resource type:different resource types] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]You must also retain control over all needed resource types already owned.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization who is also seeking to obtain control over needed resources for one of its corporations should happen to complete this task ahead of you.
TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must settle near uncontrolled resources or attack rival civilizations and take over their resources.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will need to obtain new sources of %d1 [NUM1:resource type:different resource types] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]You must also retain control over all needed resource types already owned.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization who is also seeking to obtain control over needed resources for one of its corporations should happen to complete this task ahead of you.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour achever cette quкte, vous devez vous installer prиs des ressources non contrфlйes ou attaquer les civilisations rivales et prendre leurs ressources.[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous devrez obtenir de nouvelles sources de %d1 [NUM1:type de ressource:types de ressources diffйrents] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous devez aussi garder le contrфle de tous les types de ressources dйjа possйdйs.[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous йchouerez si une civilisation rivale qui souhaite aussi obtenir le contrфle des ressources nйcessaires а ses corporations parvient а atteindre son objectif avant vous.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diese Quest abzuschlieЯen, mьssen Sie sich in der Nдhe von nicht erschlossenen Vorkommen ansiedeln oder rivalisierende Zivilisationen angreifen und ihre Ressourcen ьbernehmen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie mьssen neue Vorkommen von %d1 [NUM1:Ressource:unterschiedlichen Ressourcen] (%s2_list_of_resources) erschlieЯen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie mьssen ebenfalls die Kontrolle ьber die Vorkommen aller benцtigten Ressourcen, die bereits Ihnen gehцren, aufrechterhalten.[PARAGRAPH:1]Sie scheitern, wenn eine gegnerische Zivilisation, die auch die Kontrolle ьber benцtigte Ressourcen fьr eine ihrer Kapitalgesellschaften erlangen will, die Quest vor Ihnen abschlieЯt.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]Per completare l'impresa devi colonizzare vicino a risorse non controllate o attaccare civiltа rivali e impadronirti delle loro risorse.[PARAGRAPH:1]Dovrai riuscire a ottenere fonti di %d1 [NUM1:tipo di risorsa:diversi tipi di risorsa] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]Devi anche mantenere il controllo di tutte le risorse necessarie che giа possiedi.[PARAGRAPH:1]Fallirai nell'impresa se una civiltа rivale riuscirа a ottenere prima di te il controllo delle risorse necessarie a una delle sue corporazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]Para completar esta misiуn, debйis colonizar zonas cercanas a recursos sin controlar o atacar a civilizaciones rivales para tomar el control de sus recursos.[PARAGRAPH:1]Deberйis obtener nuevas fuentes para %d1 [NUM1:tipo de recurso:tipos de recursos] (%s2_list_of_resources).[PARAGRAPH:1]Tambiйn debйis mantener el control de todos los tipos de recurso necesarios ya poseнdos.[PARAGRAPH:1]Esta misiуn fracasarб si una civilizaciуn rival que tambiйn intenta obtener el control de los recursos que necesita una de sus corporaciones logra completar esta misiуn antes que vos.

TEXT.Russian: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Hostile Takeover and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.
TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have completed the quest of Hostile Takeover and enabled %s11_corporation to turn extra profit.
TEXT.French: Fйlicitations ! Vous avez achevй la quкte de l'OPA Hostile et permis а la sociйtй : %s11_corporation de faire des profits supplйmentaires.
TEXT.German: Glьckwunsch! Sie haben die Quest "Feindliche Ьbernahme" abgeschlossen und der Kapitalgesellschaft %s11_corporation dadurch zu zusдtzlichem Gewinn verholfen.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai completato l'impresa del Rilevamento ostile, permettendo alla %s11_corporation di realizzare profitti extra.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Habйis completado la misiуn Opa hostil: %s11_corporation podrб obtener beneficios extra.

TEXT.Russian: Cha-ching! Show me the money!
TEXT.English: Cha-ching! Show me the money!
TEXT.French: Gling gling ! Par ici la monnaie !
TEXT.German: Ka-ching! Her mit dem Zaster!
TEXT.Italian: Pling! Fatemi vedere i soldi!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Clinc clinc! ¡Quiero ver el dinero!

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion. %s6_corporation profits expected to skyrocket.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of Corporate Expansion. %s6_corporation profits expected to skyrocket.
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective a achevй la quкte d'Expansion d'entreprise. On s'attend а ce que les profits de la sociйtй : %s6_corporation dйcollent.
TEXT.German: Das %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat die Quest "Feindliche Ьbernahme" abgeschlossen. Die Gewinne der Kapitalgesellschaft %s6_corporation werden in die Hцhe schieЯen.
TEXT.Italian: Il popolo %s1_civ_adjective ha completato l'impresa dell'Espansione corporativa. I profitti della %s6_corporation saliranno alle stelle.
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han completado la misiуn Expansiуn corporativa. Se espera que los beneficios de %s6_corporation suban como la espuma.

TEXT.Russian: You have failed the quest of the Hostile Takeover!
TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Hostile Takeover!
TEXT.French: Vous avez йchouй dans la quкte de l'OPA Hostile !
TEXT.German: Die Quest "Feindliche Ьbernahme" ist gescheitert!
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa del Rilevamento ostile!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡La misiуn Opa hostil ha fracasado!

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective game designers have developed a new game of Civilization.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective game designers have developed a new game of Civilization.
TEXT.French: Les developpeurs de jeux videos %s1_civ_adjective game ont cree un nouvelle version de Civilization.
TEXT.German: Von %s1:2_civ_adjective Entwicklern wird ein neuartiges Computerspiel namens 'Civilization' prдsentiert.
TEXT.Italian: Progettisti di videogiochi %s1_civ_adjective hanno sviluppato un nuovo gioco chiamato Civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: Los diseсadores de juegos %s1_civ_adjective han desarrollado un nuevo juego de Civilization.

TEXT.Russian: Our game designers have developed a new addictive game of Civilization. How shall we proceed?
TEXT.English: Our game designers have developed a new addictive game of Civilization. How shall we proceed?
TEXT.French: Nos developpeurs de jeux videos on cree une nouvelle et addictive version de Civilization. Que devons-nous faire?
TEXT.German: Unsere Entwickler prдsentieren ein neuartiges Computerspiel namens 'Civilization'. Was meint Ihr dazu?
TEXT.Italian: I nostri progettisti di videogiochi hanno sviluppato un nuovo gioco chiamato Civilization. Cosa dobbiamo fare?
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros diseсadores de juegos han desarrollado un nuevo juego de Civilization. ¿Quй debemos hacer?

TEXT.Russian: Send congratulations to the developers. Our people should enjoy this game.
TEXT.English: Send congratulations to the developers. Our people should enjoy this game.
TEXT.French: Envoyez nos felicitations aux developpeurs. Notre bon peuple devrait apprecier ce jeu.
TEXT.German: Ьbermittelt meine Glьckwьnsche. Unser Volk soll sich an dem Spiel erfreuen.
Ьbermittelt meine Glьckwьnsche. Unser Volk soll sich an dem Spiel erfreuen.
TEXT.Italian: Manda le nostre congratulazioni agli sviluppatori. La nostra gente si divertirа con questo gioco.
TEXT.Spanish: Enviar felicitaciones a los desarrolladores. Nuestro pueblo disfrutarб este juego.

TEXT.Russian: This game seems to have great educational potential. Suggest that it be used in our educational system.
TEXT.English: This game seems to have great educational potential. Suggest that it be used in our educational system.
TEXT.French: Il semblerait que ce jeu aie un fort potentiel educatif. Nous devrions l'utiliser dans notre systeme scolaire.
TEXT.German: Dieses Spiel scheint groЯes Bildungspotential zu haben. Lasst es uns im Bildungswesen einsetzen.
TEXT.Italian: Questo gioco sembra avere un grande potenziale educativo. Propongo che venga usato nel nostro sistema scolastico.
TEXT.Spanish: Este juego parece tener un gran potencial educacional. Sugerir que sea usado en nuestro sistema educativo.

TEXT.Russian: Computer games? They have no place in our society! Sell the franchise to foreign buyers!
TEXT.English: Computer games? They have no place in our society! Sell the franchise to foreign buyers!
TEXT.French: Des jeux videos? Pas de ca dans notre societe! Vendez la franchise a des acheteurs etrangers!
TEXT.German: Computerspiele? So etwas verdirbt die Gesellschaft nur. Verkauft die Rechte ins Ausland!
TEXT.Italian: Giochi per computer? Non c'и posto per loro nella nostra societа! Vendi la licenza ad acquirenti stranieri!
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Juegos de ordenador? No tienen cabida en nuestra sociedad! Vender la franquicia a compradores extranjeros!

TEXT.Russian: Sir, our slaves are on the verge of revolting! As long as our society continues to use slaves, there is a possibility of them revolting!
TEXT.English: Sir, our slaves are on the verge of revolting! As long as our society continues to use slaves, there is a possibility of them revolting!
TEXT.French: Sire, nos esclaves sont sur le point de se revolter! Tant que notre societe aura recours a l'esclavage, nous courrons le risque d'une revolte!
TEXT.German: Verzeiht, aber unsere Sklaven werden zunehmend unzufriedener! Solange unsere Gesellschaft die Sklaverei weiter praktiziert, laufen wir die Gefahr von Aufstдnden!
TEXT.Italian: Signore, gli schiavi sono sull'orlo di una rivolta! Fino a quando la nostra societа continuerа ad usare schiavi, ci sarа la possibilitа di una loro ribellione!
TEXT.Spanish: Seсor, nuestros esclavos estбn a punto de rebelarse! Mientras nuestra sociedad siga usando esclavos, hay una posibilidad de que se rebelen!

TEXT.Russian: The slaves of %s2_city are on the verge of revolt!
TEXT.English: The slaves of %s2_city are on the verge of revolt!
TEXT.French: Les esclaves de la ville de %s2_city sont sur le point de se revolter.
TEXT.German: Die unterdrьckten Sklaven in %s2_city stehen am Rande eines Aufstandes!
TEXT.Italian: Gli schiavi di %s2_city sono sull'orlo di una rivolta!
TEXT.Spanish: Los esclavos de %s2_city estбn a punto de rebelarse!

TEXT.Russian: Inspired by books telling stories about the culture of %s2_city, immigrants are flowing to the city!
TEXT.English: Inspired by books telling stories about the culture of %s2_city, immigrants are flowing to the city!
TEXT.French: Motives par ce qu'ils ont lu sur la culture de %s2_city, les immigrants y arrivent en masse!
TEXT.German: Geschichten ьber die reiche Kultur der Stadt %s2_city ziehen viele Immigranten an.
TEXT.Italian: Ispirati dai libri che raccontano storie sulle bellezze culturali di %s2_city, un flusso di immigranti si dirige verso la cittа!
TEXT.Spanish: Inspirados por libros que narran historias sobre la cultura de %s2_city, los inmigrantes estбn inundando la ciudad!

TEXT.Russian: Immigrants are flowing to %s2_city inspired by stories of its culture!
TEXT.English: Immigrants are flowing to %s2_city inspired by stories of its culture!
TEXT.French: Les immigrants arrivent en masse dans la ville de %s2_city, attires par les histoires qu'ils ont lu sur sa culture!
TEXT.German: Geschichten ьber die reiche Kultur der Stadt %s2_city ziehen viele Immigranten an.
TEXT.Italian: Un flusso di immigranti si dirige verso %s2_city ispirati da racconti sulle sue bellezze culturali!
TEXT.Spanish: Los inmigrantes estбn inundando %s2_city inspirados por libros que narran historias sobre su cultura!

TEXT.Russian: We are pleased at their new choice of residence.
TEXT.English: We are pleased at their new choice of residence.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes ravis de leur decision de s'installer ici.
TEXT.German: Unsere lebendige Kultur erfьllt mich mit Freude.
TEXT.Italian: Siamo soddisfatti per la loro scelta di trasferirsi nella cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: Nos agrada que hayan elegido residir allн.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective herbalists have discovered a plant that might result in better illness treatment.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective herbalists have discovered a plant that might result in better illness treatment.
TEXT.French: Les botanistes %s1_civ_adjective ont decouvert une plante qui pourrait ameliorer le traitement de certaines maladies.
TEXT.German: Von %s1:2_civ_adjective Naturheilkundigen wird die besondere Wirksamkeit einer Pflanze fьr die Behandlung von Krankheiten entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: Erboristi %s1_civ_adjective hanno scoperto una pianta che potrebbe risultare utile nella cura di alcune malattie.
TEXT.Spanish: Boticarios %s1_civ_adjective han descubierto una planta que puede servir para un mejor tratamiento de enfermedades.

TEXT.Russian: Our herbalists have discovered a new plant that holds great promise for health treatments. However, tests on human subjects are required to find the right mixture.
TEXT.English: Our herbalists have discovered a new plant that holds great promise for health treatments. However, tests on human subjects are required to find the right mixture.
TEXT.French: Nos botanistes ont decouvert une nouvelle plante prometteuse pour la medecine. Cependant, des tests sur des humains sont requis pour trouver les dosages appropries.
TEXT.German: Unsere Naturheilkundigen haben die besondere Wirksamkeit einer Pflanze fьr die Behandlung von Krankheiten entdeckt. Es sind allerdings umfassende Feldversuche an Menschen erforderlich, die fьr die Betroffenen nicht ungefдhrlich sind.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri erboristi hanno scoperto una pianta che sembra avere un grande potenziale per un uso nel campo medico. Tuttavia, sono richiesti test su esseri umani per trovare la miscela giusta.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros boticarios han descubierto una nueva planta prometedora para tratar enfermedades. Sin embargo, es necesario pruebas en sujetos humanos para refinar la composiciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Forget these tests. Anything worth knowing has already been discovered, so why risk needless death?
TEXT.English: Forget these tests. Anything worth knowing has already been discovered, so why risk needless death?
TEXT.French: Au diable les tests! Tout ce qui en vaut la peine a deja ete decouvert, alors pourquoi risquer des morts inutiles?
TEXT.German: Riskante Feldversuche kommen nicht in Frage. Wir setzen die Gesundheit von Menschen nicht aufs Spiel.
TEXT.Italian: Dimentica i test. Tutto ciт che и necessario nel campo medico и giа stato scoperto, perchи rischiare decessi inutili?
TEXT.Spanish: Olvida esas pruebas. Ya ha sido descubierto algo de valor, ¿para quй arriesgarse con pruebas innecesarias?

TEXT.Russian: Alright, try limited tests, but only on non-essential citizens.
TEXT.English: Alright, try limited tests, but only on non-essential citizens.
TEXT.French: D'accord, lancez des tests restreints seulement sur des citoyens de seconde classe.
TEXT.German: Ich stimme begrenzten Tests zu, die sich auf unwesentliche Bьrger beschrдnken.
TEXT.Italian: Va bene, diamo il via a test limitati, ma solo su cittadini "non essenziali".
TEXT.Spanish: De acuerdo, hagan pruebas limitadas, pero solo en ciudadanos no esenciales.

TEXT.Russian: Health is the bedrock to world domination! Run full scale tests on all but the youngest and weakest among us.
TEXT.English: Health is the bedrock to world domination! Run full scale tests on all but the youngest and weakest among us.
TEXT.French: La sante est le pilier fondateur de toute domination mondiale! Lancez des tests a grande echelle sur tous nos citoyens adultes et en bonne sante!
TEXT.German: Ohne Risiko ist kein Fortschritt zu haben, und eine GroЯmacht braucht ein gesundes Volk! Lasst umfassende Versuchsreihen durchfьhren, von denen nur die Jьngsten und Schwдchsten ausgenommen sind.
TEXT.Italian: La buona salute dei nostri cittadini и uno dei fondamenti per la dominazione mondiale! Diamo il via a test su larga scala su tutte le persone eccetto i piщ giovani e i piщ deboli.
TEXT.Spanish: La salud es la base de la dominaciуn mundial! Realicen pruebas completas en todos salvo los mбs dйbiles

TEXT.Russian: In their attempts to find the right mixture of herbs, our healers caused fatalities throughout the empire!
TEXT.English: In their attempts to find the right mixture of herbs, our healers caused fatalities throughout the empire!
TEXT.French: Les tentatives de nos chercheurs pour trouver le bon dosage de plantes ont cause de nombreuses morts dans notre empire!
TEXT.German: Umfassende Versuchsreihen fьr ein neues Heilmittel verursachen Todesfдlle im gesamten Reich!
TEXT.Italian: Durante i vari tentativi di trovare la giusta miscela di erbe, i nostri erboristi hanno causato la morte di diverse persone all'interno del nostro impero!
TEXT.Spanish: En su intento por refinar la composiciуn, nuestros sanitarios causan fallecimientos por todo el imperio!

TEXT.Russian: Our experiments have been a success! Our cities now enjoy better healing herbs!
TEXT.English: Our experiments have been a success! Our cities now enjoy better healing herbs!
TEXT.French: Nos experiences ont reussi! Nos villes beneficient desormais d'herbes medicinales ameliorees!
TEXT.German: Die Versuchsreihen fьr ein neues Heilmittel sind ein voller Erfolg. Die Gesundheit unserer Stдdte profitiert von den neuen Behandlungsmцglichkeiten!
TEXT.Italian: I nostri esperimenti hanno avuto successo! Le nostre cittа hanno ora a disposizione erbe curative di migliore qualitа!
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros experimentos han sido un йxito! Nuestros ciudadanos ahora disfrutan de mejores hierbas curativas!

TEXT.Russian: Our experiments have been a resounding success! We now posess much better treatments!
TEXT.English: Our experiments have been a resounding success! We now posess much better treatments!
TEXT.French: Nos experiences ont reussi au-dela de nos esperances! Nous disposons desormais de meilleurs traitements!
TEXT.German: Die Versuchsreihen fьr ein neues Heilmittel sind ein durchschlagender Erfolg. Wir besitzen jetzt deutlich bessere Behandlungsmцglichkeiten!
TEXT.Italian: I nostri esperimenti hanno avuto un successo straordinario! Abbiamo ora a nostra disposizione cure molto migliori per alcune malattie!
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros experimentos han sido un йxito rotundo! Ahora poseemos tratamientos mucho mejores!

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective hunters have discovered a great beast lurking near one of their camps.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective hunters have discovered a great beast lurking near one of their camps.
TEXT.French: Les chasseurs %s1_civ_adjective ont decouvert une enorme bete rodant pres d'un de leurs camps.
TEXT.German: Von %s1:2_civ_adjective Jдgern gibt es Berichte ьber ein riesiges Tier, das sich in der Nдhe eines Lagers gezeigt haben soll.
TEXT.Italian: Cacciatori %s1_civ_adjective hanno avvistato un grande animale appostato nei dintorni di un loro accampamento.
TEXT.Spanish: Cazadores %s1_civ_adjective han descubierto una gran bestia acechando uno de sus campamentos.

TEXT.Russian: A great beast has been discovered near one of our hunting camps.
TEXT.English: A great beast has been discovered near one of our hunting camps.
TEXT.French: Un enorme animal a ete decouvert pres d'un de nos camps de chasse.
TEXT.German: Ein riesiges Tier wurde in der Nдhe eines unserer Lager gesichtet.
TEXT.Italian: Un grande animale и stato avvistato nei dintorni di un nostro campo di caccia.
TEXT.Spanish: Una gran bestia ha sido descubierta cerca de uno de nuestros campamentos.

TEXT.Russian: Let it breed and give offspring. Hunt sparingly.
TEXT.English: Let it breed and give offspring. Hunt sparingly.
TEXT.French: Laissez-la se reproduire, et chassez sa progeniture avec parcimonie.
TEXT.German: Lasst das Tier sich vermehren und die Nachkommen maЯvoll bejagen.
TEXT.Italian: Lasciate che si riproduca. Cacciate con moderazione.
TEXT.Spanish: Dejenle criar y tener descendencia. Cazar esporadicamente.

TEXT.Russian: Looks like it could feed many people. Organize a hunting party!
TEXT.English: Looks like it could feed many people. Organize a hunting party!
TEXT.French: Sa viande pourrait nourrir beaucoup d'entre nous! Rassemblez nos chasseurs!
TEXT.German: Das Tier kann sicher viele Menschen satt werden. Organisiert eine Jagd!
TEXT.Italian: Potremmo dar da mangiare a diverse persone. Organizziamo una bella caccia!
TEXT.Spanish: Parece que podrнa alimentar a mucha gente. Organizar una partida de caza!

TEXT.Russian: Hunt it? Are you mad? The beast is a manifestation of a divine spirit!
TEXT.English: Hunt it? Are you mad? The beast is a manifestation of a divine spirit!
TEXT.French: La chasser? Vous etes fous? Cette bete est une manifestation divine!
TEXT.German: Das Tier zur Strecke bringen? Seid ihr von Sinnen? Dies ist eine Manifestation gцttlichen Wirkens!
TEXT.Italian: Cacciarlo? Sei matto? L'animale и una manifestazione di uno spirito divino!
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Cazarlo?¿Estбas loco? La bestia es una maniestaciуn de un espнritu divino!

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities with %F3_religion for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in all cities with %F3_religion for %d2 [NUM2:turn:turns].
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] dans toutes les villes %F3_religion pendant %d2 [NUM2:tour:tours]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in allen Stдdten mit der Religion %F3_religion fьr %d2 [NUM2:Runde:Runden]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] in tutte le cittа con %F3_religion per %d2 [NUM2:turno:turni]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_HAPPY] en todas las ciudades con %F3_religion por %d2 [NUM2:turno:turnos]

TEXT.Russian: A %s1_civ_adjective philosopher has stirred up controversy among the religious population.
TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective philosopher has stirred up controversy among the religious population.
TEXT.French: Un philosophe %s1_civ_adjective est a l'origine d'une controverse au sein de la population religieuse.
TEXT.German: Ein %[s1:3_civ_adjective]r Philosoph lцst Kontroversen unter der religiцsen Bevцlkerung aus.
TEXT.Italian: Un filosofo %s1_civ_adjective ha scatenato una controversia tra i vari credenti.
TEXT.Spanish: Un filуsofo %s1_civ_adjective ha levantado controversia entre la poblaciуn religiosa.

TEXT.Russian: A philosopher from %s2_city is stirring up controversy among our population. Our people are highly distrustful of his teachings.
TEXT.English: A philosopher from %s2_city is stirring up controversy among our population. Our people are highly distrustful of his teachings.
TEXT.French: Un philoshope de %s2_city a jete le trouble parmi nos gens qui se mefient fortement de ses enseignements.
TEXT.German: Ein Philosoph aus %s2_city lцst Kontroversen innerhalb unserer Bevцlkerung aus. Seine Lehren machen die Leute argwцhnisch.
TEXT.Italian: Un filosofo di %s2_city sta scatenando una controversia all'interno della nostra popolazione. I nostri cittadini sono molto diffidenti nei confronti dei suoi insegnamenti.
TEXT.Spanish: Un filуsofo de %s2_city esta levantando controversia entre nuestra poblaciуn. Nuestra gente esta realmente disgustada con sus enseсanzas.

TEXT.Russian: We won't tolerate such heresy. Send him into exile!
TEXT.English: We won't tolerate such heresy. Send him into exile!
TEXT.French: Nous ne tolererons aucune heresie. Bannissez-le!
TEXT.German: Derartige Ketzerei wird nicht toleriert. Schickt ihn ins Exil!
TEXT.Italian: Non tollereremo un'eresia simile. Mandatelo in esilio!
TEXT.Spanish: No toleraremos tal herejia. Mandarlo al exilio!

TEXT.Russian: He's a senile old fool. Let him teach if he wants to.
TEXT.English: He's a senile old fool. Let him teach if he wants to.
TEXT.French: Ce n'est qu'un vieux radoteur. Laissez-le enseigner s'il le souhaite.
TEXT.German: Der senile alte Narr soll lehren, was er will.
TEXT.Italian: И un vecchio pazzo. Lasciatelo insegnare se vuole.
TEXT.Spanish: Es un viejo tonto senil. Dejadle enseсar si asн lo desea.

TEXT.Russian: That's one exceptional mind! Sponsor an Academy for him to teach!
TEXT.English: That's one exceptional mind! Sponsor an Academy for him to teach!
TEXT.French: C'est un esprit exceptionnel! Proposons-lui une chaire ou il puisse enseigner!
TEXT.German: Wьrdigt diesen auЯergewцhnlichen Geist durch die Errichtung einer eigenen Akademie!
TEXT.Italian: Quest'uomo и dotato di una mente eccezionale. Mandatelo ad insegnare in un'accademia!
TEXT.Spanish: Es una mente excepcional! Patrocinar una Academia para sus enseсanzas!

TEXT.Russian: A high-ranking %s1_civ_adjective intelligence agent has defected to the %s4_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.English: A high-ranking %s1_civ_adjective intelligence agent has defected to the %s4_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.French: Un agent %s1_civ_adjective haut place a deserte et a rejoint le gouvernement %s4_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Ein hochrangiger %[s1:3_civ_adjective]r Spion ist zum %s4:2_civ_adjective Reich ьbergelaufen.
TEXT.Italian: Un agente di grado elevato dell'intelligence %s1_civ_adjective ha disertato ed и passato al servizio del governo %s4_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Spanish: Un agente de inteligencia %s1_civ_adjective de alto rango ha desertado al gobierno %s4_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: One of our high-ranking intelligence agents has defected to the %s1_civ_adjective empire.
TEXT.English: One of our high-ranking intelligence agents has defected to the %s1_civ_adjective empire.
TEXT.French: Un de nos agents haut place a deserte nos rangs pour rejoindre l'empire %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer hochrangigen Spione ist zum %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich ьbergelaufen.
TEXT.Italian: Uno dei nostri agenti dell'intelligence di grado elevato ha disertato ed и passato al servizio dell'impero %s1_civ_adjective
TEXT.Spanish: Uno de nuestros agentes de inteligencia de alto rango ha desertado al imperio %s1_civ_adjective

TEXT.Russian: That's regrettable. We'll need to review our security procedures.
TEXT.English: That's regrettable. We'll need to review our security procedures.
TEXT.French: C'est regrettable. Il nous faut revoir nos procedures de securite.
TEXT.German: Das ist bedauerlich. Lasst die SicherheitsmaЯnahmen ьberprьfen.
TEXT.Italian: И una cosa deplorevole. Dovremo rivedere le nostre misure di sicurezza.
TEXT.Spanish: Es lamentable. Tendremos que revisar nuestros procedimientos de seguridad.

TEXT.Russian: Unacceptable. An "accident" should happen to the traitor!
TEXT.English: Unacceptable. An "accident" should happen to the traitor!
TEXT.French: Intolerable. Un "accident" devrait arriver au traitre!
TEXT.German: Das ist inakzeptabel. Sorgt fьr einen "Unfall" des Verrдters...
TEXT.Italian: И inaccettabile. Il traditore la deve pagare!
TEXT.Spanish: Inaceptable. El traidor debe sufrir un "accidente"!

TEXT.Russian: The citizens of %s2_city are worried about their safety because of the city's Jail.
TEXT.English: The citizens of %s2_city are worried about their safety because of the city's Jail.
TEXT.French: Les habitants de %s2_city sont inquiets pour leur securite a cause de la prison municipale.
TEXT.German: Die Bьrger von %s2_city sind wegen des Gefдngnisses der Stadt hinsichtlich ihrer Sicherheit besorgt.
TEXT.Italian: I cittadini di %s2_city sono preoccupati per la loro sicurezza a causa della Prigione cittadina.
TEXT.Spanish: Los ciudadanos de %s2_city estбn preocupados por su seguridad debido a la carcel de la ciudad.

TEXT.Russian: People of %s2_city are not feeling safe. They are worried that criminals may escape from the local Jail.
TEXT.English: People of %s2_city are not feeling safe. They are worried that criminals may escape from the local Jail.
TEXT.French: Les habitants de %s2_city ne se sentent pas en securite. La possibilite que des criminels s'echappent de la prison locale les inquiete.
TEXT.German: Die Bьrger von %s2_city sorgen sich hinsichtlich der Sicherheit des stдdtischen Gefдngnisses.
TEXT.Italian: I cittadini di %s2_city non si sentono sicuri. Sono preoccupati che i criminali possano scappare dalla Prigione locale.
TEXT.Spanish: La gente de %s2_city no se siente segura. Les preocupes que los criminales escapen de la carcel local.

TEXT.Russian: So what? No one is going to escape anyway.
TEXT.English: So what? No one is going to escape anyway.
TEXT.French: Et alors? Personne ne va s'echapper de toutes facons.
TEXT.German: Die Leute sehen Gespenster. Ich habe andere Sorgen.
TEXT.Italian: Quindi? In ogni caso nessuno uscirа da quella prigione.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Y quй? Nadie va a escapar de ahн.

TEXT.Russian: Boost jail security and organize a campaign to convince the citizens that they're safe.
TEXT.English: Boost jail security and organize a campaign to convince the citizens that they're safe.
TEXT.French: Ameliorez la securite penitentiare et organisez une campagne de communication pour convainvre les gens qu'ils sont en surete.
TEXT.German: Verstдrkt die Gefдngnissicherheit und organisiert eine Kampagne, um die Bьrger von der Sicherheit zu ьberzeugen.
TEXT.Italian: Potenzia la sicurezza nella prigione e organizza una campagna propagandistica per rassicurare i cittadini.
TEXT.Spanish: Incrementa la seguridad de la carcel y organiza una campaсa para convencer a los ciudadanos de que estбn seguros.

TEXT.Russian: A %s4_civ_adjective infiltrator has been dicovered in the %s1_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.English: A %s4_civ_adjective infiltrator has been dicovered in the %s1_civ_adjective government.
TEXT.French: Un infiltrateur %s4_civ_adjective a ete decouvert au sein du gouvernement %s1_civ_adjective
TEXT.German: In den Reihen der %s1:2_civ_adjective Regierung ist ein %[s4:3_civ_adjective]r Spion enttarnt worden.
TEXT.Italian: Un infiltratore %s4_civ_adjective и stato scoperto all'interno del governo %s1_civ_adjective
TEXT.Spanish: Un infiltrado %s4_civ_adjective ha sido descubierto en el gobierno %s1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: A %s1_civ_adjective spy is operating on a high level in our government! What should we do?
TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective spy is operating on a high level in our government! What should we do?
TEXT.French: Un espion %s1_civ_adjective est implante dans les plus hautes spheres de notre gouvernement! Que devons-nous faire?
TEXT.German: Einer Eurer Regierungsmitarbeiter ist als %[s1:3_civ_adjective]r Spion enttarnt worden! Was wollt Ihr tun?
TEXT.Italian: Una spia %s1_civ_adjective sta operando negli alti livelli del nostro governo.Cosa dobiamo fare?
TEXT.Spanish: Un espia %s1_civ_adjective esta operando a alto nivel en nuestro gobierno! ¿Quй debemos hacer?

TEXT.Russian: Be discreet. Offer the to release the spy to their government, but question him first.
TEXT.English: Be discreet. Offer the to release the spy to their government, but question him first.
TEXT.French: Soyez discrets. Offrez de rendre l'espion a son gouvernement, mais questionnez-le d'abord.
TEXT.German: Seid diskret. Bietet die Ausweisung des Spions an, aber verhцrt ihn grьndlich.
TEXT.Italian: Agiamo con discrezione. Offriamo al loro governo il rilascio della spia, dopo averlo interrogato.
TEXT.Spanish: Seamos discretos. Entregar el espia a su gobierno, pero interrogadlo primero.

TEXT.Russian: Every man has his price. His knowledge could make him a very valuable asset.
TEXT.English: Every man has his price. His knowledge could make him a very valuable asset.
TEXT.French: Personne n'est incorruptible. Ses connaissances pourraient nous etre precieuses.
TEXT.German: Jeder ist kдuflich. Dieser Spion wird uns noch nьtzlich sein.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni uomo ha un suo prezzo. Le sue conoscenze potrebbero tornarci molto utili.
TEXT.Spanish: Todo el mundo tiene su precio. Su conocimiento puede hacerle un recurso muy valioso.

TEXT.Russian: That is an act of war! Clearly, our people and military contractors will rise to the occasion!
TEXT.English: That is an act of war! Clearly, our people and military contractors will rise to the occasion!
TEXT.French: C'est une declaration de guerre! Il est evident que notre peuple et nos fournisseurs militaires sauront profiter de cette occasion!
TEXT.German: Dieser Vorfall ist ein kriegerischer Akt! Die Empцrung wird das Volk in Rage versetzen und zu Hцchstleistungen antreiben.
TEXT.Italian: Questo и un atto di guerra! Certamente, i nostri cittadini reagiranno duramente alla notizia e i contractor militari vorranno approfittare di questa occasione!
TEXT.Spanish: Esto es un acto de guerra! Obviamente, nuestro pueblo y contratistas militares estaran a la altura!

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Tank:Tanks][COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Tank:Tanks][COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recoit %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]tanks[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Ihr erhaltet %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Panzer[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ricevi %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carri Armati[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Recibe %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tanques[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Russian: News reports indicate massive %s1_civ_adjective protests over the country's nuclear weapons stockpile.
TEXT.English: News reports indicate massive %s1_civ_adjective protests over the country's nuclear weapons stockpile.
TEXT.French: Derniere minute: manifestions %s1_civ_adjective contre l'arsenal nucleaire national!
TEXT.German: Es gibt Berichte ьber massive %s1:3_civ_adjective Bьrgerproteste hinsichtlich des Atomwaffenarsenals.
TEXT.Italian: Rapporti recenti mostrano massicce proteste di cittadini %s1_civ_adjective per l'arsenale nucleare della nazione.
TEXT.Spanish: Las noticias indican protestas masivas en %s1_civ_adjective por la reserva nuclear del pais.

TEXT.Russian: Our people are protesting against our nuclear arsenal. They fear that we would use nukes with disastrous consequences.
TEXT.English: Our people are protesting against our nuclear arsenal. They fear that we would use nukes with disastrous consequences.
TEXT.French: Nos citoyens manifestent contre notre force de frappe nucleaire. Ils craignent les consequences dramatiques qui surviendraient si nous les utilisions.
TEXT.German: Das Volk protestiert gegen Euer Atomwaffenarsenal. Die Menschen befьrchten katastrophale Folgen durch einen Einsatz dieser Waffen.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri cittadini protestano contro il nostro arsenale nucleare. Temono che useremo le armi atomiche con conseguenze disastrose.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro pueblo esta manifestandose contra nuestro arsenal nuclear. Temen que las usemos con consecuencias catastrуficas

TEXT.Russian: The people's wishes are our top priority. We will disband our nuclear weapons.
TEXT.English: The people's wishes are our top priority. We will disband our nuclear weapons.
TEXT.French: Notre priorite est de contenter nos citoyens. Nous allons desarmer notre arsenal nucleaire.
TEXT.German: Der Volkswille hat oberste Prioritдt. Das Atomwaffenarsenal wird aufgelцst.
TEXT.Italian: La volontа del nostro popolo и la nostra prima prioritа. Avvia il disarmo nucleare.
TEXT.Spanish: Los deseos del pueblo son nuestra primera prioridad. Desmantelaremos nuestro arsenal nuclear.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Lose all nuclear weapons.
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Lose all nuclear weapons.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Perte de toutes ses armes nucleaires
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Alle Nuklearwaffen werden beseitigt
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Tutte le armi nucleari vengono smantellate.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Perder todas las armas nucleares.

TEXT.Russian: What? Find those who spread such nonsense and prosecute them!
TEXT.English: What? Find those who spread such nonsense and prosecute them!
TEXT.French: De quoi? Trouvez les responsables de ces idioties et trainez-les en justice!
TEXT.German: In diesem Land entscheide ich. Lasst die Urheber der Meinungsmache strafrechtlich verfolgen!
TEXT.Italian: Cosa? Trovate chi diffonde queste sciocchezze e metteteli sotto processo!!
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Quй? Encontrad a quien divulgue estas estupideces y perseguidle!

TEXT.Russian: We need a positive publicity campaign for our military, right now!
TEXT.English: We need a positive publicity campaign for our military, right now!
TEXT.French: Il nous faut une campagne de promotion pour notre armee, tout de suite!
TEXT.German: Sorgt umgehend fьr eine цffentliche Kampagne zur Unterstьtzung unseres Militдrapparats!
TEXT.Italian: Le nostre forze armate hanno bisogno di una buona campagna pubblicitaria, ora!
TEXT.Spanish: Necesitamos una campaсa de publicidad positiva para nuestro ejйrcito, ahora mismo!

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel.
TEXT.French: Les scientifiques %s1_civ_adjective ont developpe une methode amelioree d'exploitation du charbon.
TEXT.German: Die %s1:2_civ_adjective Wissenschaftler entwickeln ein verbessertes Verfahren zur Energiegewinnung aus Kohle.
TEXT.Italian: Scienziati %s1_civ_adjective hanno sviluppato metodi migliori per la lavorazione del combustibile derivante dal carbone.
TEXT.Spanish: Cientнficos %s1_civ_adjective han descubierto mejores maneras de procesar carbуn.

TEXT.Russian: Our scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel. Our economy stands ready to benefit from this development.
TEXT.English: Our scientists have developed better ways of processing coal fuel. Our economy stands ready to benefit from this development.
TEXT.French: Nos scientifiques ont trouve une meilleure facon d'exploiter le charbon. Notre economie va beneficier enormement de cette decouverte.
TEXT.German: Unsere Wissenschaftler haben ein verbessertes Verfahren zur Energiegewinnung aus Kohle entwickelt, von welchem unsere Wirtschaft profitieren kцnnte.
TEXT.Italian: I nostri scienziati hanno sviluppato metodi migliori per la lavorazione del combustibile derivante dal carbone. La nostra economia и pronta per beneficiare di questo sviluppo.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros cientнficos han descubierto mejores maneras de procesar carbуn. Nuestra economia estб preparada para beneficiarse de este desarrollo.

TEXT.Russian: Put it to use at our Coal-fueled power plants. Production is power!
TEXT.English: Put it to use at our Coal-fueled power plants. Production is power!
TEXT.French: Appliquez cette avancee immediatement a nos centrales a charbon. La production, c'est le pouvoir!
TEXT.German: Fцrdert den Einsatz dieser Technik in unseren Kohlekraftwerken, um die stдdtischen Produktionsraten zu steigern.
TEXT.Italian: Usiamolo nelle nostre centrali a carbone. La produttivitа и potere!
TEXT.Spanish: Aplicadlo en nuestras plantas de carbу. La producciуn es poder!

TEXT.Russian: I suppose we can make our Drydocks a more healthy place to work and slightly more productive, then.
TEXT.English: I suppose we can make our Drydocks a more healthy place to work and slightly more productive, then.
TEXT.French: J'imagine que nous pouvons faire de nos cales seches un endroit plus sain et plus productif, alors.
TEXT.German: Fцrdert den Einsatz dieser Technik in unseren Trockendocks, um die dortigen Gesundheitsbedingungen und Ertrдge zu verbessern.
TEXT.Italian: Penso che i nostri cantieri navali ne gioverebbero, sarebbero luoghi piщ sani per chi ci lavora e anche leggermente piщ produttivi.
TEXT.Spanish: Supongo que entonces podemos hacer de nuestros astilleros un lugar mбs saludable y ligeramente mбs productivo.

TEXT.Russian: The dam in %s2_city has broken, flooding the city's suburbs and killing people.
TEXT.English: The dam in %s2_city has broken, flooding the city's suburbs and killing people.
TEXT.French: Le barrage de %s2_city a rompu, inondant les faubourgs de la ville et faisant de nombreuses victimes.
TEXT.German: Ein Bruch des Wasserschutzwalls in der Stadt %s2_city verursacht Ьberflutungen von Stadtbezirken und fordert Todesopfer.
TEXT.Italian: La diga di %s2_city и crollata. I sobborghi della cittа sono stati inondati e sono state segnalate diverse persone uccise.
TEXT.Spanish: La presa en %s2_city ha cedido, inundando las afueras de la ciudad y matando gente.

TEXT.Russian: The dam in %s2_city has broken. The city's suburbs are flooded and deaths have been reported.
TEXT.English: The dam in %s2_city has broken. The city's suburbs are flooded and deaths have been reported.
TEXT.French: Le barrage de %s2_city a rompu. Les banlieues de la ville sont inondees et il y a de nombreuses victimes.
TEXT.German: Ein Bruch des Wasserschutzwalls in der Stadt %s2_city verursacht Ьberflutungen von Stadtbezirken und fordert Todesopfer.
TEXT.Italian: La diga di %s2_city и crollata. I sobborghi della cittа sono stati inondati e sono state segnalate diverse persone che hanno perso la vita.
TEXT.Spanish: La presa en %s2_city ha cedido. Las afueras de la ciudad estбn inundadas y se informa de muertes.

TEXT.Russian: That is very unfortunate, but we can not help. Tell the local authorities they'll have to handle the situation.
TEXT.English: That is very unfortunate, but we can not help. Tell the local authorities they'll have to handle the situation.
TEXT.French: C'est malheureux, mais nous ne pouvons rien y faire. Mettez les autorites locales en charge de la situation.
TEXT.German: Wir kцnnen uns derzeit keine HilfsmaЯnahmen leisten. Die lokalen Behцrden mьssen mit dieser Situation selbst fertig werden.
TEXT.Italian: И una cosa molto spiacevole, ma non possiamo fare nulla. Dici alle autoritа locali che dovranno occuparsi della situazione.
TEXT.Spanish: Eso es muy desafortunado, pero no podemos ayudar. Decir a las autoridades locales que tendrбn que manejar la situaciуn.

TEXT.Russian: Repair the dam from our emergency funds.
TEXT.English: Repair the dam from our emergency funds.
TEXT.French: Reparez le barrage a l'aide de nos fonds d'urgence.
TEXT.German: Organisiert einen Wiederaufbau des Wasserschutzwalles.
TEXT.Italian: Ripara la diga con i nostri fondi destinati alle emergenze
TEXT.Spanish: Reparar la presa con nuestros fondos de emergencia.

TEXT.Russian: Repair the dam and provide compensation to the affected families.
TEXT.English: Repair the dam and provide compensation to the affected families.
TEXT.French: Remettez le barrage en etat et payez des reparations aux familles touchees par le drame.
TEXT.German: Organisiert einen Wiederaufbau des Wasserschutzwalles und HilfsmaЯnahmen fьr die Betroffenen.
TEXT.Italian: Ripara la diga e provvedi a un risarcimento per le famiglie coinvolte dal disastro
TEXT.Spanish: Reparar la presa y dar compensaciones a las familias afectadas

TEXT.Russian: A Rabbi from %s2_city has written a valuable collection of religious works.
TEXT.English: A Rabbi from %s2_city has written a valuable collection of religious works.
TEXT.French: Un rabbin de la ville de %s2_city a termine la redaction de son oeuvre religieuse.
TEXT.German: Ein Rabbi aus der Stadt %s2_city hat eine wertvolle Sammlung religiцser Schriften verfasst.
TEXT.Italian: Un rabbino di %s2_city ha scritto una preziosa raccolta di opere religiose
TEXT.Spanish: Un rabino de %s2_city ha escrito una valiosa colecciуn de obras religiosas

TEXT.Russian: A Rabbi from %s2_city has written a collection of religious works that is of great importance to Judaism worldwide.
TEXT.English: A Rabbi from %s2_city has written a collection of religious works that is of great importance to Judaism worldwide.
TEXT.French: Un rabbin de %s2_city a termine la redaction de son oeuvre, d'importance majeure pour le judaisme.
TEXT.German: Ein Rabbi aus der Stadt %s2_city hat eine wertvolle Sammlung religiцser Schriften verfasst, die von weltweiter Bedeutung fьr das Judentum ist.
TEXT.Italian: Un rabbino di %s2_city ha scritto una preziosa raccolta di opere religiose di grande importanza per il Giudaismo nel mondo.
TEXT.Spanish: Un rabino de %s2_city ha escrito una colecciуn de obras religiosas de gran valor para el judaismo mundial.

TEXT.Russian: These works should be distributed to cities in our empire and abroad.
TEXT.English: These works should be distributed to cities in our empire and abroad.
TEXT.French: Cette oeuvre doit etre diffusee dans nos villes et a l'etranger!
TEXT.German: Lasst die Werke in allen Stдdten des Reiches und im Ausland verbreiten.
TEXT.Italian: Queste opere devono essere diffuse all'interno delle nostre cittа e all'estero
TEXT.Spanish: Estos trabajos deben ser distribuido en las ciudades de nuestro imperio y en el extrangero

TEXT.Russian: The Rabbi certainly deserves state funding for his endeavours.
TEXT.English: The Rabbi certainly deserves state funding for his endeavours.
TEXT.French: Le rabbin merite certainement une pension d'Etat pour ce qu'il a entrepris.
TEXT.German: Sorgt dafьr, dass der Rabbi mit staatlicher Fцrderung an weiteren Werken arbeiten kann.
TEXT.Italian: Il rabbino merita sicuramente un finanziamento statale per i suoi sforzi
TEXT.Spanish: El rabino merece financiaciуn estatal por sus esfuerzos.

TEXT.Russian: Works like these can easily make the Temple of Solomon an even bigger site of interest to tourists worldwide.
TEXT.English: Works like these can easily make the Temple of Solomon an even bigger site of interest to tourists worldwide.
TEXT.French: De tels ouvrages peuvent surement faire du monastere local une attraction touristique majeure!
TEXT.German: Sorgt dafьr, dass das цrtliche Kloster zu einem lohnenden Ziel fьr Pilger und Touristen aus aller Welt wird.
TEXT.Italian: Opere come queste possono facilmente rendere il monastero locale un'attrazione turistica a livello mondiale
TEXT.Spanish: Trabajos como estos pueden hacer del monasterio local un lugar de interes turнstico mundial.

TEXT.Russian: A blacksmith from %s2_city has made a beautiful golden Buddha statue at his Forge.
TEXT.English: A blacksmith from %s2_city has made a beautiful golden Buddha statue at his Forge.
TEXT.French: Un forgeron de %s2_city a cree une superbe statue en or de Bouddha.
TEXT.German: Ein Schmied aus der Stadt %s2_city hat eine wunderschцne goldene Buddha-Statue angefertigt.
TEXT.Italian: Un fabbro di %s2_city ha creato una stupenda statua d'oro di Buddha presso la sua Fucina
TEXT.Spanish: La herreria de %s2_city ha realizado una hermosa estatua dorada en su forja.

TEXT.Russian: A blacksmith working in the Forge of %s2_city has made a beautiful golden statue of Buddha.
TEXT.English: A blacksmith working in the Forge of %s2_city has made a beautiful golden statue of Buddha.
TEXT.French: Un forgeron travaillant dans la forge de %s2_city a cree une superbe statue en or de Bouddha.
TEXT.German: In der Schmiede der Stadt %s2_city hat der Meister eine wunderschцne goldene Buddha-Statue angefertigt.
TEXT.Italian: Un fabbro che lavora presso la fucina di %s2_city ha creato una splendida statua d'oro di Buddha
TEXT.Spanish: Un herrero trabajando en la forja de %s2_city ha hecho una hermosa estatua de Buda.

TEXT.Russian: That's not his job. Sell the statue and remind the blacksmith what his responsibilities are.
TEXT.English: That's not his job. Sell the statue and remind the blacksmith what his responsibilities are.
TEXT.French: Ce n'est pas son travail. Vendez la statue et rappelez a l'ordre le forgeron.
TEXT.German: Das gehцrt nicht zu seinen Aufgaben. Verkauft die Statue und erinnert den Schmied an seine Pflichten.
TEXT.Italian: Questo non и il suo lavoro. Vendiamo la statua e ricorda al fabbro quali siano i suoi doveri.
TEXT.Spanish: Ese no es su trabajo. Vende la estatua y recuerda al herrero cuales son sus responsabilidades.

TEXT.Russian: Impressive. This should make the Forge a cultural attraction.
TEXT.English: Impressive. This should make the Forge a cultural attraction.
TEXT.French: Impressionnant! Cette forge pourrait devenir une attraction culturelle!
TEXT.German: Beeindruckend. Die Schmiede sollte eine kulturelle Attraktion werden.
TEXT.Italian: Impressionante. Questo rendera la Fucina un'attrazione turistica.
TEXT.Spanish: Impresionante. Esto debe hacer de la forja una atacciуn cultural.

TEXT.Russian: The blacksmith is a true talent, we should encourage him to make more of these statues.
TEXT.English: The blacksmith is a true talent, we should encourage him to make more of these statues.
TEXT.French: Ce forgeron a un vrai talent, nous devrions l'encourager a faire plus de statues.
TEXT.German: Der Schmied ist ein Naturtalent. Ermutigt ihn zum Anfertigen weiterer Statuen.
TEXT.Italian: Questo fabbro и un vero talento, incoraggiamolo a scolpire nuove statue.
TEXT.Spanish: El herrero es un autйntico artista, debemos animarle a que haga mбs estatuas.

TEXT.Russian: A well-known scientist from %s2_city has become a preacher at the local Christian Monastery.
TEXT.English: A well-known scientist from %s2_city has become a preacher at the local Christian Monastery.
