TEXT.French: Un scientifique repute de %s2_city est rentre dans les ordres au monastere chretien local
TEXT.German: Ein renommierter Wissenschaftler der Stadt %s2_city predigt im цrtlichen Christlichen Kloster.
TEXT.Italian: Un rinomato scienziato di %s2_city и diventato un predicatore presso il locale Monastero Cristiano.
TEXT.Spanish: Un reputado cientнfico de %s2_city se ha convertido en predicador en el monasterio cristiano local.

TEXT.Russian: A scientist from %s2_city has undergone baptism and become a preacher at the city's Christian Monastery.
TEXT.English: A scientist from %s2_city has undergone baptism and become a preacher at the city's Christian Monastery.
TEXT.French: Un scientifique de %s2_city s'est fait baptiser et est rentre dans les ordres au monastere chretien de la ville.
TEXT.German: Ein renommierter Wissenschaftler der Stadt %s2_city predigt nach seiner Taufe im цrtlichen Christlichen Kloster.
TEXT.Italian: Uno scienziato di %s2_city si и fatto battezzare ed и diventato un predicatore presso il Monastero Cristiano della cittа.
TEXT.Spanish: Un cientнfico de %s2_city se ha bautizado y convertido en predicador en el monasterio cristiano de la ciudad.

TEXT.Russian: Send the scientist our well wishes.
TEXT.English: Send the scientist our well wishes.
TEXT.French: Envoyez au scientifique nos encouragements.
TEXT.German: Ьbermittelt dem Wissenschaftler meine guten Wьnsche.
TEXT.Italian: Manda allo scienziato i nostri migliori auguri.
TEXT.Spanish: Envia al cientнfico nuestra bendiciуn.

TEXT.Russian: See if the scientist would be willing to continue the scientific work at the Monastery, given some additional funding.
TEXT.English: See if the scientist would be willing to continue the scientific work at the Monastery, given some additional funding.
TEXT.French: Regardez si le scientifique serait pret a continuer son travail au monastere s'il avait un soutien financier.
TEXT.German: Ermutigt den Wissenschaftler mit finanzieller Unterstьtzung dazu, seine wissenschaftlichen Arbeiten im Kloster fortzusetzen.
TEXT.Italian: Vediamo se lo scienziato sia consenziente a continuare la propria ricerca scientifica presso il Monastero, dopo aver concesso alcuni fondi aggiuntivi.
TEXT.Spanish: Mira si el cientнfico desea continuar investigando en el monasterio, dбndole alguna financiaciуn adicional.

TEXT.Russian: The man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped during this year's Toxcatl feast in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.English: The man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped during this year's Toxcatl feast in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.French: L'homme qui incarne Tezcatlipoca s'est echappe au cours du festival annuel de Toxcatl de l'empire %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Im %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich gibt es einen religiцsen Skandal, weil das geweihte Opfer vor der heiligen Blutzeremonie entkommen konnte.
TEXT.Italian: L'uomo che ha le sembianze di Tezcatlipoca и scappato durante la celebrazione di quest'anno di Toxcatl nell'impero %s1_civ_adjective
TEXT.Spanish: El hombre que es el favorito de Tezcatlipoca ha huido durante el festival Toxcatl en el imperio %s1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: During the Toxcatl feast, the young man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped from the teokalli in %s2_city before he could be sacrificed!
TEXT.English: During the Toxcatl feast, the young man who is Tezcatlipoca's likeness has escaped from the teokalli in %s2_city before he could be sacrificed!
TEXT.French: Au cours du festival de Toxcatl, le jeune homme qui incarne Tezcatlipoca s'est echappe du teokalli de %s2_city avant qu'il puisse etre sacrifie
TEXT.German: In der Stadt gibt %s2_city gibt es einen religiцsen Skandal, weil das geweihte Opfer vor der heiligen Blutzeremonie entkommen konnte.
TEXT.Italian: Durante la celebrazione di Toxcatl un giovane uomo avente le sembianze di Tezcalipoca и scappato dai teokalli nella cittа di %s2_city prima che potesse essere sacrificato!
TEXT.Spanish: Durante el festival Toxcatl, el hombre joven favorito de Tezcatlipoca ha huido del teokalli en %s2_city antes de poder ser sacrificado!

TEXT.Russian: This is horrible news. May the heavens be merciful...
TEXT.English: This is horrible news. May the heavens be merciful...
TEXT.French: Quelle horrible nouvelle. Que les cieux nous soient clements!
TEXT.German: Schreckliche Nachricht. Mцgen uns die Gцtter gnдdig sein.
TEXT.Italian: И una notizia orribile! Che gli dei abbiano pietа...
TEXT.Spanish: Terribles noticias. Que los cielos sean piadosos...

TEXT.Russian: Make every effort to recapture him!
TEXT.English: Make every effort to recapture him!
TEXT.French: Que tout soit fait pour le retrouver!
TEXT.German: Lasst das Opfer verfolgen und gefangen nehmen, koste es, was es wolle!
TEXT.Italian: Fate ogni sforzo per ricatturarlo!
TEXT.Spanish: Haz lo que sea necesario para capturarlo!

TEXT.Russian: A priest from %s2_city is doubting the supreme power of Amun-Re.
TEXT.English: A priest from %s2_city is doubting the supreme power of Amun-Re.
TEXT.French: Un pretre de %s2_city a mis en doute le pouvoir supreme d'Amon-re.
TEXT.German: Ein Hohepriester der Stadt %s2_city zweifelt an der Macht des Fruchtbarkeitsgottes.
TEXT.Italian: Un sacerdote di %s2_city dubita del potere supremo di Amon-Ra.
TEXT.Spanish: Un sacerdote de %s2_city duda del poder supremo de Amun-Re.

TEXT.Russian: A dissident priest from %s2_city is doubting the supreme power of Amun-Re in an unprecedented outbreak of heresy.
TEXT.English: A dissident priest from %s2_city is doubting the supreme power of Amun-Re in an unprecedented outbreak of heresy.
TEXT.French: Un pretre dissident de %s2_city, a mis en doute la puissance supreme d'Amon-Re, ouvrant la voie a une nouvelle heresie.
TEXT.German: Ein kritischer Priester der Stadt %s2_city zweifelt in beispielloser Ketzerei an der Macht des Fruchtbarkeitsgottes.
TEXT.Italian: Un sacerdote dissidente di %s2_city sta dubitando del potere supremo di Amon-Ra, creando una diffusione di eresie senza precedenti.
TEXT.Spanish: En un brote de herejia sin precedentes, un sacerdote disidente de %s2_city duda del poder supremo de Amun-Re.

TEXT.Russian: That is disgusting and preposterous. The heresy must be dealt with in the name of Amun-Re, even if the locals won't support it.
TEXT.English: That is disgusting and preposterous. The heresy must be dealt with in the name of Amun-Re, even if the locals won't support it.
TEXT.French: C'est inadmissible et deprave. Cette heresie doit etre contrecarre au nom d'Amon-Re, meme si les autochtones ne l'approuvent pas.
TEXT.German: Beendet im Namen des Fruchtbarkeitsgottes diese widerliche Ketzerei, notfalls mit Gewalt gegen die Bevцlkerung.
TEXT.Italian: Tutto ciт и disgustoso e assurdo. Dovremo occuparci di questa eresia nel nome di Amon-Ra, anche se non avremo l'appoggio delle popolazioni locali.
TEXT.Spanish: Eso es lamentable y absurdo. La herejia debe ser tratada con el nombre de Amun-Re, incluso si la poblaciуn local no lo apoya.

TEXT.Russian: We can ignore that nutter, our people will get over it.
TEXT.English: We can ignore that nutter, our people will get over it.
TEXT.French: Ignorons cet imbecile, notre peuple s'en remettra.
TEXT.German: Ignoriert den Verrьckten, das Volk wird darьber hinweg kommen.
TEXT.Italian: Ignoriamo questo pazzo, il nostro popolo si dimenticherа di tutto ciт che ha detto.
TEXT.Spanish: Podemos ignorar esa minucia, nuestra gente se ocupara de ello.

TEXT.Russian: Diversity is good. Allow these beliefs to spread and be recorded, though convincing our people that it's nothing to fear won't be easy.
TEXT.English: Diversity is good. Allow these beliefs to spread and be recorded, though convincing our people that it's nothing to fear won't be easy.
TEXT.French: La diversite est positive. Laissons ces croyances se propager, meme s'il ne sera pas facile de convaincre notre peuple de leur innocuite!
TEXT.German: Der Glaube hat viele Gesichter. Zeichnet die neuen Ьberzeugungen auf und hindert sie nicht an der Ausbreitung, aber helft den Menschen, ihren Glauben zu wahren.
TEXT.Italian: La diversitа и un bene.Permettiamo a questa credenza di diffondersi e di essere dichiarata ufficialmente, sebbene convincere i nostri cittadini che non c'и nulla da temere sarа difficile.
TEXT.Spanish: La diversidad es buena. Permitid que esas creencias se difundad y sean preservadas, aunque convencer a nuestra gente de que no hay nada que temer no serб facil.

TEXT.Russian: Industrious villagers have built a Pasture in %s1_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.English: Industrious villagers have built a Pasture in %s1_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.French: D'industrieux villageois ont construit une pature dans les terres %s1_civ_adjective
TEXT.German: FleiЯige Dorfbewohner errichten auf %s1:3_civ_adjectivem Boden selbstдndig eine Weide.
TEXT.Italian: Abitanti industriosi di un villaggio hanno costruito un Pascolo nelle terre %s1_civ_adjective
TEXT.Spanish: Aldeanos laboriosos han hecho un pastizal en tierras de %s1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.Russian: Industrious villagers near our city of %s2_city have built a Pasture.
TEXT.English: Industrious villagers near our city of %s2_city have built a Pasture.
TEXT.French: D'industrieux villageois ont construit une pature pres de la ville de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: FleiЯige Dorfbewohner errichten nahe der Stadt %s2_city selbstдndig eine Weide.
TEXT.Italian: Abitanti industriosi di un villaggio vicino alla nostra cittа di %s2_city hanno costruito un Pascolo
TEXT.Spanish: Aldeanos laboriosos cerca de la ciudad de %s2_city han hecho un pastizal.

TEXT.Russian: Send them our thanks.
TEXT.English: Send them our thanks.
TEXT.French: Envoyez-leur nos remerciements!
TEXT.German: Ьbermittelt meinen Dank.
TEXT.Italian: Manda i nostri ringraziamenti
TEXT.Spanish: Darles las gracias.

TEXT.Russian: A rogue radio station in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city is broadcasting propaganda against the ruling party.
TEXT.English: A rogue radio station in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city is broadcasting propaganda against the ruling party.
TEXT.French: Une radio pirate dans la ville %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city diffuse de la propagande anti-gouvernementale.
TEXT.German: Im %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich verbreitet ein Piratensender ausgehend von der Stadt %s2_city Propaganda gegen die Regierung.
TEXT.Italian: Una stazione radio dissidente nella cittа %s1_civ_adjective di %s2_city sta diffondendo propaganda contro il partito al potere
TEXT.Spanish: Una emisora pirata en la ciudad %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city estб emitiendo propaganda contra el partido gobernante.

TEXT.Russian: A rogue radio station in %s2_city is broadcasting propaganda against our ruling party in an amazing display of impudence.
TEXT.English: A rogue radio station in %s2_city is broadcasting propaganda against our ruling party in an amazing display of impudence.
TEXT.French: Une radio pirate de %s2_city diffuse de facon ouverte et insolente de la propagande anti-gouvernementale.
TEXT.German: Ein Piratensender verbreitet ausgehend von der Stadt %s2_city dreiste Propaganda gegen Eure Regierung.
TEXT.Italian: Una stazione radio dissidente nella cittа di %s2_city sta diffondendo propaganda contro il nostro partito al potere, mostrando una sorprendente impudenza.
TEXT.Spanish: Una emisora pirata en %s2_city estб emitiendo propaganda contra nuestro partido gobernante en una sorprendente muestra de imprudencia.

TEXT.Russian: Send a blackops group to destroy the radio tower, we can blame it on an industrial accident.
TEXT.English: Send a blackops group to destroy the radio tower, we can blame it on an industrial accident.
TEXT.French: Envoyez le GIGN detruire la station emettrice, nous pretendrons que c'est un accident industriel.
TEXT.German: Ein verdecktes Einsatzkommando soll den Sender zerstцren, aber lasst es wie einen Unfall aussehen.
TEXT.Italian: Manda una squadra speciale a distruggere la stazione radio, possiamo addossare le cause ad un incidente industriale.
TEXT.Spanish: Envia un grupo encubierto a destruir la torre de radio, podemos disfrazarlo de accidente industrial.

TEXT.Russian: Round up the broadcasters, that should send a message.
TEXT.English: Round up the broadcasters, that should send a message.
TEXT.French: Envoyez les animateurs au trou, ca devrait faire passer le message.
TEXT.German: Lasst die Betreiber verhaften, das sollte als Warnung genьgen.
TEXT.Italian: Catturate gli annunciatori, capiranno il messaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: Apresa a los locutores, eso enviarб un mensaje.

TEXT.Russian: Wait for the station to get more listeners, then round them up along with the broadcasters and send them all to do labour at our factories.
TEXT.English: Wait for the station to get more listeners, then round them up along with the broadcasters and send them all to do labour at our factories.
TEXT.French: Attendez que la station gagne des auditeurs, puis arretez-le ainsi que les animateurs et envoyez tout le monde travailler dans nos usines.
TEXT.German: Stellt fest, wer mit dem Piratensender sympathisiert, dann verhaftet die Staatsfeinde und verurteilt sie zur Zwangsarbeit in den Fabriken.
TEXT.Italian: Attendete che alla stazione radio si radunino vari ascoltatori, poi catturate gli annunciatori e tutti gli ascoltatori che si erano radunati e mandateli ai lavori forzati nelle nostre fabbriche.
TEXT.Spanish: Espera a que la emisora tenga mбs oyentes, entonces aprйsalos junto a los locutores y envialos a trabajar a nuestras fбbricas.

TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective antimonarchists are protesting, saying that the religious institutions don't have enough power compared to the King.
TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective antimonarchists are protesting, saying that the religious institutions don't have enough power compared to the King.
TEXT.French: Des anti-monarchistes %s1_civ_adjective manifestent car ils trouvent que les institutions religieuses ne sont pas assez puissantes comparees au roi.
TEXT.German: Im %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich protestieren glдubige Menschen gegen die Ohnmacht religiцser Institutionen im Vergleich zur Allmacht des Kцnigshauses.
TEXT.Italian: Gli antimonarchici %s1_civ_adjective stanno protestando, dicono che le istituzioni religiose non hanno abbastanza poteri rispetto al re.
TEXT.Spanish: Antimonбrquicos %s1_civ_adjective estan protestando, diciendo que las instituciones religiosas apenas tiene poder frente al Rey.

TEXT.Russian: Anti-monarchists are claiming that the King has too much power and that religious leaders need to have some, too.
TEXT.English: Anti-monarchists are claiming that the King has too much power and that religious leaders need to have some, too.
TEXT.French: Des anti-monarchistes pretendent que le roi a trop de pouvoir, et que les autorites religieuses devraient en avoir plus.
TEXT.German: Glдubige Menschen protestieren gegen die Ohnmacht religiцser Institutionen im Vergleich zur Allmacht Eures Kцnigshauses.
TEXT.Italian: Gli antimonarchici rivendicano che il Re ha troppi poteri, e che i leader religiosi debbano avere i propri poteri rafforzati.
TEXT.Spanish: Antimonбrquicos reclaman quй el rey tiene demasiado poder y quй los lideres religiosos deberian tener algo tambien.

TEXT.Russian: Our King is the State!
TEXT.English: Our King is the State!
TEXT.French: L'Etat, c'est moi!
TEXT.German: Der Staat bin ich!
TEXT.Italian: Il Re и lo Stato!
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro rey es el estado!

TEXT.Russian: It's a valid point, our clerics need more influence.
TEXT.English: It's a valid point, our clerics need more influence.
TEXT.French: Ce sont de justes revendications, notre clerge a besoin d'etre plus influent.
TEXT.German: Nun gut, ich gewдhre den Geistlichen mehr Einfluss.
TEXT.Italian: Hanno ragione, le organizzazioni ecclesiastiche devono avere piщ influenza.
TEXT.Spanish: Es un argumento vбlido, nuestro clerigos necesitan mбs influencia.

TEXT.Russian: The %s1_civ_adjective President is facing impeachment.
TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective President is facing impeachment.
TEXT.French: Le president %s1_civ_adjective fait face a une motion de censure.
TEXT.German: Im %s1:2_civ_adjective Reich droht der Regierungsfьhrung ein Amtsenthebungsverfahren.
TEXT.Italian: Il Presidente %s1_civ_adjective и stato messo sotto impeachment
TEXT.Spanish: El presidente %s1_civ_adjective se enfrente a una mociуn de censura.

TEXT.Russian: The Congress wants to impeach the President. The population supports this motion.
TEXT.English: The Congress wants to impeach the President. The population supports this motion.
TEXT.French: Les deputes, soutenus par la population, souhaitent passer une motion de censure a l'egard du president.
TEXT.German: Der Kongress verlangt ein Amtsenthebungsverfahren gegen die Regierungsfьhrung, unterstьtzt von groЯen Teilen der Bevцlkerung.
TEXT.Italian: Il Congresso vuole mettere sotto impeachment il Presidente. La popolazione supporta la mozione.
TEXT.Spanish: El congreso ha presentado una mociуn de censura contra el presidente. La poblaciуn apoya esta iniciativa.

TEXT.Russian: Then the impeachment should proceed, if that's the people's will.
TEXT.English: Then the impeachment should proceed, if that's the people's will.
TEXT.French: Que la motion passe, si c'est le souhait du peuple.
TEXT.German: Ist es der Wille des Volkes, so mцge das Amtsenthebungsverfahren beginnen.
TEXT.Italian: Se и la volontа del popolo, l'impeachment deve andare avanti.
TEXT.Spanish: Entonces la mociуn debe proceder, si es el deseo del pueblo.

TEXT.Russian: That's an overreaction. The President has gotten the message that his administration needs to improve.
TEXT.English: That's an overreaction. The President has gotten the message that his administration needs to improve.
TEXT.French: Ils en font trop. Le president devrait comprendre le message et renover son administration.
TEXT.German: Ein Amtsenthebungsverfahren wдre ьbertrieben. Aber die Regierungsfьhrung soll die Sorgen der Menschen ernster nehmen.
TEXT.Italian: И una reazione eccessiva. Il Presidente avrа inteso il messaggio che la sua amministrazione deve migliorare.
TEXT.Spanish: Eso es una exageraciуn. El presidente debe captar el mensaje de que su administraciуn debe mejorar.

TEXT.Russian: [ICON_BULLET]Persuade other nations to convert to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Environmentalism[COLOR_REVERT] (at least one civilization must have the ability to do so).
TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Persuade other nations to convert to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Environmentalism[COLOR_REVERT] (at least one civilization must have the ability to do so).
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Persuader d'autres nations de se convertir à l'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]écologie[COLOR_REVERT] (au moins une civilisation doit posséder cette capacité).
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Ьberzeugt andere Nationen, zum [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Umweltschutz[COLOR_REVERT] zu wechseln (mindestens eine Zivilisation muss dazu fдhig sein).
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Persuadi altre nazioni a convertirsi all'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambientalismo[COLOR_REVERT] (almeno una delle altre civiltа deve essere in grado di farlo).
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Convence a otras naciones de que se conviertan al [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ecologismo[COLOR_REVERT] (al menos una civilizaciуn debe poseer la capacidad de hacerlo).

TEXT.Russian: Saltpeter Discovered.
TEXT.English: Saltpeter Discovered.
TEXT.French: Salpêtre découvert.
TEXT.German: Salpeter entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: Scoperto il salnitro.
TEXT.Spanish: Has descubierto el salitre.

TEXT.Russian: All records of ancient games have been forever lost.
TEXT.English: All records of ancient games have been forever lost.
TEXT.French: Toutes les informations sur les jeux antiques ont йtй perdues pour toujours.
TEXT.German: Alle Informationen ьber die alte Spiele sind fьr immer verloren worden.
TEXT.Italian: Tutte le informazioni sui giochi antichi sono state perse per sempre.
TEXT.Spanish: Toda la informaciуn sobre los juegos antiguos se ha perdido por siempre.
